85b4(mdo sde): pa las/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon te/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa
85b5(mdo sde): las/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der byon to zhes thos// thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal bo'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
85b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dag go// phyogs gcig tu
85b7(mdo sde): 'dug nas/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos byang chub thob par byed pa'i chos rnams yang dag par 'dzin du bcu'o// 
85b8(mdo sde): de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar dun bzer dang / 
86a1(mdo sde): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman pong rnams la spyan drang so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos kyang cang / 
86a2(mdo sde): bi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ 
86a3(mdo sde): zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims che dang / gdan dang / snyan gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
86a4(mdo sde): gzugs kyang rin po che las byaso// sangs rgyas kyi dga' ston byas nas/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dad pa chen po skyes te/ rgyu de dang rkyen des de dag yongs su// 
86a5(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'daso// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ning yin te/ ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
86a6(mdo sde): gang po la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas pa des na/ ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa nyamasu myong ste/ de nyid kyi rgyus da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na yang nga la tshong dpon
86a7(mdo sde): dang / brgya byin gyis 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byaso// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa le bkur bsti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mo bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// 
86a8(mdo sde): ston pa la bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ brten te gnas par bya'o// zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
86b1(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gang po la sogs pa rtogs parjod pa las sdom gyi
86b2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa rdzogas+ho// / sdom ni tsan den dang ni pad+ma dang / de bzhin 'khor lo mgo bcu pa// mdog 'jam dang ni 'od bsil dang // mnyen
86b3(mdo sde): pa dang ni spos ngad ldang // dri med gdangs snyan zhes bya ba// sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin// tsan dan zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
86b4(mdo sde): bo rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mo rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams
86b5(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod/ 
86b6(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
86b7(mdo sde): 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan po/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / skyon gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
86b8(mdo sde): dang bcas pa/ yul ma ga d+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ gaN+DI klung gi 'gram du byon to// de'i tshig d+hA'i klung gi 'gram nas thag mi ring ba zhig na mchod rten zhig ra
87a1(mdo sde): / du gyur pa/ rlung dang 'i mtshan gyis pashig bzhig 'dug pa de dag dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das sa nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das / 
87a2(mdo sde): rten 'di su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas tsan dan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste der yin no// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
87a3(mdo sde): 'das rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ga les byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas tsan dad ga
87a4(mdo sde): byung ba dang / ming ci las btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lag/ so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par radu
87a5(mdo sde): nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA ra na sin/ rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po
87a6(mdo sde): byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'bab pa zhi pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 
87a7(mdo sde): nang 'khrugs dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug go// rgyal po de yang
87a8(mdo sde): chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do// de bu med nas bu 'dod de/ gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / 
87b1(mdo sde): lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i khwa
87b2(mdo sde): dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos 'thun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'deb so// 'jig rten
87b3(mdo sde): na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skyes par 'gyuraro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba gtab pa'i rgyus bu dang
87b4(mdo sde): bu mo skyed par 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur pa'i rig so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu
87b5(mdo sde): drang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na// pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa
87b6(mdo sde): ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la de'i bskyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po zhig yod pa de'i
87b7(mdo sde): nang nas kyang pad+ma tshad las 'das par che ba zhig skyes te/ de nyid ni cig bzhin du cher skye la/ kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas rgyal po la
87b8(mdo sde): gsol to// de nas rgyal pos kyang pad+ma de legs bor srangs shig ces bsgo'o// phyis re shig na nyi ma 'char kar pad+ma de kha bye nas/ pad+ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang
88a1(mdo sde): / zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can man zong gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ pral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sna mtho gasna/ 
88a2(mdo sde): legs pa/ smid pa sdug pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus legs par brgyad pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig
88a3(mdo sde): skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug ste/ de'i kha nas ni pad+ma'i dri 'byung la/ lus las ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo // de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas kyang rgyal po la gsol
88a4(mdo sde): to// de nas rgyal po blon po dang / btsun mo dang bcas pa/ bskyed mos tshal du dong nas/ khye'u des mthong ma thag tu rgyal po la smras pa/ yangab tshur gshegs b+ha dag ni khyod sras mi mnga'
88a5(mdo sde): ba'i sras lags so// de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs nas/ smras pa/ bu de ni khyod ji skad zer ba babazhin no// de nas rgyal po rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas
88a6(mdo sde): pad+ma'i snying po las khye'u blangs te/ lag par gzhag go// de nas khye'u des gang dang gang du rkang pa bzhag pa de dang der pad+ma dag byung ngo // de nas de'i ming tsad dani zhes btags
88a7(mdo sde): so/ gang gi tshe khye'u tsan dang khad kyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ grong khyer gyi me rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag cag gi grong khyer 'dir dus ston byung na/ lha sras can
88a8(mdo sde): dan btang ba'i rig so// 'on tang bdag cag dang lhan cig tu dus ston myong bar 'gyur la/ gnas thams cad kyang pad+mas brgyan par 'gyur lagaso// rgyal pos smras pa de ltar bya'o// 
88b1(mdo sde): de nas tsun dan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ blon po'i bu rnams kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa/ rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs byed cing / grong khyer gyi dus ston myong bar
88b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyi rol tu byung ngo // de nas de der 'gro ba na gom pa re re la pad+ma lta na sdug cing yid 'brog pa dag byung ste/ de dag nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog
88b3(mdo sde): ma thag tu rnyes shing skam mo// de nas sems can dag pa/ bsam pa dge ba/ sngon sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed skyed pa des de mthong nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa skyes
88b4(mdo sde): te/ ji ltar pad+ma 'di dag skyes pa'i mod la ni mdzes pas/ 'dug la/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdungs pas ni rnyes shing skam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lus 'od
88b5(mdo sde): yang de dang 'dra'o snyam mo// de de ltar sems shing 'jal la nye bar rtog pa na/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ des skye bo'i tshogs
88b6(mdo sde): kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so// de nas re shig na gnas gtsang ba'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de la gos tshon can dag phul te/ de dag 'ges nas na mkha' la
88b7(mdo sde): 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshegs byas nas/ de mthong bas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang bcas par dga' ba chen po thong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang
88b8(mdo sde): bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ni de las byung ste ming yang de las btag so// dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
89a1(mdo sde): zhus pa/ btsun pa rang sangs rgyas tsan dan gyis las gang dag bgyis shing bsrugs dades de'i lus kyang dri gdar la dbang po yang rno bar gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das/ 
89a2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od sru gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des der dbu skra dang sen po'i badzod rten la spos chu'i dbang bskur ba yang phul/ me tog dag kyang btags te/ de
89a3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam yang bsgom so// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mo bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// ston pa la
89a4(mdo sde): bkur bsti byas// bla bar byas/ ri mo byas/ padad pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
89a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / pad+ma zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgya
89a6(mdo sde): ngo rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpor rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams
89a7(mdo sde): dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lte 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin
89a8(mdo sde): dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nabs chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal bas dang / gzims
89b1(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas/ 
89b2(mdo sde): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhag so// de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod pa rnams kyi lugs kyis na/ kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma rnams kyis pad+ma dag blangs te/ srang du song zhing 'tshong
89b3(mdo sde): ngo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegaso// bud med zhig kyang khye'u
89b4(mdo sde): zhig bang na thogs te/ srang du seng ba las khye'u des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po
89b5(mdo sde): brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis pa rgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po/ tshe'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong / 
89b6(mdo sde): nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ glo tha ru tu lag pa brkyang nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma las pad+ma blangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la bor ro// de nas pad+ma de shing rta'i phang lo tsam du gyur
89b7(mdo sde): te/ steng gi na mkha' la 'dag nas/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/ bzhes na ni sdod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i 'od zer dag bkye nas/ 
89b8(mdo sde): des mnyan du yod pa ril gyis snang bar bya'o// rgyu des na rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di na ma sa
90a1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams
90a2(mdo sde): byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / ngu 'bod
90a3(mdo sde): dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a tsu zer dang / ud pa
90a4(mdo sde): la lta gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo// 
90a5(mdo sde): grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// de nas sems can de dag gi ga/ nod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// de nas de
90a6(mdo sde): dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprub pa 'gyed
90a7(mdo sde): bar mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byu
90a8(mdo sde): pa'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems ca
90b1(mdo sde): dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyuraro// steng du
90b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams
90b3(mdo sde): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad
90b4(mdo sde): med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang
90b5(mdo sde): 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu ma zong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas
90b6(mdo sde): mi rig pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog so// tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de// nges par 'byung ba brnam par gyis// sangs/ 
90b7(mdo sde): rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// 
90b8(mdo sde): skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
91a1(mdo sde): bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
91a2(mdo sde): kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung stod par bzhed na ni/ mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ 
91a3(mdo sde): zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyuraro// yi dag su skye bar lung stod par bzhed na ni/ zhabs
91a4(mdo sde): kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyuraro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyi su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston
91a5(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// 
91a6(mdo sde): lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyu ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu
91a7(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyuraro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar
91a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod bur mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dag
91b1(mdo sde): bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gi spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyin
91b2(mdo sde): nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// 
91b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge slong rgyal dbang nyan
91b4(mdo sde): ba som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bskul bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur bcad pa yi// 
91b5(mdo sde): mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams byin 'da' 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo bal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom
91b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhi no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcob pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med
91b7(mdo sde): rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dad pa skyes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la pad+ma 'thor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags lo// kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dge ba'i
91b8(mdo sde): rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/ bskal pa bco lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i bde ba nyam su myong nas/ rang
92a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur la/  de'i sbyid par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar
92a2(mdo sde): bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
92a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po// 
92a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / 
92a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' ldi nga rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ 
92a6(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
92a7(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes gnyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal
92a8(mdo sde): bo'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab nas ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas/ de'i chung me lang tshol bab pa de khyin
92b1(mdo sde): thab la gdung zhing yongs su yi chad la/ smre sngags 'don kyang / der khyim thab ma 'ongs nas des sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal te/ dam bcas pa gal te bdag gi khyim thab byung
92b2(mdo sde): du 'ongs na bdag gis khyod la gser gyi 'khor lo dbu lo zhes byaso// de nas de'i khyim thab rgya mtsho'i nang nas myur du phyir 'khor te/ nye zho med par bde bar 'ong so// bre nas des gser
92b3(mdo sde): gyi 'khor lo byed du bcug ste/ de 'bran po'i tshogs kyis bskor bas/ 'khor lo dang / spos dang / gdug pa dang / me tog khyer te lha khang du cha so// de'i skabasu sangs rgyas btso// 
92b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugasu mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang
92b5(mdo sde): ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhus pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zlu ma byed pa/ gnyisu mi gsung gzhi gnas dang lhag mcho
92b6(mdo sde): la gnas pa rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba rdzu 'phrul gyi
92b7(mdo sde): rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la phun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa
92b8(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu
93a1(mdo sde): gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa
93a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni
93a3(mdo sde): chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dang / su ni phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su na
93a4(mdo sde): gnod pa dang ldan// su ni phongs pa dang nyams ngag dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ suni ngan song du bab/ suni sag song nas phyung ste/ mtho ras
93a5(mdo sde): dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du byeng ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i
93a6(mdo sde): nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhag por bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongasu smin par bya/ 
93a7(mdo sde): su ni yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug/ 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ 
93a8(mdo sde): gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bu mo des nga mthong na/ rang byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// 
93b1(mdo sde): snyam du gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge
93b2(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la gshegaso// de nas bu me ngos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
93b3(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'di mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo
93b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // de nas mthong ba'i modo la dga' ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi 'khor lo dong bar byaso// de nas bran mos bkag ste/ 'di
93b5(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu ma yin zhes byas so// 'on kyang de ba/ kag bzhin du dad pa drag pos yid 'dun par gyur na/ skyes/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du gser gyi
93b6(mdo sde): 'khor lo bor ro// spos dang / gdug pa dang / me tog kyang phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang
93b7(mdo sde): gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du
93b8(mdo sde): 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / ngu 'bid dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tshabadang/ 
94a1(mdo sde): mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a cu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gA/ 
94a2(mdo sde): pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te bab po// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag
94a3(mdo sde): tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// de das de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi
94a4(mdo sde): 'phos sapa/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems
94a5(mdo sde): te kye bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag
94a6(mdo sde): gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snya mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de
94a7(mdo sde): zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba derang nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyu ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
94a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams
94b1(mdo sde): dang da tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / 
94b2(mdo sde): tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / 
94b3(mdo sde): nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// 
94b4(mdo sde): tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/ nges par byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la spyi bar gyis/ 'dab bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag
94b5(mdo sde): sde ni gzhom par gyis/ gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba ra spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// 
94b6(mdo sde): zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom
94b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logasu
94b8(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting bar
95a1(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyuraro// yi dwag su skye bar lung sdod par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bus
95a2(mdo sde): mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i
95a3(mdo sde): rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu
95a4(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang
95a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug ter du mi sdang bar 'gyur// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan
95a6(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la
95a7(mdo sde): zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis
95a8(mdo sde): pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dag thub
95b1(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ dge slong rgyal dang nyan thos som/ 
95b2(mdo sde): nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / bzang po bdag gis the tsom skyes pa bstsal bar gsol/ rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi// 
95b3(mdo sde): mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'dar 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan
95b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas
95b5(mdo sde): rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la gser gyi 'khor lo bor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong
95b6(mdo sde): lags so// kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskal pa bco lnga'i bar du log par
95b7(mdo sde): ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i bde ba nyam su myong nas/ rang sangs rgyas 'khor lo bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga'
95b8(mdo sde): bar gyur pa 'di yon no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khye
96a1(mdo sde): de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dedag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
96a2(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do// / mgo bcu pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / bo brang 'a
96a3(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams dang / tsheng dben rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sprid rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'a
96a4(mdo sde): cirnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti bya sa/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ wa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
96a5(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lte 'phye chen po rnams kyis mche da cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan gan bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzis
96a6(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyan gso so dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma ga d+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram
96a7(mdo sde): du byin to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas mchod rten rnying pa rlung dang nyi tshe ni gyis gshig pa zhig 'dug pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa
96a8(mdo sde): btsun pa mchod rten 'di su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa'i yin// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas
96b1(mdo sde): mgo bcu pa ga las byung lags// ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga las byung ba dang / 
96b2(mdo sde): ming ci las btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lag so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas
96b3(mdo sde): bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA ra na si na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa
96b4(mdo sde): dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad
96b5(mdo sde): rnams med pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug go// rgyal po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhig te
96b6(mdo sde): chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do// de nas rgyal po da bu med nas bu 'dod de/ gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par
96b7(mdo sde): gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / 
96b8(mdo sde): lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos 'thun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'deb so// 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ 
97a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni/ 'khor los sbyar
97a2(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rig so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ kham gnyis
97a3(mdo sde): 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// 
97a4(mdo sde): de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug yang / de'i skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ 'gram
97a5(mdo sde): ngang pa dang / ngur ba dang / zil mo la sogs pa bya sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad+ma tshad las 'das par che ba zhig glo
97a6(mdo sde): tor du skyes te/ de nyin cig bzhin du cher skye la/ kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i spangs mas rgyal po la gsol to// de nas rgyal pos kyang bad
97a7(mdo sde): ma de legs par srungs shig ces bsgo'o// phyis re shig na nyi ma 'char kar pad+ma de kha byi nas/ pad+ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ 
97a8(mdo sde): mdog bzang ba/ gser gyi kha dog can/ mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ 'bral ba'i dbyes cheg sna mtho ba/ sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ lus skyes
97b1(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug ste/ kun dag
97b2(mdo sde): raba'i srung mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to// de nas rgyal pos thos nas/ blon po dang / btsun mo dang bcas pa bskyed mos tshal du ding ste/ pad+ma'i snying po la de lta bur/ 
97b3(mdo sde): mdzes shing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste/ yi rangs nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas khye'u blangs te/ 
97b4(mdo sde): bkur bsti chen po dang ldan pas rang gi pho brang du khyer nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / mtshan mkhan dag la bsnyad de/ zhag 'dun gsub nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bcas stong/ 
97b5(mdo sde): rgyas par byas nas/ mgo bcu pa zhes ming ba/ tag so// de nas khye'u mgo bcu pa pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / num snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru
97b6(mdo sde): ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma me brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mang dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying ku dang / gzhan yang yo byad
97b7(mdo sde): kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur te/ khye'u de yang dad pa dang ldan pa/ bsam pa bzang zhing dge ba bdag la phan pa dang / 
97b8(mdo sde): gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod po/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig ste/ des yab rgya la sa na 'dug pa na/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / 
98a1(mdo sde): nam tho ba'i las dag byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khye'u de mi dga' nas yab la gsol pa/ yab bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung
98a2(mdo sde): bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byaso// yab kyis kyang gnang ste/ de skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos tshon can bgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // 
98a3(mdo sde): de nas des lung mnos pa med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas nas/ nam mkha' la 'phags
98a4(mdo sde): tel ba la cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// de nas yab kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la spyan drang so// de nas de'i lus thegs pas yengs smo nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna
98a5(mdo sde): tshogs bstan te/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du mya ngan la sa 'das par song ste/ de'i mchod rten 'di yin no// de na sa dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad
98a6(mdo sde): gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pas las gang dag bgyis na/ ma'i mngal du skyes te/ pad+ma las skyes lags/ bcom
98a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mgo bcu pa nyid sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgol bzhin du 'byung lo// gdon mi za bar 'ong
98a8(mdo sde): bi las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ mgo bcu pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing sa
98b1(mdo sde): ba rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang
98b2(mdo sde): mi dge ba rnams byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams
98b3(mdo sde): ni da bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa
98b4(mdo sde): gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa / bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyem bu 'dul
98b5(mdo sde): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzi/ gas shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung // de nas yang dag
98b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhug so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
98b7(mdo sde): gzigs snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhom ring byas te/ dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang / 
98b8(mdo sde): gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la gshegs so// ded dben zhig kyang pad+ma khyer te srang du zhugs so// de nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs skye skyes
99a1(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dos gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi sa
99a2(mdo sde): stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du bor te/ bor ma thag tu pad+mang
99a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du shing rta'i pang lo tsam du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/ gzhes na ni sdod do// de nas re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
99a4(mdo sde): rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis deng dpod de rang byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang / de'i skabasu de'i chung ma bu btsa' zhing
99a5(mdo sde): 'dug te/ skad ngan mthon nas/ des bran po la de ci zhig/ ces dris so// des kyang de bzhin de bsnyad do// de nas/ ded dpon de mi dga' bar gyur nas smon lam btab pa/ 
99a6(mdo sde): bdag rams kyang 'khor ba ra ma'i mngal du skye bar ma myur cig byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dporan
99a7(mdo sde): du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa de yad te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du nams kyang ma'i mngal du ma skyes la/ srid pa tha ma la yang
99a8(mdo sde): de'i 'byor ba de 'dra bar gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / ring sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de
99b1(mdo sde): ltang bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
99b2(mdo sde): mdog 'jam zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon
99b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto
99b4(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas/ mdzod pa byas te/ lnga dang / klu dang / gdod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
99b5(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod napas chen po'i dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
99b6(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / skud gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med
99b7(mdo sde): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpor phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che baM/ nor dang yo byad mang ba/ bdag dbang ba mang ba/ mdza' bo dang / 
99b8(mdo sde): blon po dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs mang ba zhig yod de/ khyim bdag de yang dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje
100a1(mdo sde): ba bdag nyid cheb/ chos 'dod bzhig go// de nas 'di snyam du sems te/ longs spyod 'di dag ni su bral bu'i rang bzhin can/ sdig phyu dang 'drag mi rtag pas
100a2(mdo sde): gan pa/ ther thug pa ma yin pa/ yang ban du mi rung ba 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mang du 'dug pa yin gyis/ bdag gis sangs rgyas
100a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus gsol la/ zhal zas bzang pos tshim par bya gor ma chagasapa po// de nas des bcom
100a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das can thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol pa dang / gdugs tsho de gsol bar spyad drang so// de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir// tsham ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
100a5(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'dun du bdang nas cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus la gshegaso// de nas
100a6(mdo sde): tshong dpon de til mar spos can khyer te bsro gang du song nas/ bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas gang
100a7(mdo sde): gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol zin pa de'i tshe/ khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la rang gi
100a8(mdo sde): lag nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstab so// rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang mi bzang po rnam grangs dus
100b1(mdo sde): tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/ gsang sder ni gyu/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dpa' ba zhig khyer te/ 
100b2(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar 'dug nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan// yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ 
100b3(mdo sde): yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad// chos kyi gdam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzings
100b4(mdo sde): bstod// yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsu nga bar bzhug so// de nas tshong dpon de dad pa rnyed nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcas pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
100b5(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sems la rdzas par byaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dzub pa ma dzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
100b6(mdo sde): gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng
100b7(mdo sde): du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'jom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu
100b8(mdo sde): ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams so thabs dang / kyi hud zer dang / a cu zer dang / ud pa la lta gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / 
101a1(mdo sde): / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de
101a2(mdo sde): dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// des na sems can de dag gis gnodod pa'i khyad par rnams rtsa zhil bar 'gyur ro// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos
101a3(mdo sde): sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam sA mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 
101a4(mdo sde): kye bdag cag ni 'di kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'dir mthus/ bdag cag gi gdod pa'i khyad
101a5(mdo sde): par rnams rtse zil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang
101a6(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyu ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa
101a7(mdo sde): gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun na
101a8(mdo sde): 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas
101b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi cha rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 
101b2(mdo sde): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgog so// tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam/ 
101b3(mdo sde): bar gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ bag yod spyod/ 
101b4(mdo sde): par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
101b5(mdo sde): gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin/ nye 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i la sa lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
101b6(mdo sde): snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyuraro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs
101b7(mdo sde): kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi snying bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro// yi dwag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi the bar mi
101b8(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyu ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyi su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phag g.yon pa'i mthil
102a1(mdo sde): du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par band na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung
102a2(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par
102a3(mdo sde): bzhed da ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyuraro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar
102a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'ad sa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldana'adas kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod bur mi snang bar gyur to// 
102a5(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// 
102a6(mdo sde): de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa
102a7(mdo sde): yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dang mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan po nyid kyis
102a8(mdo sde): blo yis dus bab mkhyer lags na// dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brten pa dang / bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal
102b1(mdo sde): bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod la
102b2(mdo sde): skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
102b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgya med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong
102b4(mdo sde): lag so// kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / smin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas mdog 'jam zhes bya bar 'gyur
102b5(mdo sde): ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang ngal sems dag/ 'bar gyur pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs
102b6(mdo sde): rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkar bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom
102b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'od bsil zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
102b8(mdo sde): rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / 
103a1(mdo sde): mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu/ 
103a2(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen
103a3(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / spun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ 
103a4(mdo sde): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ khyim bdag phyag cing nor mang la longs spyod cha ba/ 
103a5(mdo sde): yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'o/ nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/ de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsapa
103a6(mdo sde): ba bzang la bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig go// de nas 'di snyam du sems
103a7(mdo sde): te/ longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ glang po che'i rna ba ltar g.yo ba/ brtan pa/ ther zug pa ma yin pa/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod
103a8(mdo sde): pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis/ bdag gis longs spyod snying po med pa las snying po blang bar bya gor ma chags snyam mo// des sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/ bcom
103b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/ khyim yang rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas te/ tsan dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab// 
103b2(mdo sde): spos sna tshogs kyi snod ni dkram/ dri zhim po'i bdug pas ni bdogs/ me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/ me tog gi gdan rnams ni bshams so// de nas khu ba bsil ba
103b3(mdo sde): btung po rnams dang / khu ba dang / bshos rnams sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/ btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste/ bshos
103b4(mdo sde): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te/ gshegasu gsol zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dri sham thabs dang chos gos
103b5(mdo sde): gsol to// lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshe/ gas kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/ khyim bdag de'i khyim gal
103b6(mdo sde): ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhug so// de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde ba
103b7(mdo sde): bzhugs par rig nas/ rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa blta ba so// rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang
103b8(mdo sde): ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/ gsang sder ni gyu/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan
104a1(mdo sde): ches mnga' ba zhig khyer te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos kyi
104a2(mdo sde): gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas
104a3(mdo sde): yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhug so// de nas khyim bdag de dad pa rnyed nas/ bcom
104a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ sems la rtas par byaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa ma do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
104a5(mdo sde): gang gi tshe 'dzum par mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dang bo dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og
104a6(mdo sde): tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod
104a7(mdo sde): chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu buro rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kye hud zer dang / a cu zer dang / ud pa la
104a8(mdo sde): ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab po// grang ba'i
104b1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur te/ de nas de dag 'di snyam du
104b2(mdo sde): sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed
104b3(mdo sde): par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par mi gyur la/ gzhan yang me skyes mod kyi 'on kyang
104b4(mdo sde): sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cagr-i gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par
104b5(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong ba/ ra 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du 'den pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur
104b6(mdo sde): ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur to// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / 
104b7(mdo sde): dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen
104b8(mdo sde): po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dag rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med
105a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi cha rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu
105a2(mdo sde): mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs// tshig su bcad pa gnyis
105a3(mdo sde): kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsams par gyis// sangs rgyas bsten la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom
105a4(mdo sde): par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes rjod par
105a5(mdo sde): byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gos stong gsum gyi chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bco ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi tho zhin 'brangaste/ gal te bcom
105a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'das pa las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun log su
105a7(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting
105a8(mdo sde): bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro// yi dag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyuraro// mor skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyi su mi snang
105b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
105b2(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro// nyan thos kyi byang chub
105b3(mdo sde): tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mchims kyi mdzod bur mi snang bar 'gyur
105b4(mdo sde): robla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom
105b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal
105b6(mdo sde): mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la nus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ 
105b7(mdo sde): nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur/ 
105b8(mdo sde): gyur pa// rgyal ba dag thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ pad+ma'i rtsa dang dang mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ dge slong
106a1(mdo sde): rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang pos dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar
106a2(mdo sde): gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyen du 'dzum mi ston/ gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ de ni khyod
106a3(mdo sde): las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dag
106a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'das nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas
106a5(mdo sde): ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lag so// kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems pa skyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong
106a6(mdo sde): 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas 'od bsal zhes bya bar 'gyuraro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang ngal sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par
106a7(mdo sde): bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
106a8(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
106b1(mdo sde): 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams/ 
106b2(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla
106b3(mdo sde): mer byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
106b4(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa sod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / spun
106b5(mdo sde): gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma ga d+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las kang+gA'i klung gyi 'gram du
106b6(mdo sde): byon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mngan du bdar nas/ mnyan pa rnams ga la der gshegs te byon nas/ mnyan pa
106b7(mdo sde): rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye chu klung 'di las nga sgrol cig/ mnyan pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ gre btsas stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag la
106b8(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga yang sngon mnyan pa byed byed de/ ngas dga' bo ni 'dod chags kyi chu klung du ltung ba las bsgral/ sor 'phreng ni zhe sdang gi rgya mtshor ltung ba las bsgral// 
107a1(mdo sde): / bram ze'i bu nga rgyal gyis khengs pa ni/ nga rgyal gyi mtshor ltung ba las bsgral/ ldeng rgyas 'od srung ni gti mug gi rgya mtshor ltung ba las bsgral te/ 'on kyang
107a2(mdo sde): sa gru bcas ma blang so// de skad ces bka' stsal kyang bsgral bar khas ma blangs// de nas mnyan pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yang thos/ 
107a3(mdo sde): zugs phun sum tshogs pa de yang mthong nas dad pa skyes te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bsgral bar 'tshalo zhes gsol to// de nas
107a4(mdo sde): dge slong rnams grur zhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan pa de bas kyang ches sngar pha rol gyi 'gram du zhugs par gyur to// de nas mnyan
107a5(mdo sde): pa des rdzu 'phral de ma thong nas/ sems dga' bar gyur te zhabs la phag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur
107a6(mdo sde): bde lta bu'i chos bstan te/ mnyan pa des de thos 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
107a7(mdo sde): byas so// des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i ril
107a8(mdo sde): bskal pa dang / ngan song gi sgo thams cad bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma
107a9(mdo sde): bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyangs bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshon rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis
107b1(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so// yang gsol pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyis mthu yis ba
107b2(mdo sde): bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thog/ 
107b3(mdo sde): bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lngas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa
107b4(mdo sde): stong du mthong bar dka' ba las// thub pa khyod ni dang mthong 'bras bu yod// de'i nang nas mnyan pa cig cig 'gyod pa chen po skyes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
107b5(mdo sde): 'tshal te nyes pa bshags nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni
107b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha
107b7(mdo sde): cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'jom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod
107b8(mdo sde): chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyai hud zer dang / a tsu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / 
108a1(mdo sde): pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma lta rags pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo// grang ba'i
108a2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal pa gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyuraro// de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 
108a3(mdo sde): kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snya mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag
108a4(mdo sde): gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci ba dog cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par mi gyur la/ ga zhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i
108a5(mdo sde): sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod ba'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar
108a6(mdo sde): gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der zhing mtshams 'dzin par
108a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dag
108a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / 
108b1(mdo sde): tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang // 
108b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag
108b3(mdo sde): ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog so// tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas
108b4(mdo sde): bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyong par byed pa ni// skye ba'i
108b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byu ba su zhes rjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
108b6(mdo sde): bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snab logasu mi snang bar
108b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyuraro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang
108b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi snying bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro// yi dog su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur
109a1(mdo sde): mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyi su mi snang bar 'gyuraro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon
109a2(mdo sde): pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ 
109a3(mdo sde): lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin
109a4(mdo sde): mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// de nas 'o// 
109a5(mdo sde): zer de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum pa skor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi/ mdzod bur mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang
109a6(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams
109a7(mdo sde): kun tu snang bar bgyis/ nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro/ 
109a8(mdo sde): ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lnga bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen/ 
109b1(mdo sde): lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar
109b2(mdo sde): gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin du 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni
109b3(mdo sde): khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa
109b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na/ dmas ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun draga' bo mnyan pa 'dis nga la sems dga' ba bskyed
109b5(mdo sde): pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lag so// kun dag po mnyan pa 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa/ sbyi/ par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/ ma 'ongs
109b6(mdo sde): pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba rgal ces bya bar 'gyuraro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dang par byas pa 'di yin no// dge sbyong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab
109b7(mdo sde): par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
109b8(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
110a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blo chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang khror gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / 
110a2(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas
110a3(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ ri ma byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing
110a4(mdo sde): shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod na mas chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdon dang / snyun gsos dang / sman
110a5(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang ba ces pa rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhug so// de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod
110a6(mdo sde): pa'i yul mi rnams kyi lugs kyis na/ phal tsher byug pa sna tshogs kyis lus bskrad par byed// de nas re shig na khyim bdag gi bu zhig yod pa de'i bran mo dad pa dang ldan pa la/ dge
110a7(mdo sde): zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de tsan dan dmar po 'dar zhing 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong
110a8(mdo sde): gi tshogs kyi zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la gshegaso// de nas bu mo dos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes
110b1(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag
110b2(mdo sde): ba'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bu mo de dang pa chen po skyeso// de nas de dad pa rnyed nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis
110b3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i zhing rnyed kyang dbul ba'i nyes pas/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti byed mi nus na/ bdag gis 'tshe ba 'di 'dra ba ci dgos snyam mo// de nas des rang gi srog la
110b4(mdo sde): yang ma bltas te/ lag pa gnyi ga tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la bskus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis/ 
110b5(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer ril gyis tsan dan gyi dris/ gang bar mdzad// de nas bu mo des cho 'phrul de mthong na/ nyes/ sems dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
110b6(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal nas/ sems la ltas par byas te/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
110b7(mdo sde): mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos
110b8(mdo sde): nyid do// de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni stang du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa
111a1(mdo sde): de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdang 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med/ 
111a2(mdo sde): ba dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a cu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por
111a3(mdo sde): song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab po// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// des na sems
111a4(mdo sde): can de ngag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse shil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du
111a5(mdo sde): skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dang pa bskyen pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad do// de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 
111a6(mdo sde): kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gis gnod pa'i
111a7(mdo sde): khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha
111a8(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyu ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / 
111b1(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang
111b2(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang // dag
111b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams
111b4(mdo sde): dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lnga rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog so// tshigs su
111b5(mdo sde): bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par/ 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bsten la spyod/ bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi
111b6(mdo sde): bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye bo'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur
111b7(mdo sde): zhes rjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom
111b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logasu mi snang bar 'gyuraro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun
112a1(mdo sde): logs su mi snang bar 'gyuraro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung / 
112a2(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dwag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyuraro// mir skye bar lung stod
112a3(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyi su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar
112a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung sdod par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung spen bar bzhed na ni/ lte ba
112a5(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyuraro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni
