168b3(mdo sde): yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
168b4(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan
168b5(mdo sde): pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdon dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos/ kyi dge dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na
168b6(mdo sde): 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten ci bzhugaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po snga gro bsham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te
168b7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas te/ zan zos nas zas phyis len pa spangs te/ 
168b8(mdo sde): lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der song ste byin nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzegs te/ nyin par gnas pa'i phyir/ shing zhig gi drung
169a1(mdo sde): du rten cing 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo 'u dgal gyi bu chen pos yi dwags mo sdong dus me reg ma 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi sras yog ga lto ni
169a2(mdo sde): ri tsam la kha ri khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu tus te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / 
169a3(mdo sde): mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba phyi sa bzhin du dri nga zhing mchog tu dring ba zal de yang bde blag du mi rnyed pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang
169a4(mdo sde): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ yi drags po la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon sdig pa ci zhig byas na/ nges 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu myong zhing 'dug/ yi
169a5(mdo sde): drags mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bdag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi
169a6(mdo sde): rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la bde
169a7(mdo sde): song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan cog ston te/ 
169a8(mdo sde): brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan cog nyan par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsu
169b1(mdo sde): ba snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog 'ongs pa leg so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo ru dgal gyi bul 'di skad ces bka/ 
169b2(mdo sde): stsal to// mo'u dgal gyi bu tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa leg so// khyod da bzod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u dgal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi/ 
169b3(mdo sde): mchi ba las der bdag gis yi dwags mo sdom dum me reg ma 'dral cer bur mchis shing rang gi skras yog pa/ lho ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rib tu 'bar
169b4(mdo sde): la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag laM/ mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba
169b5(mdo sde): myong ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang / khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i/ tshe de'i steng du me stag 'pho ba'i mdag ma'i char
169b6(mdo sde): 'bab pa dang / phyi sa bzhin dri nga zhing mchog tu dring ba/ zas su phyi sa za ba 'tshal la/ de yang bde blag du mi rnyed pa zhig mthong lags so// yang gsol ba/ nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par
169b7(mdo sde): byed/ sdug bsngal tsher ba nyamasu myong // gang na phyi sa'i gnas yod pa// der ni sdug bzhin rgyug par bgyid// phyi sa bza' 'am btung snyam na// de yang bde blag rnyed mi 'gyur// 
169b8(mdo sde): de yis mi yi 'jig rten du// sdig pa rab 'jigs ci bgyis na// des na sdig pa 'di 'dra ba// 'jig su rung ba nyams myong // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi/ 
170a1(mdo sde): bu yi drags mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lag so// mo'u dgal gyi bu 'o na legs/ 
170a2(mdo sde): par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// mo'u dgal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA ra na si na rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa la snying brtse ba
170a3(mdo sde): bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba zhig yod la/ de yang nad bu can zhig ste/ bA ra na ser bsod snyoms la song ngo // re shig na de la sman pas 'thun pa'i zas bstan nas/ de tshong
170a4(mdo sde): dpon zhig ga la 'dug pa der song ba dang / ded dpon des kyang mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod ci bzhed/ des smras pa/ 'thun pa'i kha zas 'dod do// de nas tshong dpon des
170a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa la kha zas 'thun pa phul cig mna' ma la bsgo'o// de nas de'i mna' ma ser sna skyes te/ gal te/ bdag gis deng 'di la kha zas byin du zin na/ sang
170a6(mdo sde): yang 'ong bar 'gyur snyam nas/ phyogs pa/ cig tu song ste/ lhung bzed phyi sas bkang nas/ steng 'bras can gyis bkab ste/ rang sangs rgyas de la bu'o// 
170a7(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du shes pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug ste/ des blangaso// blangs nas tsher te/ 'di dring ba las na 'dis phyi gas bkang go// 
170a8(mdo sde): ma chag go snga mo// de nas bdag nyid chen po des de gzhig tu bor nas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bo'u dgal gyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i
170b1(mdo sde): dus na/ tshong dpon gyi mnar mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dwags mo 'di yin te/ des sdig pa'i las de lta bu byas nas/ de byin chad rtag tu sems can dpal ba dang / 
170b2(mdo sde): dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnamasu skyes te/ rtag tu zasu byi za bar gyur to// mo'u dgal gyi bu de bas na ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ ci nas yi dwags mo 'di nyes pa de
170b3(mdo sde): lta bu dag 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi
170b4(mdo sde): bu dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs dpa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
170b5(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / mo'u dgal gyi bu zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
170b6(mdo sde): be rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams
170b7(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas
170b8(mdo sde): te lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
171a1(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
171a2(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhagaso// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi ni pha rol/ 'od ma'i tshal gyi ni tshu rol de'i bar
171a3(mdo sde): skabs na/ yi dgas sdong dam pa reg ma 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi sgras yog pa/ lho ri ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu
171a4(mdo sde): rab tu 'bar ste/ me lci gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyi ma thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor
171a5(mdo sde): ba 'amasu myong ba lnga brgya kha khrus lding ba bzhin du nam kha' la 'khor te/ gang du yang 'dug sa mi rnyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu snga dro sham thabs
171a6(mdo sde): dang / chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la seng ba dang / des yi dgas de dag mthong ngo // yi dwags de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa
171a7(mdo sde): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mthong ngo // de nas de dag gcig tu 'dril nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i thad de dong ste/ phyi nas snying rje rje skad zer zhing sngag sdug/ zer la gti zhing
171a8(mdo sde): smra bas tshig 'thun par smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu bdag cag ni rgyal po'i khab tu tshong dpon lnga brgyar gyur te/ bdag cag ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams la kun
171b1(mdo sde): tu 'dzin par gyur nas/ bdag cag nyid kyis kyang sbyin pa ma byin la/ gzhan dag sbyin pa byed pa la yang bgegs byaso// sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la yang yi dwags kyi tshig
171b2(mdo sde): lta bus mang du spros te/ khyod ni yi dwag su skyes pa bzhin du gzhan gyi khyim phyi nyug pa'o zhes paso// des na bdag cag shi ba'i 'og tu 'di lta bu'i yi dwags su skyes so// 
171b3(mdo sde): btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bas na/ bdag cag gi nye du rgyal po'i kha ba na gnas pa de dag la bdag cag gi las kyi rnam pa shes par mdzod la dad pa dris te/ 
171b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas/ bdag cag gi slad du yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig/ 'on tang bdag cag yi dgas
171b5(mdo sde): kyi skye gnas nas thar kyang srid do zhes gsungs shig// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bus kyang yi drag/ nyes rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangaso// de nas/ 
171b6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bus de dag gi nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas phyid nyid sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangaso// 
171b7(mdo sde): yi dwags rnams la yang sbran te/ sang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs kyis khyed kyang der sheg shig ces byas so// de dag
171b8(mdo sde): gi nye du rnams la yang khyed kyang sheg shig dang / nye du'i mchod ston byed pa der yi dwags de dag mthong bar 'gyu ro zhes byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu/ 
172a1(mdo sde): nying mchod ston gyi zhal 'byed pa la zhug so// de nas nas nangs nas zhal zas bshams te/ gdugs tshod la bab na yi dwags de dag mi snang ngo // 
172a2(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos lnga'i mig gis yi dwags de dag bsams na/ yul ma gang+gA thog tag na yang mi snang la/ mthar gyis gling bzhi'i bar du bltas
172a3(mdo sde): na yang de na yang mi snang ngo // de nas ji srid du de'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa de srid du bltas kyang de na yang mi sdang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po mi dga'
172a4(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sbyin bdag de rnams mi gda' lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo 'dug pa
172a5(mdo sde): gyi bu thong la/ khyod mi dgar ma byed cig/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag yod de/ de dag tu
172a6(mdo sde): las kyi rlung gis 'phangs mod kyi/ 'on kyang mo'u dag la gyi bu deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la ltos shig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mngon par
172a7(mdo sde): bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba yang bstan gyis 'ag N+De brdungs shig/ de nas 'ag N+DI brdungs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyang 'dus/ 
172a8(mdo sde): yi dgas kyi nye du rnams dang yi dwags mthong bar 'dod pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang lteng mo la lpags te 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas yi dwags rnams kyis
172b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag gi phyir nye du rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sog
172b2(mdo sde): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos gsol zhing 'khod do snyam du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan lag
172b3(mdo sde): lnga dang ldan pas yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang // de ni yi dwags phyi bzhin sngo// yi dwags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de dag myur du
172b4(mdo sde): thar gyur cig ces gsungaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten te/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan tre/ de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas
172b5(mdo sde): ser sna'i dri ma spangs te/ bden par mthong bar gyur to// yi dwags de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
172b6(mdo sde): bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes las
172b7(mdo sde): gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas yi dwags las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis
172b8(mdo sde): mthong ngo // de nas sngon yi dag su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon te bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag ga cha ma yin gyis// bdag
173a1(mdo sde): cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo// de nas sngon yi dag su gyur pa'i lha'i bu na cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs
173a2(mdo sde): ba/ lus do shal dang se mo nges brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / s+thi ka la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams
173a3(mdo sde): kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lnga'i me tog ud pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la nai da ka gnas pa
173a4(mdo sde): khor khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcoM ma ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas ba
173a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dag su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnam sa kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ 
173a6(mdo sde): de thos nas sngon yi dwag su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis khyad par chen po thob bo// de dag tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa bzhin du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
173a7(mdo sde): byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// dar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ modzu gal gyi bu khyod kyis mi dwags mang po dag
173a8(mdo sde): nang du gong nas de dag kying ma dang bum pa'i bang du 'ongs te/ de dag la ngas chol brtan nas/ de dgags nad par bya ba rnyed de mtho bar 'gyur ba rnyad nas dong bdon byed ces zhas sa
173b1(mdo sde): ba 'bras bu yod par gyur te/ legs so leg so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de dag gi nye du rnams la sang shes par byas te/ de dag gis thos nas
173b2(mdo sde): mchog tu ma mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas bkur bsti byas so// mo'u dgal gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis tsa nas yi dwags de dag / 
173b3(mdo sde): nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spong ba la brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po
173b4(mdo sde): dang lha dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding de 8/ mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsu
173b5(mdo sde): ba la mngon par bstod do// chu smad zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams
173b6(mdo sde): dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / chos rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' ldib
173b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha mayin
173b8(mdo sde): dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / 
174a1(mdo sde): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zo rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od
174a2(mdo sde): ma'i tshal bya ka lan nga ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhug so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing ner mngal longs sbed che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing
174a3(mdo sde): rgya che ba/ rnam zas kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing 'gar
174a4(mdo sde): la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dab dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste khye'u zhig btsas nas de
174a5(mdo sde): bcas pa'i bcos ston byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji snyed bdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rgyu skar du smad la btsas pas na/ 
174a6(mdo sde): de'i phyir ming chu smad ces bdag so zhes zer nas/ de'i ming chu smad ces btog so// de nas khye'u chu smad bskyed bsings te cher skyes nas/ de'i ba shi ba dang / rang gi khyim gyi/ 
174a7(mdo sde): bdag por gyur to// de nas des chang dus bkras nas ma chod byed cing mchotshong kyis 'tsho bar byed pa la sa rdo chen cig bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyi bang du song ste/ nges bcom ldan
174a8(mdo sde): 'das mang ba dang / dpapa' tsham thas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dang pa dri gyur napa/ de rag tu 'byung ba'i sems skyes te/ das pas gsas pas pa gtsun
174b1(mdo sde): bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig/ de nas de'i mas smras pa/ bu khyod na bu gcig pa yin gyis/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i ba
174b2(mdo sde): du rab tu ma 'byung shig/ bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ci bya ba byos shig ces ze ro// chu smang des kyang ci skyed pa de dag thams cad ma la byin te/ yum 'dis dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / 
174b3(mdo sde): sdug cing phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gyis shig ces byaso// de'i ma de rkam chags can 'jungs pa yo byas rnams kun tu 'dzin pa zhig ste/ kar sha pA
174b4(mdo sde): ni de dag sbas nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag zas 'dod de/ khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rgya zhing khyed ni/ yi dgas su skyes pa bzhin du khyim pa nyug ci
174b5(mdo sde): slong ngo zhes zer ro// bu de la yang smra bar byed de bdag gis nyin cig bzhin du/ dge slong 'di snyed 'di snyed cig pa zan byin no zhes zer ro// phyis re shig ni da shi ba dang / 
174b6(mdo sde): de yi dwags su skyes nas/ bu chu smad ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan byed de/ sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des
174b7(mdo sde): brtson pa dang bslab pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba
174b8(mdo sde): dang / rnam par 'thong ba dang / rnam par 'jigs pa'i chos can yin par chad tshad de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ \u0f7f/ 
175a1(mdo sde): bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang / 
175a2(mdo sde): ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid
175a3(mdo sde): pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkar bsti la mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyi mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su
175a4(mdo sde): gyur nas/ des chu klung gang+gA'i 'gram du lo ma'i spyil po byas te/ bsam gtan byed do// de'i ma yi dwags kyi 'dzi ga rten du skyes pa de yang sdong dam me reg ma 'dral
175a5(mdo sde): gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi sgras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing
175a6(mdo sde): nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyi thad du song nas/ re shig na tshe dang ldan pa chu slad kyis yi dwags mo de mthong nas dris pa/ 'di kho na 'dra ba khyod su zhig/ yi
175a7(mdo sde): dgas mes smras pa/ bu cig gang las bcas pa yi// byams pa'i ma ni bdag yin te/ zas dang snyoms dang bral ba yi// yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skyes// bdag ni shi
175a8(mdo sde): ba'i dus 'das nas/ lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon te// chu yi bag kyang ma mthong na// kha zas lta zhig ga la mthong // 'bras bu ldan pa'i shing rnams kyi// drang song de dag 'dras
175b1(mdo sde): med 'gyur// gang ba'i mtsho 'gram bdag song yang // de dag kyang ni skam par 'gyur// btsun pa'i shi drung bde ba lags// khyod kyi snod nang chulang bsil// bkren pa/ 
175b2(mdo sde): bdag la thugs rje skyed// skom gyis gdungs kyis chab stsol cig/ de nas chu smad kyis ma la smras pa/ yum khyod mir gyur pa'i tshe/ bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod
175b3(mdo sde): nams dag byed du ma cug gam/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu cig bdag ni ser snas non pas sbyin pa dag kyang ma byin bsod nams dag kyang ma byas te/ nor rnyed pa de
175b4(mdo sde): dag thams cad sdig pa'i sems kyis dong du sba so// bu cig de bas na dad pa dris la bdag gi phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas yon
175b5(mdo sde): gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig/ 'on dang bdag yid// gas kyi skye gnas nas thar kyang srid do// chu smad kyis smras pa/ de ltar bgyis khyod kyang bral dpon rgya
175b6(mdo sde): mdun du 'dug shig/ yi dwags mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni gcer bur 'dag pas ngo tsha ste ngo mi thub bo// chu slad kyis smras pa/ yul khyod gang gi tshe sdig pa
175b7(mdo sde): byed pa de'i tshe ngo mi tsha na/ da ltar 'bras bu myong ba'i tshe ci'i phyir ngo tsha/ yi dwags mos smras pa/ 'o na de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o// de nas chu smad kyis nye du rnams kyi khyim
175b8(mdo sde): khyim du dad pa dris nas/ pyid nyin sangs rgyas la sogs po dge slong gi dge 'dun pa shos la spyan drangs nas/ gdugs tshod la bab pa ni/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
176a1(mdo sde): maM drags mo de mthong ngo // de dag gis yaM dwags mi de lus mi sdug pa mthing nas/ shin tu skye bskris nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dgu' bar gyur to// 
176a2(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ yi dwags mo'i phyir yon gyi rabs
176a3(mdo sde): gdon par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang / 
176a4(mdo sde): de ni yi dwags phyi bzhin song // yi dwags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de ni myur du thar gyur cig ces gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi
176a5(mdo sde): de las brten nas yi dwags mo de dang / skye bo mang po la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ srog chags 'bum phrag du mas de thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to// yid/ 
176a6(mdo sde): me de yang sems dga' bar 'gyur// shenas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mo skyes so// tshe dang ldan pargya ska kyis yang mi dgas rdzu phrum chen me skyes pa
176a7(mdo sde): shes so// de mas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis smras pa/ yus da ni mthu med kyis sbyin pa yong su btang ba dag kyis shig/ yi dwags rdzu 'phrul che rna mos smras pa/ hU~M ga
176b1(mdo sde): bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' ba med de mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen mo la smras pa/ chags pa'i mun pas mig ni rab bsgribs te/ 
176b2(mdo sde): khyod kyis yi dgas 'jig rten bsgrubs pa yi// khyod kyi rus bu chen po sha med pa// rus bai lpags pa spyi rnams da dung 'dug/ ces byas// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu sprang/ 
176b3(mdo sde): kyis lan mang du spyos te smras nas/ de'i tshe 'og tu de las ras zung cig thob bo// de nas chu smad kyis dge 'dun la phul nas/ gang gis dge 'dun la ras zung cig/ 
176b4(mdo sde): bo nyos pa'i dge slong des gos kyis gdang la bzhag go// de nas yi dwags mo de mtshan mo 'ongs nas brkus so// de nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la bsnyad
176b5(mdo sde): nas/ chu smang song ste yi dwags mo spyos nas phyir ba kug ste byin no// de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar dud/ ge slong de las brkus nas/ tshe dang ldan pa chu
176b6(mdo sde): smad kyis phyir bkug ste byin pa dang / dge slong des kyang de gshegs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stan la klan to// de nas de byin ched ma
176b7(mdo sde): brkus so// de bas na sems can rnams la de ltar ser sna 'tho 'tsham par byed pa mthong nas/ ci nas yi dwags mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar
176b8(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / 
177a1(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lte 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi 'angs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
177a2(mdo sde): dmus long zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / 
177a3(mdo sde): tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am/ 
177a4(mdo sde): ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bgrar bsti byas/ bla mer byas/ ri mo byas/ mchong ba byas te/ lU dang / klu dang / gnang sbyin dge lnga ma yin dang / 
177a5(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mau 'am ci dang / lto 'phye/ chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyanyes bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan
177a6(mdo sde): ba na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyen
177a7(mdo sde): du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed snga dro sham thabs dang / chos
177a8(mdo sde): gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo // mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te/ zas byis len pa snga
177b1(mdo sde): nas/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos bzhag yi dwags kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba las tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis yi dwags mo sdong dus me reg ma 'dra la/ dmus
177b2(mdo sde): long du 'dug pa rang gi skras yog pa/ lto no ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dud khrod bzhin du dri nga ba kha dang bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor nas/ phyogs
177b3(mdo sde): nas sha bcad cing bcad cing za ba dang / de gnang la bab ste/ dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsdu ba drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong
177b4(mdo sde): ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang // ldan pa dga' byed mi dga' bar gyur nas dris po/ sringamo khyod kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas nas/ des
177b5(mdo sde): lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhig 'dug/ yi dwags mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi
177b6(mdo sde): rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe
177b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan cog ston to// 'khor brgya phrag du ma yA
177b8(mdo sde): dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ga snyan pa gsung
178a1(mdo sde): ba/ tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsungs pa sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga'
178a2(mdo sde): byed tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa leg so// khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ dga' byed kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas rgyu ba'i nang nas mchis te/ der bdag gis
178a3(mdo sde): yi dgas mo sdong dam me reg ma 'dra la/ dmus long da mchis pa/ rang gi skas yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dar khrod bzhin du dri nga ba/ khA dang / ba rgod
178a4(mdo sde): dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor nas/ phyogs kan nas sha bkum zhing bkum zhing 'tshal ba dang / de gnad la bab ste/ dkos thag nas nyam thug pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug
178a5(mdo sde): bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lag so// yang gsol pa/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/ 
178a6(mdo sde): mchu dang rkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug/ rang gi sras ni gdong yog cer bar mchis/ mchu sgo pra khab mig 'ang rab tu rnyed// de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa// rus pa'i 'phru
178a7(mdo sde): 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin// thod pa thobs shing mi bzad la/ ngu zhing kun tu rgyugs par bgyid// bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis// dab cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen// 2ma
178a8(mdo sde): thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyam su myong // de yis mi yi 'jig rten du// rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na// des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba// 'jigs su/ 
178b1(mdo sde): rung myong bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' byed yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dag/ btsun
178b2(mdo sde): pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// dga' byed 'on legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// dga' byed sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di
178b3(mdo sde): nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
178b4(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong
178b5(mdo sde): khyer bA ra na sa na drang srong spa ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so// de nas grong khyer bA ra na si der/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'dug pa de chos 'dod de/ des chos thos
178b6(mdo sde): nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan da lta bar gyur te/ nges pa ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de nas
178b7(mdo sde): de'i phyir nye du rnams kyis dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nas de de na slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig tu gnas pa las re shig na des bge med pa'i yang
178b8(mdo sde): gis bslab pa'i gzhi la lhod par bya'o// de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis tshul khrims 'chal pa'i phyir bskrad do// de nas des sbyin bdag khyim bdag rnams dad pas nges par 'bul ba
179a1(mdo sde): yang gcod du bcug/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang min/ 
179a2(mdo sde): pa de dag mthong na yang mig btsums te 'dug go/ dga' byed ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni yi dwags mo 'di yin te/ des gtsug lag khang la ser
179a3(mdo sde): sna byas pa des ni yi dwags su skyeso// des nor ma bcad pa des ni khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor to// de slob pa dang mi slob pa dge slong rnams kyi bsngags
179a4(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa brjed pas na de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to// dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams mthong na/ mig btsums pas ni dmus long du gyur to// dga' byed de ltaran
179a5(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag par 'gyuraro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa ya
179a6(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyu ro// dga' byed de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang
179a7(mdo sde): 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la btad par bya ste/ dga' byed khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
179a8(mdo sde): bstan pa na/ sreg chags sa yas bden pa mthong bar gyur to// der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyo/ 
179b1(mdo sde): pa'i nyes dmigs de dag dang gzhan dag kyang rtogs nas ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// 
179b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag/ 
179b3(mdo sde): kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang
179b4(mdo sde): blon po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang /  brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpo na rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
179b5(mdo sde): sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'gro chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri
179b6(mdo sde): mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs
179b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan po/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyan gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ 
179b8(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dge' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa
180a1(mdo sde): na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor da
180a2(mdo sde): 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ de phyi zhig ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi
180a3(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta
180a4(mdo sde): bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dag nas/ 
180a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba la sa skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas 'kho ra ba las nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'dres pa la
180a6(mdo sde): yon tan du lta bar 'gyur te/ bcom lda na 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ kun la grags pa dang / bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ gos
180a7(mdo sde): dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nang gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur to// des yongasu bzung ba'i yo byad rnyed do cog stsogs par byed do// des chas
180a8(mdo sde): pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bgo bsha' ma byas// de nas ser sna kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des na/ rang gi yo byad la lhag par zhen bzhin/ 
180b1(mdo sde): du shi nas rang gi gnas khang du yi dwags su skyeso// de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis 'gan+de mjug med pa brdungs nas rung bu phyir byung ngo // de/ 
180b2(mdo sde): nas de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pas byas nas/ phyir gtsug lag khang du lhags so// de nas gnas gi sgo phyi ste chos gos dang / lhung bzed g.yar sde 'drim
180b3(mdo sde): ba la zhugs pa dang / re shig na yi dwags rka lag dang / mig mi sdug la lus mchog tu 'jigs la chos gos dang / lhung bzed zin cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo // 
180b4(mdo sde): de ltar mi sdug pa de mthong nas/ dge slong nga dag mi dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la ga sol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de
180b5(mdo sde): la phan gdags pa dang / slob ma'i tshogs rnams skyo ba bsgred pa dang / ser sna'i rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dge slong gi tshogs kyis
180b6(mdo sde): zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te/ gnas der gshegaso// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po mtshan sum
180b7(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin
180b8(mdo sde): bo che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes te/ de ngo tsha bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
181a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis char sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur zab pa dang / rnga sgra lta bu'i gsung gis yi dwags de spyos te/ bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis bdag nyid
181a2(mdo sde): phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang lhung bzed 'di bslabs te/ des na yi drag su skyes pa yin gyis/ nga yang nga la sems dga' bar gyis la yo byad 'di la yang sems ma chags
181a3(mdo sde): par byas dang leg so// 'di las kyang shi nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba re/ de nas yi dwags des chos gos dang / lhung bzed dge 'dun la bul nas/ bcom ldan
181a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ nyes pa gshegaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi dwags kyi phyir yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod
181a5(mdo sde): nams gang // de ni yi dwags phyi bzhin song // yi dwags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de ni myur du thar gyur cig/ de nas yi dgas de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar
181a6(mdo sde): gyur te/ shi nas yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so// de nas yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen po rna cha gdub 'khor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo des
181a7(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang spri ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang
181a8(mdo sde): pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar po dang / man dar ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa khor khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom
181b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la de dang mthun pa tsham/ 
181b2(mdo sde): bstan te/ de thos nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo // de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas paM de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen
181b3(mdo sde): ba~M byung ba mthong ngo // de mthong nas the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang gsum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ 
181b4(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi/ 
181b5(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po 'am/ lha'i dbang po bdabyin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs dpa ma yin gyi// yi dwags de shi nas yi dwags rdzu 'phrul
181b6(mdo sde): chen por skyes te/ de mdangs sum nga'i zad du 'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bstan te/ de dga' ba skyes nas song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na ci nas tshong dpon las yi
181b7(mdo sde): dgas gyur pa de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag byung bar mi 'gyur bar ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
181b8(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'bye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te
182a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / bu zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / zlon
182a2(mdo sde): po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin
182a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi 'tsho kur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa
182a4(mdo sde): byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
182a5(mdo sde): 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
182a6(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka yan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhug so// de nas tsha dang 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang / chos
182a7(mdo sde): gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la song ngo // rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te/ zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ 
182a8(mdo sde): chos ges dang / lhung bzed bzhag ste/ yi dwags kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba dang / des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro'i nyen kor du yi dgas mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra la lus khrag
182b1(mdo sde): gis gshos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug bzhin du keng rus kyis bkor ba/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong la/ bu la byams pa yod
182b2(mdo sde): bzhin du de bkres pas nyen nas de dag za zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas gnas brtan 'dam du sprin gyi bus de la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon las ci zhig byas na/ 
182b3(mdo sde): des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug/ yi dregs mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod
182b4(mdo sde): la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thob na sems can gzhan dag kyis sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyuraro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sprid
182b5(mdo sde): gyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra
182b6(mdo sde): ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan ne cog nyan par byed do// de nas sangs
182b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ smin par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis
182b8(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa 'das bu sprin gyi bu la bka' stsal ba/ 'dam bu sprin gyi bu tshur shog khyod 'ongs pa leg so// khyod dgadod ga las 'ongs/ 'das bu sbyin gyi bu gsol pa/ 
183a1(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yi dwags kyis nang du mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dwags mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra
183a2(mdo sde): la lus khrag gis bshos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug pa bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba zhig mthong lagaso// yang gsol pa/ bdag ni nyin bzhin bu lnga btsal// mtshan
183a3(mdo sde): yang de bzhin lnga btsa' ste// btsas nas de dag zas na yang // 'drangs par mi 'gyur zhes pachin// de yis mi yi 'jig rten du// rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na// 
183a4(mdo sde): des ra sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba// 'jig su rung ba myong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sprin gyi bu yi dwags mo de ni sdig pa'i las/ 
183a5(mdo sde): byed byed pa yin no// de las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lag so// 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung / 
183a6(mdo sde): shig dang ngas bshad do// 'das bu sbyin gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA ra na si na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing
183a7(mdo sde): rgya che ba// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga'
183a8(mdo sde): kha dga' dgur spyad de// de rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod kyang bu yang med/ bu mo yang med de/ de lag pa la skom tshugs bcas nas/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zi
183b1(mdo sde): kyang bu yang med/ bu mo yang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyuraro snyam ste/ sems khongasu chud cing
183b2(mdo sde): 'dug go// de nas de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gso
183b3(mdo sde): ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi ni mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes
183b4(mdo sde): pa dang / chos 'thun pa pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/ 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo
183b5(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyuro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ da yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa 'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor
183b6(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigaso// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang
183b7(mdo sde): zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo smrabar
183b8(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ des lnga mnyes par byas kyang bu yang ma byung / bu mo yang ma byung nas/ de'i blo 'di lta bu zhig skyes te/ ma la bdag gis chun ma zhig blangs na/ brgyal bu yod par
184a1(mdo sde): gyur lnga srid ngam snyam ste/ nges rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs nas/ dede dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dag
184a2(mdo sde): la dga' dgur spyad pa las pa zhig na du chags par gyur nas/ de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ khyim thab la sbran pa/ jo ba bdag la sras chags te/ bdag
184a3(mdo sde): gi rus g.yas legs na rten cing gnas pa las na/ khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis/ dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so// de yang dga' ngas te/ ro gtod ni btag lag
184a4(mdo sde): pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/ bdag gis yun ring po nas spod smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo // bdag gis bu rung bar shog shig/ mi rung bar ma gyur cig/ 
184a5(mdo sde): bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig/ gsos pa'i lan phyir gso par shog shig/ nor skal la spyod par shog shig/ bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par sheg
184a6(mdo sde): shig/ bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung / nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la/ bsod nams dag byas nas de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes
184a7(mdo sde): shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon sngo bar shog shig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do// de nas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs kyi steng du
184a8(mdo sde): nyam rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang // tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang // sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang // ha cang kha ba ma
184b1(mdo sde): yin pa rnams dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan tsa che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang dang ra ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa
184b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tsa dang / dngang ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do
184b3(mdo sde): shal dang / se mo dos lus rnam par grubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang / khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du
184b4(mdo sde): rgyu zhing 'og gis gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yi mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas po// de nas chung sa snga ma des de bkur zhing gicas par byed pa mthong / 
184b5(mdo sde): nas phrag dog skyes te bsams pa/ gal te 'di las bu btsas par gyur na ni/ bdag la gnod pa byed par 'a/ gyur gyis/ ci nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos so
184b6(mdo sde): snyam mo// 'dod pa la yongasu bsten pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci yang med de/ mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yang sar kha ltas pa/ des yid rton du bcug nas gang 'thungs
184b7(mdo sde): ba tsam gyis nyon mongs ma de'i bu 'byil bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngal rlag pa'i rtsi byi no// de nas chung ma phyi ma des nye du thams cad bsdus nas chung ma lnga ma de zhal lce la
184b8(mdo sde): bkug ste/ khyod kyis bdag yid rten du bcug pas mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin te/ des bdag gi bu 'phyil to zhes byas// de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams kyi nang du
185a1(mdo sde): mama' bor te// gal te bdag gis khyed la mngal rlag pa'i rtsi byin par gyur na bdag yi dgas mor gyur te/ bu byung ngo cog za bar shog shig
185a2(mdo sde): byas so// 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dwags mo de yin te/ des sngon phrag dog byas pa des na yi dwags mor skyeso// 
185a3(mdo sde): ngas brdzun byas te mara' bor ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des ni nyon mo dang nub mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing za bar gyur to// 'das bu sbyin gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis ngag gi nyes pa
185a4(mdo sde): spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ ci nas yi dgas mi de'i nyes pa de lta ba dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// bcom
185a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dab bu sbyin gyi bu dang / lnga dang lA ma ya~M na dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen
185a6(mdo sde): po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / phyis khung zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
185a7(mdo sde): la rgyal po rnams dang / blor po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / 
185a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lA ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla ma byas
185b1(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi mchod cing shes/ 
185b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
185b3(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na/ spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhug so// de'i tshe yangs
185b4(mdo sde): ba can na grong khyer gyi 'obs shig gi nang ni/ yi dgas zas su skyugs pa za ba/ bor ba za ba/ ngar snabs dang / gcin gyis 'tsho ba/ rnag dang / khrag dang phyi sa za ba/ 
185b5(mdo sde): mi bzang pa/ rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba lnga brgya gan so// yang smras pa/ skyugs pa za zhing bor ba za// ngar snabs gcin gyis 'tsho ba dang // rnag khrag
185b6(mdo sde): dang ni phyi sa za// mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'dag/ yangs pa can de na bram ze zhig kyang 'dug ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse
185b7(mdo sde): dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dger dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to// de nas bram ze des mtshan mkhan rnams
185b8(mdo sde): bkug ste dris na/ de dag na re 'di ni ljon khye'u 'dug pa de'i mthu yin zhes zer ro// re shig na de zla ba brgyad ngam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u mdog ngan cing bltan mi/ 
186a1(mdo sde): / sdug la byang ngan po lus mi gtsang bas bsgos pa dri nga ba zhig btsas so// de mchog tu mi sdug mod kyi/ byams pa'i dbang gis 'brel pas pha ma/ 
186a2(mdo sde): gnyis kyis gsoso// de mi gtsang ba'i gnas rnams 'ba' shig tu dga' la phyag dar gyi phung po dang / phyi sa khung du skra 'bal zhing khar mi gtsang ba 'dzud nas/ de'i
186a3(mdo sde): phyi sa khung zhes bya bar gyur to// re shig na de phan tshun du 'khyam pa las 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di de lta bu'i gnas
186a4(mdo sde): rnams su dga' ba las 'di ni gor ma chags par grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yin gyis bdag gis 'dir rab tu dbyung ngo snyam mo// des de rab tu phyung nas gcer
186a5(mdo sde): bur 'khyam zhing 'dug la/ legs pa byed pa la yang gnas so// de nas de 'khyam zhing song ba las yangs pa can gyi 'obs kyi nang na yi dag
186a6(mdo sde): lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pas grong khyer gyi 'obs de'i nang du song nas de dag dang lhan cig
186a7(mdo sde): 'dus shing phrad de/ dga' bar gyur nas grogs por gyur to// phyis ri shig na khye'u bri sa khung don zhig la brel te yangs pa can du song ngo // bcom ldan
186a8(mdo sde): 'das kyang grong khyer gyi 'obs der byon nas yi dwags de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs/ 
186b1(mdo sde): par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po chel
186b2(mdo sde): ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thug tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
186b3(mdo sde): khyed cis 'phongs yi dwags rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni skom lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag sor lnga
186b4(mdo sde): las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun lnga pab ste/ des yi dwags lnga brgya po de dag tshim par mdzad do// de nas de dag bcom ldan
186b5(mdo sde): 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas/ ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid
186b6(mdo sde): kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bor 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snya mo// de nas yi dwags les shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsags
186b7(mdo sde): ba'i yul bzang po skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon yi dwags gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems
186b8(mdo sde): te/ bdag cag zhag lon te/ bzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba ni bdag cag gis cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la
187a1(mdo sde): // blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo// de nas sngon yi dag su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgya/ 
187a2(mdo sde): pa nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sdig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa
187a3(mdo sde): la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od chen pos snang byas nas/ bcom
187a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bco ma ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dwag su gyur pa'i
187a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thug su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bani rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ba
187a6(mdo sde): pa de thos nas/ lha'i bu lnga brgyas 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis
187a7(mdo sde): bden pa mthong nas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar byed pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du
187a8(mdo sde): sbyor ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnasu dong ngo // de nas khye'u phyi sa
187b1(mdo sde): khung grong khyer gyi 'ob su 'ongs pa dang / yi dgas de dag ma mthong ngo // de nas tshol ba la zhugs te de de dag yongasu tshol bas skyo bar 'gyur la de dag ni ma rnyed do// 
187b2(mdo sde): de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dan+d+ha kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gabigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugasu mi chud pa zhig ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas
187b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis
187b4(mdo sde): mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas
187b5(mdo sde): pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zha/ bas kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi
187b6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa bzhis ma 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par
187b7(mdo sde): 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gi
187b8(mdo sde): phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur drags pas kun tu/ 
188a1(mdo sde): rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs
188a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dang / su ni phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar 'gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang ma
188a3(mdo sde): nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song las phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras
188a4(mdo sde): bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med/ pi las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug
188a5(mdo sde): la dbang bad du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyed pa las bskyod par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongasu smin par bya/ su ni yongasu
188a6(mdo sde): smin pa los rnam par grol bar ba snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug/ 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya
188a7(mdo sde): ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu phyi sa khung la phan gdags pa'i phyir snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung
188a8(mdo sde): bzed bsdams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re shig na mthar gyis
188b1(mdo sde): bsod stobs bskor te srang du gshegs na/ phyi sa khung yang phan tshun 'khor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'greng ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
188b2(mdo sde): sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong
188b3(mdo sde): bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de'i mod pa des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas so// 
188b4(mdo sde): de dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bdag cag lta bu yang legs par gsum
188b5(mdo sde): ba'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu 'byung ba mchis te/ chud/ par gyur na bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan
188b6(mdo sde): pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal mkhyen pas/ de shin tu skal ba dang ldan par thugasu chud nas phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can
188b7(mdo sde): brkang ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la/ skra dang kha stu
188b8(mdo sde): ni bregs nas/ zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur pa/ lag na ni lhung zad dang chu snod thogs par gyur te/ 
189a1(mdo sde): 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/ de ni mgo brags lus la snam sbyar gyon// sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas
189a2(mdo sde): go bgos nas// mdo la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung pog ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas bol
189a3(mdo sde): mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jigs
189a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang / 
189a5(mdo sde): bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dad lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan/ pa/ tsan ngan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ 
189a6(mdo sde): rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang bkur bsti la rgyab kyis phyogs
189a7(mdo sde): pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin na yang ngan pa la dga' bar
189a8(mdo sde): gyur nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ nga'i dge slong byis khung 'di ni nyan thos kyi dge slong ngan ngon la mos pa rnams
189b1(mdo sde): kyi mchog yin no// de na dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gnas brtan phyi sa khung gis las
189b2(mdo sde): ci bgyis na nges 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag phyis khung nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu
189b3(mdo sde): tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pa na/ phyi sa khung nyid kyis las byas shing
189b4(mdo sde): bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i
189b5(mdo sde): khams dang // me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi da ge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i
189b6(mdo sde): phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la
189b7(mdo sde): bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin ga
189b8(mdo sde): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med
190a1(mdo sde): pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan zhes bya ba
190a2(mdo sde): na rten cing bzhugaso// de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang der khyim bdag gcig gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong
190a3(mdo sde): ngag 'ongs pa dang / 'gro ba dang gnas par semaso// gtsug lag khang de na so so'i skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas te/ de yang gnas la shin tu ser sna che ba zhig ste/ dge slong
190a4(mdo sde): gsar du 'ong ba rnams mthong na/ tshig pa za zhing 'khrug la gnod sems byed de// zhul zhul por 'dug cing 'khrug pa skyed par byed do// dge slong gang dag gdug
190a5(mdo sde): lag khang de nas gud du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni/ shas cher dga' zhing mchog tu dga' la skyel zhing / smra bar byed do// pis re shig na ga zhig gi yul nas
190a6(mdo sde): dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig 'ongaso// gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de yang phyir mi 'ong ba yin te/ des spyod lam gyi sgo nas dgra bcom pa yin par shes so// de nas dga'
190a7(mdo sde): ba skyes te/ phyid nyin dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang bshos la spyan drangs so// dge slong gzhi ba de ni de na med pa las re shig na phyid nyin cho ga
190a8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i khrus kyang bul/ bshes kyang bshams pa dang / dge slong gzhi pa de yang 'ongs te/ de yang cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus sar song nas/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po khyed
190b1(mdo sde): rengasu byung ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i byi dor byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas de brag dog skyes nas/ des sdang ba'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po smras te/ dge slong
190b2(mdo sde): khyed ni lus mi gtsang bas byugs kyang bla'i/ sbyin bdag 'di lta bu'i bsnyen bkur len pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes byas so// de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs 'di las ches mi bzad
190b3(mdo sde): ba skal ba can du 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ cang mi zer bar dang du blangs// re shig na tshogs par gyur te dro la bab pa na dge slong gzhi ba des dgra bcom pa la khyod kyis
190b4(mdo sde): sdang ba'i sems bskyed do// zhes zer ba thos so// thos nas kyang de 'gyod pa skyes so// de nas dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'phags
190b5(mdo sde): pa bdag gis khyod la tshig rtsub po smras pa de bzod pa gsol lo zhes byaso// de nas dgra bcom pa des de'i dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ na mkha' la 'phags nas
190b6(mdo sde): cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// de nas lhag par yang 'gyod pa skyes te/ des de'i mdan du las kyi nyes pa de mthol zhing bshags te shad kyis spangaso// 'on kyang des
190b7(mdo sde): mthar thug pa'i ye shes bskyed ni ma nus so// de nas re shig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa dang / des smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / 
190b8(mdo sde): ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa de'i las de'i rnam par smin pa ni bdag gis myong bar ma gyur ci ga/ bdag gis bsgrags pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / sbyin pa dang sbyin pa chen/ 
191a1(mdo sde): po dag byin pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed/ 
191a2(mdo sde): bar shog shig/ ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam pa sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus ra dge slong gzhi bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyi sa khung 'di nyid yin te/ des dgra bcom pa la ngag
191a3(mdo sde): gi las rtsub po smras pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des ni 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa mong bar gyur te/ las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas/ de ltar srid pa tha ma la bab
191a4(mdo sde): pa'i tshe yang 'di ltar dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga bar gyur la/ mi gtsang ba dang / snag sdig la dga' bar gyur to// de nas kha ton byas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la
191a5(mdo sde): mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni
191a6(mdo sde): nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par byaste
191a7(mdo sde): ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis khung so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dge 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i
191a8(mdo sde): yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i pir te/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lham
191b1(mdo sde): yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
191b2(mdo sde): rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/ sdom gyi tshig su bcad pa lnga pa rdzog s+ho// / sdom ni/ sbrul nag dang ni zla ba dang // sA pa dang ni dpal ldan ma// gos dang
191b3(mdo sde): ne tso pho nya dang // ma he dang ni gso sbyong dang / ngang pa tha mar brjod pa yon// sprul nag po zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po
191b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rtse rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin
191b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ ma
191b6(mdo sde): ba byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha me yin dang // mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phe chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
191b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
191b8(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhug so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la lo
192a1(mdo sde): spyod che ga yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/ de yang ser
192a2(mdo sde): snga can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/ khwa la yang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing bongs pa dang / bkren pa dag mthong
192a3(mdo sde): na sems sdang bar byed do// de nas des rang gi bskyed mos tshal du gser dngul gyi phung po chen po sbas te bzhag nas/ de de la chags te/ lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o// de shi nas
192a4(mdo sde): de nyid kyi steng du sprul gdug pa sprul nag po chen po mi gdug pa zhig tu skyes so// de nas bskyed mos tshul der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bltas pa tsam gyis gsod par
192a5(mdo sde): byed do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thog ta ga tu yang che ge mo'i bskyed mos tshal du song ba de dag thams cad bslag par 'gyuraro zhes sgra grag par gyur / 
192a6(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs rtsan snying po la gsol to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
192a7(mdo sde): mo gtogs par de 'dul nus par gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba dang song
192a8(mdo sde): ste phyin na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzug
192b1(mdo sde): can snying po la chos kyi gtam kyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos
192b2(mdo sde): kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dgar bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung
192b3(mdo sde): bar bzhugaso// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug te/ bcom
192b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbar/ ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga sol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na bskyed/ 
192b5(mdo sde): mos tshal ga ge mo zhog na sbrul gdug pa sbrul nig po chen po mig gdug pa zhig mchis te/ skye bo mang po brlag par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan
192b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal
192b7(mdo sde): po gzugs can snying po// bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ stan las langs/ 
192b8(mdo sde): nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnabs nas bskyed mos tshal ga la ba/ 
193a1(mdo sde): der gshegs te byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gzer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis bskyed
193a2(mdo sde): mos tshal de dag thams cad sdang bar byaso// bskal pa stong gi bar du yongasu bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'ong bar dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la bog ma thag tu
193a3(mdo sde): rab tu sim par gyur to// de nas sbrul gdug pa des phan tshun du bltas te/ su'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par gyur cig gu snyam pa dang / des sangs rgyas bcom
193a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan su ma cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas/ 'od 'dom gang
193a5(mdo sde): gis brgyar po/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan
193a6(mdo sde): 'das la dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis
193a7(mdo sde): rdzas 'di bsgrubs pa des na khyod sbrul gdug par ltung bar byaso// de yang nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la gter 'di la yang sems ma chags par byas dang leg so// 'di nas
193a8(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skye 'are// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs dran par mdzad pa de'i tshe de dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
193b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la da ni nga yis ci byar med/ mi khom par mi skyes zin gyis// don med ngus pas ci la phan// 'dir ni rgyal ba
193b2(mdo sde): snying rje can// nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la// dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs// 'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sbal de lhung
193b3(mdo sde): bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ 'od ma'i tshal du bsnamaso// de'i skabasu rgyal po dang yul ma ga d+ha'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis sbrul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btul
193b4(mdo sde): ba thos so// de nas sbrul gdug pa de rang gi lus la smad de kha 'tshos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtse gsum pa'i lha yul bas
193b5(mdo sde): por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nus ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum pa skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang
193b6(mdo sde): gis skyes snyam mo// de nas sbrul gdug pa la/ sa shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bza por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga'
193b7(mdo sde): bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bang/ 
193b8(mdo sde): gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o// snyam mo// de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing
194a1(mdo sde): 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo des brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma lan
194a2(mdo sde): lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad+ma dang ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba rnams kyis/ 
194a3(mdo sde): bu bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lin da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan
194a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang
194a5(mdo sde): khams dang rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa de'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos pa stan te/ de thos nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur
194a6(mdo sde): ba'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa
194a7(mdo sde): mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig tu brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i ri las bsgral
194a8(mdo sde): ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang
194b1(mdo sde): ma bgyis/ mas kyangs bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ sgra rnams kyis kyangs bsdus/ nang mi dang mnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyib/ sngon gyim nu
194b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song la ma// shin tu ma
194b3(mdo sde): khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'phro ba bye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdage gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ 
194b4(mdo sde): shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pra'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang / 
194b5(mdo sde): bo mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i// na spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni dang mthong 'bras bu yod
194b6(mdo sde): de nas do shal 'phyang ba dag gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lho yi 'jig rten kha las lha
194b7(mdo sde): yul song // de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nas
194b8(mdo sde): ba nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs can
195a1(mdo sde): snying po'i thang du song nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ rgyal po bslang nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal
195a2(mdo sde): bo chen po longs nyal te tsa bya/ de nas rgyal po sad de 'od chen po de dang lha'i bu de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu ste khyod su zhig ces dris so// de
195a3(mdo sde): na re ba dag ni bskyed mos 'tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul gdug pa btul te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin te/ bcom
195a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la yang bdag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to// dbang ga gis khyod la bstan gyis khyod song la/ bskyed mos
195a5(mdo sde): tshal de'i phyogs ga ge mo zhig nas gter chen po phyung la bdag gi phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol te/ yon gyi
195a6(mdo sde): rabs kyang gdon par gsol cig/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha'i bu la cang mi zer bar khas blangaso// de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i
195a7(mdo sde): bus rgyal byos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po de nyid kyi mtshan mo yul ma ga d+ha'i pho
195a8(mdo sde): brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams la bsgo nas bskyed mos tshol der song ste gter phyung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsu
195b1(mdo sde): gyi bar du gshos gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des
195b2(mdo sde): sbrul gdug par skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 
195b3(mdo sde): de shas cher chags pa bskyed de/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa des ni sbrul gdug par
195b4(mdo sde): skyes so// nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lha'i nang du skyes so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su/ 
195b5(mdo sde): song ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi blangs/ pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po de bas na sir sna spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ cin sa/ 
195b6(mdo sde): sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i nye ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de nyid lha'i bur gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar
195b7(mdo sde): rgyal po khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan
195b8(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal ste/ stan las langs nas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid ras te/ bcom ldan
196a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
196a2(mdo sde): bo rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pheM brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / dang dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha
196a3(mdo sde): ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar bas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / kla
