196a4(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam kha' lding dang / mi 'am ci // lto 'ape chen po rnams kyis mtsho da cing shos pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
196a5(mdo sde): rin po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sman gsos dang / sman zong rna mas brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du
196a6(mdo sde): med pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas spyir gyi kun dga' ra ba ni bzhug so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma
196a7(mdo sde): blangs te/ de dang lhan cig tu rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang ning blta na sdug la mdzes
196a8(mdo sde): pa skye bo thams cad kying mig sim par byed pa zhig bco so// de yang bram ze des dka' bas rnyes pa yin te// de la bu dang bu mo gzhan yang med nas/ bskyed bsrings te phyir skyes nas/ de 'jig
196b1(mdo sde): rten thams cad sim par byed pa'i phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i ming zla ba zhes bdag so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong khyer thams cad du brgyud de bskor bas
196b2(mdo sde): bram ze de yang khye'u de la lhag par byams par gyur te/ 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag gi tshe yang rtag tu legs par bsrung ba lhur byed cing 'dug go/ bram ze de
196b3(mdo sde): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang nye ba zhig na 'dug go// de nas bram ze'i khye'u khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang bsten nas rgyal bu rtul byed kyi tshal du song ste/ sangs
196b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi ston pa la dad pa rnyed de/ de yang tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum po'i lha yul bzang por skyeso// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes
196b5(mdo sde): nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sem sa rnam gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du/ skye sa/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi
196b6(mdo sde): 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par ngos mthong ngo // de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di
196b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gis cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i
196b8(mdo sde): phyir 'gro'o// snyam mo// de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdab kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan
197a1(mdo sde): pa'i cod pan can lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo pa dang / spr-ig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lnga'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma/ 
197a2(mdo sde): dang / ku mu dadang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog
197a3(mdo sde): gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang
197a4(mdo sde): khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig
197a5(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rje sa bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lar gsum
197a6(mdo sde): da brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang
197a7(mdo sde): thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lnga dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la bas kyang ma bgyis/ mes kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lnga rnams kyis
197a8(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so// yang smras pa/ 
197b1(mdo sde): nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba 'phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gi/ 
197b2(mdo sde): thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i'o// 
197b3(mdo sde): 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// 
197b4(mdo sde): de nas do shal 'byung ba dga' 'gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul mthong // 
197b5(mdo sde): de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tsho khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad
197b6(mdo sde): las thar pa bzhin du 'byer ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gan su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang po rangs mi nyal bar
197b7(mdo sde): brtson pa lhur byed la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi yang du snang ba chen pos 'byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
197b8(mdo sde): zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag pa tshangs pa 'ag/ wa'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la brtsag
198a1(mdo sde): slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 
198a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi bram ze'i bu cig pa de tshe thung ste shi nas deng las sems dga' bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por
198a3(mdo sde): skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ nges de la chos bstan nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i skabasu bram ze des bu gcig pa sdug cig/ 
198a4(mdo sde): phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa dang / mi mthun pa med pa de ra khrod dung khyer nas bang bar bzhag ste/ kyi hud bu/ kyi hud bu thu'o// 
198a5(mdo sde): kyi hud bu gcig po zhes zer zhing 'bod de/ de'i nye du rnams kyis de ltar bcugs kyang bslang ma nus nis/ de kha dang chun lag dang / bya rgod dang / wa rnams kyis
198a6(mdo sde): ni bskor/ bud med skra bshig pa dag dang ni 'grogs// skye bo mang pos ni blta zhing 'dug go// de nas de'i bu lhar skyes pas/ ba smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas/ snying rjes
198a7(mdo sde): snying bskyod do/ pa'i mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid drang srong gi cha lug su sprul nas/ dur khrod kyi 'dab du dka' thub lnga byed cing 'dug go// de nas bram ze des drang srong
198a8(mdo sde): de dris pa/ kye drang srong chen po khyod dka' thub 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ drang srong gis smras pa/ da ni rgyal srid smra ba ste/ nga'i gser gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras gnyi ma
198b1(mdo sde): dang zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor lo byas la/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni mdun nas 'dren te/ shing rte de la bzhon zhing sa chen po 'di bskor bar 'dod do// bram zes
198b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar rgyun tu dka' thub spad byas te/ dka' thub mchog gis spyad byas kyang // gnas de khyod kyis re mi 'thob// drang srong gis smras pa khyod
198b3(mdo sde): kyang shi ba'i khog pa mchog tu gnam zhing mi gtsang ba'i ro// shing 'dra bar gyur pa 'dis ci zhig smra ba// bram zes smras pa/ sdug pa'i bu cig pa shi ste de sgrub po// drang srong
198b4(mdo sde): gis smras pa// gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar// rgyun tu dra ba'i las byas kyang // bu de khyod kyis re mi mthob// khyod ni dus kyang tsa la phan// de nas bram ze de drang srong gi tshig bden no
198b5(mdo sde): snyam nas dad pa skye so// dad pa skyes nas khyod su/ zhig ces bya'o// de nas drang srong gi cha lugs de mi snang bar byas nas/ rang gi cha lugasu 'dug ste pha la smras pa/ 
198b6(mdo sde): bdag ni khyod kyi bu cig pa de yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i
198b7(mdo sde): phyir 'dir 'ongs so// yab khyod tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu bzhud cig dang / khyod kyang 'khor ba las 'dar bar 'gyur yang srid do// de nas bram ze des shi ba'i rus
198b8(mdo sde): bu bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas
199a1(mdo sde): sa sa sungs gags pa'i bdan pa rgyadags par gyu bdu/  ma brdzun pa da par byu sa su sa ca tshugs su/ 
199a2(mdo sde): ma na shu le gas rdo rjes coms/ rgyus tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bya sa po'o// ngas mtho bar gyur ba ma cing rnyed pa thab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa
199a3(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te song ngo // de nas dge slong the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ 
199a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar pa mya ngan bsal nas bden pa mthong ba la yang bzhag pa gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar
199a5(mdo sde): 'dis bden pa mthong nas/ pa yongasu bskyabs pa 'di/ lha la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'dis ni 'das pa'i dus na so so'i skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe yang pa bsad pa la
199a6(mdo sde): thug pa las lan gsum skyabs byas te/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA ra na
199a7(mdo sde): si na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa zhig yod de/ de'i bu ni dad pa dang ldan pa dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba mi rnams shin tu 'drang ba zhig go// de nas re shig ni de'i bas rkun po byas
199a8(mdo sde): nas rgyal pos gshed ma rnams la sod cig ces bsgo'o// de nas pus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la gsol nas srog phangs pa byin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
199b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di yin no// byi ba byed pa'i bu de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no// dge
199b2(mdo sde): slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las cishin bgyis na des pa dang bu gnyis ga bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag
199b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la gnyi ga dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabasu song ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na de'i phyir de ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to// 
199b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par bya ste/ dge
199b5(mdo sde): slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang // lha dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
199b6(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / sA la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
199b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / 
199b8(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / namakhar rdzing rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ tha mar byas/ ri mo byas/ 
200a1(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
200a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes
200a3(mdo sde): pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe
200a4(mdo sde): mnyan du yod par sA la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston/ byung ste/ der srog chags 'bum brag du ma 'dus nas/ shing sA la'i me tog blangs te/ rtse zhing dang
200a5(mdo sde): la dga' dgur spyod do// de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sA la'i me tog blangs te/ mnyan du yod pa'i nang du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong
200a6(mdo sde): gi tshogs kyi zham ring byas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de slar gshegs nas/ bu mo dos sangs rgyas bcom
200a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyis
200a8(mdo sde): stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sA la'i me tog gis ga
200b1(mdo sde): to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ phyir log nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo snyam pa dang / re shig na de sA la'i shing la mdzegs pa las/ 
200b2(mdo sde): ltung ste shi nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// de nas re shig na lus dang gzhal med khang sA la
200b3(mdo sde): me tog gis brgyan te/ lha'i mdun sa'i nang du song ngo // de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i mdun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang
200b4(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi sngags pa brjod cing 'dug pa las lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i bu mo lus dang gzhal med khangs la'i me tog gis brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar
200b5(mdo sde): ba de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de la tshig su bcad de smra sa pa/ ci'i phyir/ khyod kyis lus mdog dag pa'i gse ra 'dra pad+ma ud pa la lta bur gyur/ 'di na
200b6(mdo sde): lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur/ ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad+ma rgyas 'dug ser mdog lta bur gyur/ las rnams gang gis
200b7(mdo sde): 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smos/ lha mos smras pa/ mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yi// mi yi nyi ma nyan thos bcas// sA la'i me tog rdul med pa// 
200b8(mdo sde): bzang po dag gis legs par gtor// las dag de 'dra byas pa'i phyir// bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes// bzhin mdog pad+ma zla ba ltar// rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug/ 
201a1(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing // nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// 
201a2(mdo sde): bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma// bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur bsti byas pa yi// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i mdab yangs
201a3(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba// gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa na chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsu
201a4(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / 
201a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dpa' dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das la blta/ 
201a6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing / 
201a7(mdo sde): 'gul pa thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs
201a8(mdo sde): byugs pa de lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du mas g.yog byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo sA la'i me tog gi gzhal med khang de nyid dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du song ngo // 
201b1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor to// chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang / 
201b2(mdo sde): bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la
201b3(mdo sde): lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan
201b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgyas tsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams
201b5(mdo sde): bye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhi ga pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la bas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyi sa/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs/ 
201b6(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ 
201b7(mdo sde): shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba bye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thos// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ 
201b8(mdo sde): shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang
202a1(mdo sde): // rga dang 'chi ba'i nang spangs na// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis// thub pa khyod ni de mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'byung ba dgar 'gyur te// gud
202a2(mdo sde): cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lnga yul song // de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / 
202a3(mdo sde): nga pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa
202a4(mdo sde): nga nyid kyis rang gi gnas song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lngar byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba
202a5(mdo sde): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhes pa/ bcom ldan 'ad sa ci lags/ mdang gsum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
202a6(mdo sde): ba 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du/ mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
202a7(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lnga'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhid la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// bu mo gang gis lam khar me tog gis gtor
202a8(mdo sde): ba de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lag so// de ni nga la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de nga'i thang du 'ongs te/ ngas
202b1(mdo sde): de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri/ 
202b2(mdo sde): mo bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// ston pa la bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o// zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan
202b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad sa gsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam po bcu gsum pa// dpa'
202b4(mdo sde): ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom/ ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / 
202b5(mdo sde): tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lA ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am
202b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / kla dang / gnod sprin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang
202b7(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
202b8(mdo sde): dang / gdan dang / sun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma 'tshal byag lan dag gnas pa na rten cing bzhug sa
203a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 
203a2(mdo sde): skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu gi dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu
203a3(mdo sde): ri shing dang / ba lang dang / mahe dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tshir ma dkrugs la/ bu cig pa la bya bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangaso// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs
203a4(mdo sde): can snying pos bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o// de nas
203a5(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma ba dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / 
203a6(mdo sde): khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod na sred mod tshal gyi sar btsun mo dam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dong nas/ der btsun mo'i 'khor
203a7(mdo sde): gyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag cag ni gdugs cig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi ba'i rngo mi thog na/ lnga btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dir de bzhin gshegs
203a8(mdo sde): pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsegs le zhi la 'asro bar mi gnong / 'on cing bdag cag gis de la rgyun tu mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog rjeng
203b1(mdo sde): dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bkur bsti bgyi'o// zhes gsol to// de nas re shig na rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'a
203b2(mdo sde): la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la dbu skra dang / sen mo srul du gsol/ 'on tang bdag gis mchis brang 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs
203b3(mdo sde): te zhal bsro bar bgyi'o// zhes gsol to// de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang / sen mo byin nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po btsun mo 'khor dang bcas
203b4(mdo sde): pas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkur bsti chen po dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsres nas de la btsun mo
203b5(mdo sde): 'khor gyis mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spo nyes dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis kyang mchod
203b6(mdo sde): ba byed do// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lhas sbyin gyis spad de/ yab chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa bsad nas rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ 
203b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sbyin par bya ba'i chos thams cad bcad de/ su yang debazhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bkur bsti ma byed cig ces khrims kyang bca so// de nas/ 
203b8(mdo sde): gang gi tshe tshes bco lnga la skabs 'byed pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de la su yang phyag dar byed pa 'am/ mar me dang / gdug pa dang / me tog
204a1(mdo sde): // 'bul ba med do// de nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de de lta bur gyur pa yang mthong / rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang dran nas/ 
204a2(mdo sde): snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing kyi hud chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral bas bdag cag bsod nams las 'grib so// zhes 'dzer to// de'i nang nas btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes
204a3(mdo sde): bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsngos te sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjesu dran nas/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la phyag dar byas te/ mar ma'i phreng ba dang to// de nas re shig na rgya ba
204a4(mdo sde): po ma skyes dgra khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du byung ste/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang / re shig na gzhan zhig gis dpal ldan mas dbu skra
204a5(mdo sde): sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i 'phreng ba dang ra ba lags so// zhes byas so// de nas dpal ldan ma bkug ste ci 'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' bcag ce
204a6(mdo sde): smras na/ de na re bdag gis khyod kyi bka' bcag du lags kyang / bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bka' ma bcag go zhes zer ro// de nas
204a7(mdo sde): de khros nas 'khor lo 'phangs te bsad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyeso// de'i tshe lha'i
204a8(mdo sde): mdun ma zhig kyang 'dus nas/ lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa dang ldan pa de lho'i mdun ma'i nang du
204b1(mdo sde): song ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis snang ba chen po de dang lha'i 'od dpag tshad gcig pa mthong nas dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra ba d+ma ud pa
204b2(mdo sde): kha lta bur gyur// 'din lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur// ci yi phyir na khyod kyis lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur// 
204b3(mdo sde): mi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdag pad+ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur// las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smras// lha mos smras pa 'jig rten
204b4(mdo sde): gsum mgon 'gro ba'i sgron cig pa// mtshan mchog rnams kyis phyug pa'i sangs rgyas mthong // smra mchog nyon mongs mun pa sal ba la// mun pa sel ba'i mar me yon du phul// 
204b5(mdo sde): zla ba'i 'od zer mchog dang 'dra ba'i 'od// mthong nas thub la snying nas dad pa bskyed// 'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis/ ston pa smra ba'i mchog la phyag kyang bgyis// las
204b6(mdo sde): dge de 'dra bas pa'i phyir// bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes// bzhin mdog pad+ma zla ba ltar// rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing // nyes pa thas/ 
204b7(mdo sde): cad rnam spangs pa// mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i mdab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan pa/ bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur
204b8(mdo sde): bsti byas pa ni// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i ma po yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba// gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dka dal su mi mchod// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po
205a1(mdo sde): ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'bos pa dang / 
205a2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag
205a3(mdo sde): lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo dpal
205a4(mdo sde): ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi snang bas gang ba des de nyid kyi mtshan mo me tog ud pa las pad+ma dang / ku mud ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal
205a5(mdo sde): po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'ong chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis ge tor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
205a6(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugasu chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bani rtog/ 
205a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mas/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
205a8(mdo sde): 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag po khrag deng mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la
205b1(mdo sde): bsgral pa dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lnga dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ 
205b2(mdo sde): mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ 
205b3(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu mi bzad khyod kyis mthu yis bcad// bsod nams
205b4(mdo sde): rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de rang nyes spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas 'thob// bdag ni sdu
205b5(mdo sde): bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa'i dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang 'thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lba sa mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa
205b6(mdo sde): srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phang ba dga' gyur te// bu/ da cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra
205b7(mdo sde): thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul so// de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa'
205b8(mdo sde): bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang // nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // 
206a1(mdo sde): // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas
206a2(mdo sde): kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 
206a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am// lha'i dab
206a4(mdo sde): po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas rang gi srog dang
206a5(mdo sde): sngos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rje su dran nas de bzhin ga shegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i phre nga ba dang nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas ba
206a6(mdo sde): de/ de ngal dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ 
206a7(mdo sde): rang gi gan su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mo bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// ston pa la bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri
206a8(mdo sde): mo byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom
206b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / gos shes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
206b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / rnams
206b3(mdo sde): lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin
206b4(mdo sde): dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza'
206b5(mdo sde): dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyunas/ sos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan blo kyi dge 'du dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed
206b6(mdo sde): kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dge' ra ba na bzhug so// de nas gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
206b7(mdo sde): la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul te/ mthar gyis gser bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phul ba de'i tshe/ de'i blo skyes pa ma la bdag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams
206b8(mdo sde): dag byed pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod kyis bdag gis skye bo dbul po rnams la phan gdag pa'i phyir mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dang po bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan
207a1(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la snyen bkur bya'o// de ltar byas pa dang bdag gis skye bo mang po la yang phan btags par 'gyur la/ bsod nams mang po
207a2(mdo sde): yang bskyed par 'gyur ro// snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ji ltar bsams pa de rgyal po la gsol nas/ rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa thams cad du dril
207a3(mdo sde): bsgrags te mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi khyed rnams nyon cig/ deng nas zhag bdun khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan
207a4(mdo sde): thos rnams kyi phyir glang po che la zhon te dad pa snga dpar 'dod kyis khyed gang gis ji tsam yongasu gtang bar dab pa de yongs su gtang bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o// de
207a5(mdo sde): nas re shig na zhag bdun lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin glang po che la zhon te/ de bzhin gsheg/ saM pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir dad pa sdud pa la zhugs te/ 
207a6(mdo sde): der gang dag la ji tsam bdog pa de dag de tsam sbyin par byed do// kha cig ni 'gal gyi do shal sprin par byed/ kha cig ni gdub bu sbyin par byed de/ kha cig ni dpung rgyan smin par byed/ 
207a7(mdo sde): kha cig ni gser gyi 'phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni so rngub kyi rgyan sbyir bar byed/ kha cig ni mu tig gi do shal sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni do
207a8(mdo sde): sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni tha na zho'i brgyad cha tsam yang sbyin par byed do// khyim bdag de yang gzhan la phan gdags po'i phyir len par byed do// de nas re shig na bud med shin tu
207b1(mdo sde): dbul mo zhig gi sha thang ste/ zla ba gsum gyis ras yug cig rnyed nas/ des ras de gyon te/ srang du zhugs pa dang / des khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin dung 'bud cing
207b2(mdo sde): rnga ldum rdung bzhin du rgyang nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ des dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ ji ste khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod cha ste/ gter sa'i 'og tu spros pa rnam
207b3(mdo sde): kyang mthong na/ ci'i phyir 'di gzhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing bskor bar byed ces byas pa dang / dge bsnyen de na re gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir te/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das
207b4(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol mi nus pa de dag gi don tu phan 'dogs par byed de/ ci nas mang po bsdongs te/ bcom ldan 'das la dbul du bcug go zhes
207b5(mdo sde): zer ro// de nas bu mo de'i blo skyes pa 'o na bdag/ ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin la bdag gcig pus pa com ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos
207b6(mdo sde): gsol ba'i mthu bdag la med kyis/ bdag gis la cung zad dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas na ras yug cig ma gtogs pa
207b7(mdo sde): gzhan ci yang ma mthong ste/ des bsams pa gal te bdag 'di na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni bdag gcer bur 'byung gis bdag khang theg tu song la ras dor ro
207b8(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas de khang thog tu song nas rang gi lus las ras phud de/ khyim bdag mgo ni med zas sprin gyi steng du bor ba dang / khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te/ 'dis kha thog
208a1(mdo sde): nas bor ba las na 'di la nor de las med gor ma chagasnyam nas/ rang gi g.yog rnams la sgo ba khyed dong la ras 'di sus bor ba ltos shig ces byas nas
208a2(mdo sde): de dag gis bltas pa dang / re shig na bu mo de tsog tsog por 'dag pa mthong ngo // de nas de dag gis dris pa dang / de na ra bcom ldan 'das kyis yon tan brjod pa/ bdag gis
208a3(mdo sde): thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/ bdag gis rnyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la pu lo zhes zer ro// de nas de dag gis khyim bad/ 
208a4(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin la byaso// de nas khyim bdag mgo/ na mad zas sbyin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bu mo de la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs bskon to// de nas de mthung
208a5(mdo sde): sde shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lnga yul bzang por skye sa te/ skyes ma thag tu lha'i bu mo gzhan su la'ang med pa de lta bu'i gos dag de la byung ngo // lha'i bu 'am lnga'i
208a6(mdo sde): bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos
208a7(mdo sde): pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum lha yul bzang po skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la ras phul bar des mthong // de nas sngon ras 'bul ba'i lho'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul
208a8(mdo sde): pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa ngas
208b1(mdo sde): de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man ngar ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'o/ 
208b2(mdo sde): chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gos gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon
208b3(mdo sde): ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
208b4(mdo sde): bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mos 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob
208b5(mdo sde): ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsu ma du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma bsgoms pa dang / rus pa'i la basmral
208b6(mdo sde): ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la lA kyang ma bgyis/ mam kyang ma
208b7(mdo sde): bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge slong dang bram ze
208b8(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang po ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba
209a1(mdo sde): phye/ mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug/ 
209a2(mdo sde): bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'bang thob// bi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du meng+ga
209a3(mdo sde): bar bka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas/ 
209a4(mdo sde): kyang lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lnga yul song // de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lci'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin ba dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa'
209a5(mdo sde): g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nang pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu
209a6(mdo sde): song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen pos byung ba mthong // mthong nas kyang tha
209a7(mdo sde): com skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig
209a8(mdo sde): rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ wa dang
209b1(mdo sde): po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin te/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dad pa sdud par byed pa la ras
209b2(mdo sde): phul nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnasu song // 
209b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun rnams la bkur bsti bya'o// bkur bsti med par mi bya'o// dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab
209b4(mdo sde): par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
209b5(mdo sde): ni tso zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams/ dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon
209b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen
209b7(mdo sde): po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / rna ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
209b8(mdo sde): po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / su nagasas
210a1(mdo sde): dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi
210a2(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs
210a3(mdo sde): pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA
210a4(mdo sde): lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / mahe dang ldan pa ra 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tshar ma dkrugs la bu ge/ cig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangaso// rgyal
210a5(mdo sde): po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba dang / bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs te/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa che ba/ skye dgu
210a6(mdo sde): la byams pa zhig go// de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/ lag pa la oM tshugs bcas nas/ sems khongasu chud cing 'dug go// de nas blon po rnams
210a7(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ ci slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong // ngas bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo // nga ni bcom ldan
210a8(mdo sde): 'das mthong bar 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pa/ lnga'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po smon pa gsan to// de'i
210b1(mdo sde): skabasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugasu mi chung ba zhag ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
210b2(mdo sde): 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyisu mi gsung bzhi gnas
210b3(mdo sde): dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal
210b4(mdo sde): ga rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ri zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa khyu
210b5(mdo sde): mchog go yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan/ lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag bar 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha
210b6(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gi phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston ga/ mthar gyi/ 
210b7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa phyogs bcur grags pas kun rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang
210b8(mdo sde): ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs
211a1(mdo sde): shing 'dug/ su ni nyams nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang nyams nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan
211a2(mdo sde): song du bag su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag pa bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya// su ni 'phags pa'i
211a3(mdo sde): nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya// su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya// su ni dge ba'i
211a4(mdo sde): rtsub rnams bskyed zin pa las yongasu smid par bya// su ni yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug// 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnam
211a5(mdo sde): kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus la sa yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal
211a6(mdo sde): bo gzugs can snying po la ban gdags pa'i phyir da ra zla gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de/ cho se gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsna
211a7(mdo sde): nas ljongs rgyu zhing mthar kyis gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ne tso mi skad shes pa zhig gnas te/ des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po
211a8(mdo sde): zhig nas mthing ngo // de nas shin tu rings par song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa leg so legs so// 
211b1(mdo sde): bdag la phan gdags su gsol// nags khrod 'di kho nar gshegs dgongs gdab par gsol zhes byaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das ne tso de la phan gdags pa'i
211b2(mdo sde): phyir shing gang la na tso gnas pa de'i drung du rtsa'i gdan bting nas skyil krung bcas te bzhug so// nyan thos chen po rnams ni shing gzhan dag gi drung du 'khod do// de nas ne chos bcom
211b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la mi'am mi ma yin pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dwags sam/ gcan zan gnod pa byed du dogs te/ mtshan thog thag na
211b4(mdo sde): khrod de na phan tshun bskor ba byed do// de nas nam nangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzod pa gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dadu / 
211b5(mdo sde): 'gro'i skyes na su skyes pa lags pas/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i rgyu ci yang ma mchis na bzod pa/ mdzad du gsol// de lta lags kyis kyang bdag
211b6(mdo sde): sngon du mchis te/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gsheg so zhes sbran par 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas re shig
211b7(mdo sde): na de bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon du chas te/ mthar gyis rgyal po'i thadu phyin to// de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po khang bzangs kyi steng na bud med 'ba' shig dang sil snyan gyis
211b8(mdo sde): rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de nas ne tse mi skad shes pa des rgyal po la smras pa/ kye rgyal po khyod mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
212a1(mdo sde): dang bcas pa khyod kyi yul du gshegs lags kyis/ lnga khyed kyis bshos lta gon mdzad pa'i rig so// zhes byaso// de nas rgyal po shin tu rings par khang
212a2(mdo sde): bzang kyi steng nas babs nas blon po chen po'i tsho gas kyis zham ring byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rnams bshams nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / 
212a3(mdo sde): bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bkur bsti chen po dang ldan pas nang du spyan
212a4(mdo sde): drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim pa ra byas so// de nas ne tsod 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'a ngas kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag thams
212a5(mdo sde): cad ni bdag gi yon tan yin snyam du rig nas dga' zhing mgu yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po'i mdun logasu phan tshun du
212a6(mdo sde): lding ba las khras khyer te bsad do// bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed de sha bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyeso// lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po
212a7(mdo sde): ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes mnyamo// de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / 
212a8(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon na tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ 
212b1(mdo sde): bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin mo/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o// sa ma/ 
212b2(mdo sde): de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thog pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa'i cod pan can
212b3(mdo sde): lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / smrig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pong
212b4(mdo sde): man da ri rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal ba rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan
212b5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'du go// de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin
212b6(mdo sde): thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse ma
212b7(mdo sde): mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' bo'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan
212b8(mdo sde): 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba
213a1(mdo sde): dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la pas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams
213a2(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge slong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan
213a3(mdo sde): song lam/ shin tu mi babad khyod kyis mthu yis bcad/ bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba bye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa
213a4(mdo sde): spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la rten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgye sa pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang
213a5(mdo sde): lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang mchi ba'i nang spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bra sa bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// kun
213a6(mdo sde): cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten khas ltas lha yul song / de nas sngon notso gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong ba khe spogs phyin pa dang / 
213a7(mdo sde): zhing cwa rgyal bar byung ba dang / dpa' bro gsus las rgyal ba dang / nang pan thams cad las pa ba bzhin du phreng ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ma de les pa'i phyir po de nyid
213a8(mdo sde): kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa ltung byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gri bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong // mthong nas/ 
213b1(mdo sde): kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten
213b2(mdo sde): skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshang ba 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 
213b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// ne tso gang gis nga nags khrod der nub mo'i dgongs mal la spyan drangs pa de khyod kyis de mthong ngam/ dge slong rnams kyis
213b4(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ni tso de nyid shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin no// dge slong
213b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des ne cor skyes lags/ las/ gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te/ mthong bar
213b6(mdo sde): gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon ne cor gyur pa'i lha'i bus tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za ba 'ong ba'i la
213b7(mdo sde): de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsas/ 
213b8(mdo sde): pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing / 
214a1(mdo sde): bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// 
214a2(mdo sde): bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di la skye dgu
214a3(mdo sde): tshe lo nya khri thub pa ra/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bye
214a4(mdo sde): kha lo sbyar gi/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi sngo na ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jigarten du byung ste/ grong khyer bA ra ra si na rten cing bzhagaso// de nas
214a5(mdo sde): re shig na de na dge bsnyen cig 'dug pa des bsla ba pa lhod par byas te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ne tso / skyeso// nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhor skyeso// ngas
214a6(mdo sde): bslab pa'i bzhi lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag par rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges/ 
214a7(mdo sde): bar gnag par 'gyuraro// las gcig tu nges par bkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar lung
214a8(mdo sde): ro dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong
214b1(mdo sde): dag khyed kyil de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par/ 
214b2(mdo sde): bstod do// po tsa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi minam
214b3(mdo sde): dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lnga rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci
214b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis pa/ dang bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha
214b5(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am tso dang / ltong dbye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas/ 
214b6(mdo sde): dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / kun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa/ 
214b7(mdo sde): dbar gnas par bca so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig/ sku tshe ring bar shog
214b8(mdo sde): shig/ ces stod nas gsol ba btab pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong // bra dag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar
215a1(mdo sde): 'tshal bas skom lag so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tsha'o// zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/ khyim
215a2(mdo sde): bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang du dbyar gnas par bzhed pa khyod kyis ci thos/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ lha bdag gi bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab du dbar
215a3(mdo sde): gnas par dam bzhe so zhes thos lag so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / khyim bdag mgon med zos sbyin la sogs pa pho brang 'khor gyi maM dang / blon po rnams kyis mi
215a4(mdo sde): zhig po nyas bkug ste/ kye mi khyod tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la der phyir nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol la bdag cag gi mchid
215a5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nas/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la/ 
215a6(mdo sde): reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/ 'di skad de btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po dang gnyanyen du yod pa gnas pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal
215a7(mdo sde): te/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring po zhig tu mthong bas/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lagaso// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das
215a8(mdo sde): mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegasu gsol zhes mchi'o// zhes gsol cig ces bsgo'o// de nas mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
215b1(mdo sde): rgyal dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/ rgyal po'i khab du song nas/ mthar gyis song song ba las/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer/ 
215b2(mdo sde): du phyin to// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha/ 
215b3(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad gsol// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor
215b4(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo das phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam / nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ 
215b5(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam mi bde ba mi ma nga' 'am/ bde ba la rag par gnas sam zhes mchi'o// 'di skad du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ring mo zhig du ma
215b6(mdo sde): mthong ste/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lag so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das
215b7(mdo sde): mnyan du yod par gshegasu gsol zhes kyang mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye gal te nga rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'grong ster na 'gro bar bya'o// de nas pho
215b8(mdo sde): nyades rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs par rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dad pa stsal
216a1(mdo sde): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te/ gshegasu gsol zhes bskul to// des bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung
216a2(mdo sde): bas gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbar zla gsum zlas nas/ chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ zham ring 'khor ma
216a3(mdo sde): pe dag dang mnyan du yod pa logs chags te gshegaso// pho nya yang shing rta la zhon te chaso// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhabs kyis gshegs pa mthong nas/ shing rta lnga
216a4(mdo sde): babs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyi/ 
216a5(mdo sde): bzha su gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta dang // yang dag rtsol la ngag gnas nas// nyon mongs tshar mas ma snang bar// sa steng / 
216a6(mdo sde): tu rgyu bar byed// pho nyas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang bdag la phan gdags pa dang / thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcib su gsol// de nas/ 
216a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das pho nya la phan gdags pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rting steng du bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rtal bcibs bzhin du/ mnyan du yod par byon nas/ pho nyas kyang
216a8(mdo sde): rgyal po la sbran to// de nas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan mo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
216b1(mdo sde): de nyid du 'khod de/ pho nya de ni tshe thung ste/ chos thos pa'i 'og tu de nyid kyi mtshan mo shi ste/ de shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skye so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring
216b2(mdo sde): po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snya mo// de nas mi las shi 'bos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
216b3(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas
216b4(mdo sde): gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni cha ma yi na gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir 'gro'o// snyam mo// de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i
216b5(mdo sde): lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang / 
216b6(mdo sde): tam la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyis mtshan mo lha'i me tog sud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thu baM bkang
216b7(mdo sde): te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gi gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dugo/ de nas
216b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nya dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
217a1(mdo sde): // chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyan tu nags
217a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / 
217a3(mdo sde): rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha rang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la bas
217a4(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma ba gyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi/ tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams
217a5(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma bgyis// dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu me bzang khyod kyi mthu yis
217a6(mdo sde): bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas
217a7(mdo sde): thob// bdag gi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ba rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'bang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid ba
217a8(mdo sde): stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'byung ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas
217b1(mdo sde): nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten khas ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs byin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo gsum
217b2(mdo sde): las rgyal ba dang / nang pa nang thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ko/ 
217b3(mdo sde): sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas nam nangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum
217b4(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya/ byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i srad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
217b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshang ba 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'a zhing la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ khyod
217b6(mdo sde): kyi pho nya de nga la sems dga' bar gyur nas/ shi te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de ma dang sum nga'i tha du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong
217b7(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ rang gi gnasu song ngo // de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ 'di dag la ni chung ngu zhig byas nas kyang rnam par smin pa chen
217b8(mdo sde): bor 'gyuraro// zhes smra'o// de nas ko sa pa'i rgyal po gas pa rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing su yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs pa mgo
218a1(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal nas/ stan las langs te song ngo // der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gsum ni mchog tu
218a2(mdo sde): gdags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang / chos mchog tu gdags pa dang / dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o// sangs rgyas mchog tu gdag
218a3(mdo sde): pa gang zhe na/ sems can rkang med rnams sam/ rkang gnyis rnams sam/ rkang bzhi rnams sam/ rkang mang rnams sam/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs can ma yin pa
218a4(mdo sde): rnams sam/ 'du shes can rnams sam/ 'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes yod pa yang ma yin/ 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/ 
218a5(mdo sde): de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya de dag par rdzogs bya'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par bsten to// sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung
218a6(mdo sde): ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du
218a7(mdo sde): mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' shig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam/ 'das
218a8(mdo sde): ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par bstan to// chos la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par/ 
218b1(mdo sde): dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du ltar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog/ 
218b2(mdo sde): 'ba' shig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ tshogs sam/ 'dus pa 'am/ mang po
218b3(mdo sde): 'am/ 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la mchog yin par bstan ste/ dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su ya
218b4(mdo sde): rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du ltar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi
218b5(mdo sde): nang du ltar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyis mchog 'ba' shig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa
218b6(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
218b7(mdo sde): bam po bcu bzhi pa// ma he zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / po 'brang 'khor gyi mi rnams
218b8(mdo sde): dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / deng dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang
219a1(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding
219a2(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / 
219a3(mdo sde): gdan dang / snyan gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ko sa la'i ljongs rgya zhing gshegs pa las nags khrod gcig tu byon pa dang / nags/ 
219a4(mdo sde): khrod de na ma he khyu chen po dang / ma he'i rdzi lnga brgya 'kho da do// de nas re shig ni de'i nang na ma he stobs dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de mi gzhan dag
219a5(mdo sde): gi dri tshor na phyi bzhin rgyug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyang pogs der gsheg so// de nas ma de'i rdzi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa thag ring po
219a6(mdo sde): zhig nas mthong ngo // de nis de dag gis skad chen por bos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na ma he ma rungs pa mchis kyis/ shul 'dir mi gsheg su gsol zhes byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis
219a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kyangs 'dir dus la bab par shes kyis khyed snying ma chung shig/ de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thig ring po zhig nas mthong ba dang / rngam ldang du gzar nas bcom
219a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der brgyug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun log su seng ge ral pa can ral pa g.yengs pa lnga sprul da glo g.yas g.yos me chen po lnga sprul to// stong du ni lcags kyi/ 
219b1(mdo sde): pha 'ongs chen po zhig sprul to// de nas ma he des phyogs kun tu 'jigs pa chen po mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lces balnga
219b2(mdo sde): nas/ zhum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bltaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la des brda phrad pa'i slad du bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad mi rtag
219b3(mdo sde): pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum bstan nas/ tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de de thos nas nga so// de nas bco
219b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal nas/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la// da ni nga yis ci byar yod// mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis// don med dus pas ci la
219b5(mdo sde): pan// 'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can// nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la// dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs// 'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas ma he ma rungs
219b6(mdo sde): ba des rang gi lus la smad de// kha 'chos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas skyes pa'i srog chags rnams ni me'i drod che bas de skye nad par shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por
219b7(mdo sde): skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes
219b8(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas
220a1(mdo sde): sngon ma par gyur pa'i lha bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi bdag/ 
220a2(mdo sde): zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o// de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shol dang se mo dos
220a3(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan po'i cod pan can lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / smig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid mtshan mo lha'i me
220a4(mdo sde): tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ma rang ri ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ nags khrod de dag thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar
220a5(mdo sde): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'du ga go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ma her gyur pa'i
220a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thug su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas
220a7(mdo sde): sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga'
220a8(mdo sde): tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgra rnams bcad pa dang / 
220b1(mdo sde): mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag po 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ 
220b2(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis kyang mi bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge slong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang
220b3(mdo sde): ma bgyis lag so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi gzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan
220b4(mdo sde): 'das pa'i lam yang dag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/ 
220b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// / mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang na/ dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba
220b6(mdo sde): yid thub pa khyod kyi deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // 
220b7(mdo sde): lha'i 'jig rten khas ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / 
220b8(mdo sde): nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo // de nas ma he rdzi de dag gis snang ba chen
221a1(mdo sde): po mthong ngo // de mthong nas the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdang sum bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis/ 
221a2(mdo sde): te/ lnga'i 'od kyi snang bar bgyid pa de su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyi ma he de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum
221a3(mdo sde): ba'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de ma dang sum nga'i thad nga 'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bstan te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnasu song ngo // de nas ma he rdzi de dag gis
221a4(mdo sde): mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te ngo mtshar te// dud 'gro'i skye gnasu skyes pa 'di yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom lnga na 'das dang phrad nas lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa
221a5(mdo sde): mthong bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis ci ste/ khyad par tho ba bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
221a6(mdo sde): bcas pa zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ de dag gis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams
221a7(mdo sde): cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ 
221a8(mdo sde): btsun pa sngon ma har gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des ma her skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ 
221b1(mdo sde): ma he rdzi 'di rnams kyis ni las ci bgyis na des mahe rdzir gyur lags/ las gang bgyis na rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags bcom
221b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon
221b3(mdo sde): mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing sngags pas na/ de dag nyid kyi las byas shing srugs pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing
221b4(mdo sde): sngags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin pa ra mi 'gyur/ mu~Mr khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi kha mas la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dag
221b5(mdo sde): dang mi dge ba byas shing / bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i bung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig lan/ ma par smin par 'gyuraro// lus can dag gis la
221b6(mdo sde): rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyi du smin par 'gyur// dge slong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye dag
221b7(mdo sde): tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul byar
221b8(mdo sde): kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na sin drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyin/ 
222a1(mdo sde): na rten cing bzhug so// de'i tshe dge slong dag gtan la 'bebs par byed pa na/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang gtan la 'bes pa'i nang na 'dug
222a2(mdo sde): go// de'i nang na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong dag kyang yod de/ de sde snod gsum pa la 'dri bar byed la/ des la ni lan mo thebs pa dang / de khros nas ngag gi las rtsub po byang ste/ nags
222a3(mdo sde): kye ma he dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes shes bya'o// de'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang ma he rdzi dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes shes smraso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji
222a4(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa/ de nyid ma he 'di yin no// slob ma de dag ni ma he rdzi 'di dag yin te/ las des na tshe rabs lnga brgyar ma her skyes so// 
222a5(mdo sde): slob ma rnams kyang ma he rdzi lnga brgyar gyur to// nga la sem sa dga' bar gyur pa des lhar skye so// dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni bden pa
222a6(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso// dge slong dag de bas na ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/ ci nas ma he deng ma he rdzi rnams kyi nyes pa de lta bu
222a7(mdo sde): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu de'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par gyur par dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
222a8(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bsnyen pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal
222b1(mdo sde): po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang
222b2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mar byas/ mchod
