222b3(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'apo chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
222b4(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
222b5(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe sum cu/ gsum pa'i lha'i nang na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas shes pa
222b6(mdo sde): ba zhig yod de/ de chos nyan pa'i phyir rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du 'gro'o// de nas byis re shig na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas lnga brgya dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin
222b7(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi bsam pa dang / 
222b8(mdo sde): bag la nyal dang khams dang / rang bzhin thug su chud na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs pa'i 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi 'jig tshogs
223a1(mdo sde): la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan brjodade/ 
223a2(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo
223a3(mdo sde): rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyab pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma
223a4(mdo sde): bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyi sa kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma ba dgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so// 
223a5(mdo sde): yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ bsod nam sa rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag
223a6(mdo sde): gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thog/ 
223a7(mdo sde): / mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nang spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'byung ba dga'
223a8(mdo sde): 'gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yul 'jig rten khas ltas lha yul song // de nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas tshong / 
223b1(mdo sde): pa khe spogs byin pa dang / zhing ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan
223b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo // de'i tshe dge slong dag srong dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
223b3(mdo sde): kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhes pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag
223b4(mdo sde): po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i sbrad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
223b5(mdo sde): pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi ngal lta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ lha'i bu bsnyen gnas
223b6(mdo sde): g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas song // de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the
223b7(mdo sde): tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha'i bu bsnyen gnas ga las byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
223b8(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lag so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid le zung shig ngas/ 
224a1(mdo sde): bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
224a2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi sto/ 
224a3(mdo sde): gsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bar na si na drang song smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhag so// phyis re shig na rgyal be kr-i kri btsa
224a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyi du song ngo // de nas re shig na bram ze gnyis drang song smra ba'idon zhig la song ba dang / dri gnyis kyis rgyal po de/ rgyal po'i 'tshon
224a5(mdo sde): ba chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu stobs chen po dang lnga na pa mthong ngo // de nas de gnyis rgyal srid la 'dod pa skyes na sa/ de gnyis kyis dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ kye sangs rgyas kyi
224a6(mdo sde): dge bsnyen las ci zhag byas na/ de las ci bsags pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes byaso// dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ gang gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa
224a7(mdo sde): yongasu dag par bsrungs pa de'i ni ci bsams pa dang / ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyu ro zhes byaso// de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyim bdag du stod las bsnyen gnas yan
224a8(mdo sde): lag brgyad pa blangs te bsrung so// de na gcig gis ni yongasu dag par bsrungs te/ de nas shi nas rgyal po kri kri'i bu skyes te/ de'i ming legs skyes shes btags nas pa shi ba'i 'og
224b1(mdo sde): tu de rgyal por bcu go// gcig shos kyis ni bsnyen gnas nyams par byas te/ de ni shi nas klu'i nang du skyes te/ de'i steng du nyin cig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bye chen bab ste/ des rus
224b2(mdo sde): pa 'ba' shig lus par byed do// de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di las gang gis 'bras bu yin/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa yin na/ des bdag gi 'di lta bu'i
224b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug snyam mo// de nas des bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag gis blangs pa las bslab pa lhod par byas pa des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis
224b4(mdo sde): nyam su myong la/ gang gis blangs te/ bsrungs pa de sa ni rgyal srid thob par gyur to snyam mo// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ da yang bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgya
224b5(mdo sde): dang ldan par bsrung bar bya'o// 'on tang bdag klu'i skye gnas las thar par 'gyur yang srid do// snyam ma~M/ de nas bram ze'i cha lug su bdag nyid sprul nas/ rgyal po'i
224b6(mdo sde): zad du 'ongs te phyin nas rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig/ sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces bstod nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la 'tshal
224b7(mdo sde): gyis/ lha bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa btsal du gsol// gal te ma btsal na gdon mi 'tshal bar lha'i dbu tshal ba bdun du 'gas par 'gyu ro zhes byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar
224b8(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag ste mi dga' la skyi bung zhes byas nas/ gser 'bum yod pa'i gnod rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ bdag gi yul thams cad du dril bsgrags
225a1(mdo sde): nas su ngal bsnyen gnas yan lag rgyad dang ldan pa ston pa de la gser 'bum 'di sbyin no// bkur bsti chen pos kyang bkur bya'o zhes bsgo'o// de nas re shig na/ 
225a2(mdo sde): shing mkhan gyi bu mo bud med rgan mo zhig 'dug pa des rgyal po la ka ba zhig bstan te/ sngon bdag gi brtag tu ka ba 'di la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod pa bgyid
225a3(mdo sde): na 'di phyung ste gzigs shig ces byas so// de nis rgyal pos zham ring ba rnams la ka ba 'di phyung shig ces sgo'o// de nas rgyal po zham ring rnams kyis ka ba de byung ba dang / de'i 'og/ 
225a4(mdo sde): nas bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i bzhi lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun gser gyi glegs bam
225a5(mdo sde): shig la bris pa zhig rnyed do// de nas rgyal pos klu de la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa zhig bris te/ byin no// drang srong smra ba gnas pa'i drang srong khri nyi
225a6(mdo sde): stong gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byaso// klu des kyang bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrungs nas thang la byung ste/ 
225a7(mdo sde): lus bor nas de kha'i chos te 'dug go// de nas shi ste g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skye so// dge slong dag bsnyen gnas ni de nas byung
225a8(mdo sde): sde ming yang de las btag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
225b1(mdo sde): ngang pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon/ 
225b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / kla rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / 
225b3(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
225b4(mdo sde): dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sang ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang / na pa/ na bza' dang / zhag kha zas dang / gzims
225b5(mdo sde): cha dang / gdon dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams ba rnyis pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du ma dpa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon
225b6(mdo sde): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 
225b7(mdo sde): skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / 'thab bzhi pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang / kha lang dang / ma/ 
225b8(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan par 'dag ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyang so// phyis re shig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la/ 
226a1(mdo sde): / blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / ban tsa la'i rgyal pos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ngang pa lnga brgya skyes/ 
226a2(mdo sde): su bskur te/ gang gi tshe rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba de'i tshe/ ngang pa lnga brgya po de dag phul lo// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin te/ rgyal
226a3(mdo sde): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du gtang nas/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa gshos gsol zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dgra bcom ldan
226a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du 'gro la/ bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang de rnams la khyod ma byin te/ de dag gis zos nas tshim zhing dbang po rtas te 'khod do// 
226a5(mdo sde): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po de dag la chos ston pa de/ 'i tshe/ dang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ cho
226a6(mdo sde): nyan par byed do// de nas de dag tsha thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyeso// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gcu/ 
226a7(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas ngang ba las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / 
226a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon dang bar gyur pa'i lha bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan
226b1(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyamo// de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha
226b2(mdo sde): bu rna cha gdub bkor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma
226b3(mdo sde): la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / k+Shu mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / men de re ba rnams kyi
226b4(mdo sde): bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor to// chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'ang
226b5(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar 'khod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dang bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rong bzhin thugs ma
226b6(mdo sde): nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon dang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtsom
226b7(mdo sde): bo nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
226b8(mdo sde): kyi bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bskal ba dang / ngan song gi sgo bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag cag lha dang mi
227a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du zhugs pa 'di lta bu ri bdag cag la bas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ 
227a2(mdo sde): nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang mi bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so// yang smras pa
227a3(mdo sde): nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyed kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba bye// mya ngan 'das lam bdag cag rnams
227a4(mdo sde): kyis thob// bdag cag de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag tsag sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rga la// 'phags pa dgyes
227a5(mdo sde): ba'i zhi ba'i go 'bang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lngas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dkar ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras/ 
227a6(mdo sde): bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang rnams dgar 'gyur te// btud cing nubs gnyis pa ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten khas ltas lnga/ 
227a7(mdo sde): yul song // de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las
227a8(mdo sde): thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad da lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu dongango // de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la
227b1(mdo sde): gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
227b2(mdo sde): ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po rings pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ 
227b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la lta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// 
227b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang ba lnga brgya 'dir btang ba khyod kyis mthong dam/ btsun pa mthong lag so// bka' stsal pa/ de dag nga la soms dga' bar gyur
227b5(mdo sde): te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lnga yul ba zang por skyes te/ de dag ma dang sum pa'i thad lhags nas de dag la ngas chos bstan te/ bder pa mthong bar gyur nas
227b6(mdo sde): rang gis gnas su dong ngo // de nas dge slong dag ze tsam skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon dang bar gyur pa'i
227b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des ngang bar skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na/ des lha'i nang du skye pa te/ bden pa mthong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
227b8(mdo sde): pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshigs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag pas shing bas
228a1(mdo sde): // bas na/ sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas/ 
228a2(mdo sde): shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba
228a3(mdo sde): dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// 
228a4(mdo sde): bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong ngag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po
228a5(mdo sde): 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyes khri thub pa na// de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rte/ 
228a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer b.ran
228a7(mdo sde): sin drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so// de'i tshe 'di dag rab tu byung ba las bslab pa la lhod par byas pa des na ngang par skyeso// nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni
228a8(mdo sde): lhar skyes so// bslab pa lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu ngas par
228b1(mdo sde): gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar
228b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ le gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par
228b3(mdo sde): bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slo ga yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
228b4(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do// rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshig su bcad pa drug pa rdzogs so// sngam ni gser 'od da na drin ma dang / khyad pa 'angs // 
228b5(mdo sde): ldan sdug gu dang // pad+ma mig dang rnga sgra dang // bu dang ni/ ma gyad pa dang // gser 'od ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas pa/ com ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
228b6(mdo sde): be rnams dang / byug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mo rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / dod dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lham
228b7(mdo sde): yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byis/ mchod pa byas te/ lnga dang / klu dang / gnod
228b8(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza'/ 
229a1(mdo sde): / dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing nagro
229a2(mdo sde): da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya byug cing longs spyod che ba yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnams thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i
229a3(mdo sde): nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ do de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod
229a4(mdo sde): ba las chung ma la bu chags nas/ da zla ba bachad dpa dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lda na sdug la mdzes po me'i kha dog las ni 'das lha'i kha dog ni mthon
229a5(mdo sde): ba 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba zhig btsas te/ de'i gser gyi 'od kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gnas/ thams cad snang bar bya'o// de nas ba ma dang / sem
229a6(mdo sde): can gzhan dag gis de mthong nas ltad mo la lhags te/ sems can gyi khyad par 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs zhig gu zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems pa la zhug so// 
229a7(mdo sde): de na de btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di bcis pa na/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser gyi
229a8(mdo sde): 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'dir ming gser 'od ces gdag so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u gser 'od pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma
229b1(mdo sde): gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / num mar dang / ma
229b2(mdo sde): gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang mkhas shing gsal la
229b3(mdo sde): yid gzhungs pa dang / dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig go// phyis
229b4(mdo sde): re shig ni de na byad gzugs kyi rgyags pas myos te/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol na rtse zhing 'dug go// shAkya mang po dag cig kyang shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo // de
229b5(mdo sde): nas khye'u gser 'od kyis mthong nas dris pa khyed ga 'dong / de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang sa la lta ba'i phyir shing na go da'i kun dga' ra bar
229b6(mdo sde): 'gro'o// de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas shes bya ba thos te/ sngon ma thos pa'i ming thos nas spu thams cad zing zhes byas te/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas de 'di
229b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro gor ma chag snyam nas/ de'ang shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / khye'u gse
229b8(mdo sde): 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od
230a1(mdo sde): 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu'i kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag du
230a2(mdo sde): byad gzugs kyis brgyags pa med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas
230a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ de chos thos pa dang rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to// de nas re shig na pa ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song
230a4(mdo sde): te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
230a5(mdo sde): gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa/ 'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / brnyes par rdzogs shi ngadage slong gi dngos po 'thob du rung na ba dag kyang bcom ldan
230a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tsha lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas/ khye'u gser 'od la 'di skad ces bkar stsal
230a7(mdo sde): to// gzhon nu tshar shog tshangs par spyod cig/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la/ sra dang / kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas
230a8(mdo sde): lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/ lagan ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to// 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas de ni mgo bregs lus
230b1(mdo sde): la snam sbyar gyon/ sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/ mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la
230b2(mdo sde): yid la byed pa'i lung pog ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
230b3(mdo sde): cad rnyil pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'bor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ 
230b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bla lwa bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta/ 
230b5(mdo sde): bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sngags bcom ba/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag pa/ ra rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / dkur
230b6(mdo sde): bstil mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ 
230b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gser 'od kyis las gang dag dgyes na/ des 'di ltar gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rab tu byung nas dag bcom pa nyid
230b8(mdo sde): mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gser 'od nyid kyis mngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rga ba bzhin
231a1(mdo sde): du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ gser 'od nyid kyis las byang shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myongag
231a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par
231a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro// lus can dag gi la
231a4(mdo sde): rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar ya dud mi za/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu ning du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngor byung ba 'das pa'i dus ma ma skal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig
231a5(mdo sde): pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul
231a6(mdo sde): bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing
231a7(mdo sde): bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag
231a8(mdo sde): ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'ang so// de nas rgyal po gzhan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi la byas pa
231b1(mdo sde): mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs bto do// de nas re shig na'i
231b2(mdo sde): bdag cig mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der song ba las mchod rten de las gser gyi me long zhig ltung ba des mthong nas des de'i rno ba'i gong rgyan du bcos nas mchod rten de la
231b3(mdo sde): btags te/ spos dang / gdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston
231b4(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig ces byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
231b5(mdo sde): khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u gser 'od 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur bsti byas
231b6(mdo sde): ba des na 'di lta bur byad gzugs khyad par can du gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso// dge slong dag de ltar na las cig tu nges par gan/ 
231b7(mdo sde): pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma
231b8(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
232a1(mdo sde): 'ba' shig la gangang bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag
232a2(mdo sde): yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// // dri zhom zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po
232a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lnga
232a4(mdo sde): ma yin rnams dang / namakha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/ ma chod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
232a5(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdon dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang brtsa
232a6(mdo sde): pa/ yul ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhag so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing
232a7(mdo sde): rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang ldan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' la
232a8(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyod de// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dag lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug
232b1(mdo sde): kha mdzes pa zhig mi'i kha dog las ni 'das lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/ de'i kha nas me tog ud pa la'i dri 'byung ba lus thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri byung ngo // 
232b2(mdo sde): de nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de nye du rnams na re 'di'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams cad/ 
232b3(mdo sde): tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dri zhim zhes gdagaso zhes ze ro// de nas khye'u ngo zhim pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i me ma gnyis dang / dri ma
232b4(mdo sde): 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad
232b5(mdo sde): kyi khyad par bzang ngo // cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang / sngon gyi rgyu stobs kyi shugs kyis dad pa dang ldan la/ dge
232b6(mdo sde): zhing bsam la bzang la/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ gang gi tshe khye'u dri zhim dpung rgyan dang / mgul pa'i do shal dang
232b7(mdo sde): gad bus brgyan te/ srang gi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan gyi dri gsung gis grong khyer thams cad khyab par gyur te/ skye bo mang pos kyang lnga'i spos kyi dri tshor nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan
232b8(mdo sde): du 'dzin te/ 'di skad du skye ma bsod nims ngag gi mthu zhes mdzar to// byis re shig khye'u dri zhis shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' re bar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu
233a1(mdo sde): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan gnyi ma stong pas ldan
233a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcog
233a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsams pa dang / bag la zhal ba
233a4(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs chad nas/ 'phags pa'i bded pa bani rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ba stan te/ de zos nas khye'u dri nim gyis 'jig tshogs la
233a5(mdo sde): lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bam nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya sa te/ bden pa mthong nas pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan
233a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu bya'o// des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa tham
233a7(mdo sde): cad rnyib pa dang / ldang ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du/ 
233a8(mdo sde): byas te// dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar ma'am pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spas/ 
233b1(mdo sde): ba lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / 
233b2(mdo sde): bkur bsti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// des nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the/ 
233b3(mdo sde): tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dri zhim gyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di lta bu'i kha nas ni ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams
233b4(mdo sde): cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dri zhim nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan du tshigs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang
233b5(mdo sde): ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na// dri zhim nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan
233b6(mdo sde): su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams pa rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ tshu'i khams dang / me'i kham
233b7(mdo sde): dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa de rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba'
233b8(mdo sde): zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong
234a1(mdo sde): dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa cig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
234a2(mdo sde): zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldanas rnam par gzig
234a3(mdo sde): shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
234a4(mdo sde): las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'daso// de nas rgyal po mnyan yod kyis/ bcom
234a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad cig yod la/ 'bang du rgyang grags gcig
234a6(mdo sde): yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus sngon yang lugs btod do// khyim bdag gcig gis kyang de la dad pa skyes nas/ spos dang / byug pa sna tshogs phul te/ bdug pa dang / 
234a7(mdo sde): me tog gis mchod nas smon lam btab po/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis na/ bdags kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag theb par
234a8(mdo sde): gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu la mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe
234b1(mdo sde): de'i dus na/ khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u dri zhim 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur bsti byas pa/ des
234b2(mdo sde): na 'di lta bur dri zhim par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam/ 
234b3(mdo sde): par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyu ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa 'dren mar 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang
234b4(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// dge slong de/ dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par
234b5(mdo sde): dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dpe slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ 
234b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam po bco lnga pa// byad bzangs shes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa rgyal po rnams
234b7(mdo sde): dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams
234b8(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / 
235a1(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / maM 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
235a2(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyan gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ 
235a3(mdo sde): ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam
235a4(mdo sde): thos bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga'
235a5(mdo sde): mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur sprod pa la sa/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na
235a6(mdo sde): sdug la mdzes pa ma'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lho'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ lus byed dpe med la mdog 'jam pa/ lus kyi bdun mtho' ba/ che bar grags pa zhig btsa so// de nas
235a7(mdo sde): de bcas pa'i btsas ston byas khye'u 'di'i mi 'ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di'i lus dpe med pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming byang bzangs/ 
235a8(mdo sde): shes gdag so zhos zer ro// de nas khye'u byad bzangs pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu mi snun pa'i me ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ 
235b1(mdo sde): ma ma brgyad la bdad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gnan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ ma
235b2(mdo sde): nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba dag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa
235b3(mdo sde): zhig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dang tha na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang mchod cing rjes pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// des sa phyogs gang du gom pa bor ba de dag
235b4(mdo sde): gtsang mar gyur te/ de ltar bsod nams dang ldan zhing che bar gragaso// byis re shig na de shing na gro de'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu
235b5(mdo sde): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par ba rgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa// / 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag
235b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'od mngara' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lnga bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan
235b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyadan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / 
235b8(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstad te/ de thos nas khye'u byad bzangs kyis 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon pa
236a1(mdo sde): nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa
236a2(mdo sde): la rab tu byung // des brtsod pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas bo la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtad par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba
236a3(mdo sde): ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad mod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ 
236a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha 'a dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan da/ 
236a5(mdo sde): spangs pa lnga bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo 'a'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa
236a6(mdo sde): dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsngal mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams tha
236a7(mdo sde): tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa byad bzangs kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di lta bu'i lus 'di lta bur gyur
236a8(mdo sde): la dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal po/ dge slong dag byed bzangs nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs brnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang / 
236b1(mdo sde): ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ byad bzangs nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig
236b2(mdo sde): nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi kham
236b3(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig pa rnam par smin par
236b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das
236b5(mdo sde): pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/ pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar
236b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mikhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten
236b7(mdo sde): du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzadas/ 
236b8(mdo sde): shong zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying bu yongasu mya ngan las 'ang so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la/ 
237a1(mdo sde): sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas rin po rgya sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug du dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig
237a2(mdo sde): yod pa zhig brtsigs te// de rgyal po gnyen yod gnyen gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / blon po'i tshogs kyis nas ring byas pas/ mchod rten gyi dus stor byaso// phyis re shis
237a3(mdo sde): na nyi ma gcig gcig mi dbul po zhig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song nas der me tog rnyis pa dag dang / mchod rten rdul gyis yog pa dag mthong ngo // de nas des sangs
237a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas/ dad pa skyes te/ phyags ma blangs nas mchod rten yang phyags/ me tog rnyis pa yang bstsal to// de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing dri ma med pa
237a5(mdo sde): mthong nas dad pa smras te/ zhangs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang yon tani 'di lta bu dag tho
237a6(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ sten pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur ces byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sem
237a7(mdo sde): de che de'i das na/ mi dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ byad bzangs 'di yin te/ des mchod rten la phyag dang byas pas na/ byad gzugs bzang por gyur to// smon lam pa
237a8(mdo sde): pa des tshe 'di 'ad la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum dbyas so// dge slong dag de ltar las gcig tu ngas par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag pa
237b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur/ 
237b2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la btad par
237b3(mdo sde): bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
237b4(mdo sde): la mngon par bstod do// // stobs lnga na zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal/ po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
237b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams
237b6(mdo sde): dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ wa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
237b7(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / ramakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mcho cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza'
237b8(mdo sde): dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro di kun dgar / 
238a1(mdo sde): ba na bcug so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod re ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya ma ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang
238a2(mdo sde): ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las dang ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur sprod pa las chung ma
238a3(mdo sde): le bu rags nas de zla ba brgyad dang dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing ldan sdug la mdzes pa stobs kyi shugs gzhan las 'phags po zhig btsas so// 
238a4(mdo sde): de nas de bcas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas na/ de'i
238a5(mdo sde): phyir khye'u 'di'i ming stobs ldan zhes gdagaso zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u stobs ldan pang na 'tshe ba'i me ma gnyis dang / num snun po'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma
238a6(mdo sde): 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ dam ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / no dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang
238a7(mdo sde): yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la
238a8(mdo sde): phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs po/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go// de nas phyis re shig na de shing n+ya gro nga'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / sangs
238b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byud bzang po brgyad chub mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gi
238b2(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ ci me stong pas ldog pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba
238b3(mdo sde): bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
238b4(mdo sde): de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kham sa dang / rang bzhin thug su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan
238b5(mdo sde): te/ de thos nas khye'u stobs ldan gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon pa nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas
238b6(mdo sde): te/ des bden pa mthong nas pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga'i 'khor ba'i
238b7(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin
238b8(mdo sde): par rtsad mod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser
239a1(mdo sde): dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs/ 
239a2(mdo sde): bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti la mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang // 
239a3(mdo sde): dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod gsangs
239a4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa stobs ldan gyis las gang bgyis na/ des 'di'i stobs dang /  ldan par gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur
239a5(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag stobs ldan nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan da ga tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dab
239a6(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ stobs ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams
239a7(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur te/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ rlu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin pa
239a8(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ lus can
239b1(mdo sde): dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang rgad mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa da
239b2(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i
239b3(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ nga rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na// rten cing bzhug
239b4(mdo sde): ba las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zang pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan
239b5(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i dpengasu mya ngan las 'ang so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi mtsho da pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi la byas pa'i mchod
239b6(mdo sde): mkhor khor yug tu dpag tshad cig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa deng skye bo bal po chos glu blangs gar byas pas mchod rten
239b7(mdo sde): rdul gyi yog par gyur ro// phyis re shig na khyim bdag cig mchod can gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song ba dang / des mchod rten gyi 'khor rdul gyi yog pa mthong ngo // de nas khyim bdag des sangs
239b8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yon tan rje su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ spos kyi 'di ga til mar dang sbyar ba phul te/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta
240a1(mdo sde): bu dag mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi gnyis par byed par ma gyur ces bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe
240a2(mdo sde): de'i dus na khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni stobs ldan 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur bsti byas pa des na/ stobs dang ldan par gyur to// 
240a3(mdo sde): smod lam btab pa des ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// de slong dag de ltar las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// 
240a4(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag de bas
240a5(mdo sde): na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnam sa 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyi
240a6(mdo sde): de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 
240a7(mdo sde): sdug gu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
240a8(mdo sde): ring ding dben rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnamapa dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
240b1(mdo sde): kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams/ 
240b2(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / 
240b3(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/ shAkya phyag cing
240b4(mdo sde): nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam
240b5(mdo sde): ba las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse ning dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla
240b6(mdo sde): ba brgyad dam/ dag lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa che bar grags pa mthong na/ dga' ba zhig btsas te/ de btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya
240b7(mdo sde): gnas thams cad grags pas rgyas par gyur to// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u
240b8(mdo sde): 'di btsas ma thag tu skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ khye'u 'dor ming sdug gu zhes gdag so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u sdug gu pangan 'tsho ba ma ma gnyis dang / num snun
241a1(mdo sde): pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma pa gnyis dang / rtse ba'i pha ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / no dang / mang dang / 
241a2(mdo sde): zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye grags par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan la
241a3(mdo sde): dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje re ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong pa la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab
241a4(mdo sde): tu sbrid pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong pa rin po la gnas pa zhig ste/ des dge slong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa la sbyin pa rnam pa sna rogs gto
241a5(mdo sde): bas sdud par byed de/ de nas phyis re shig ra khye'u sdug gu shing n+ya gre da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
241a6(mdo sde): sus skyertsa gtses kyis lags par brgyan po/ dpe byed bzang po brgyad cum mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'ad ba gang gis brgyan pa/ oM mthong bas lhag pa'i 'ad mang ga dzan pa
241a7(mdo sde): bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag/ 
241a8(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i pir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 
241b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bston te/ de thos nas khye'u sdug gus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bco
241b2(mdo sde): nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / 
241b3(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam
241b4(mdo sde): bar 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yi na bar rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ ngagra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom
241b5(mdo sde): pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag ma thal du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs
241b6(mdo sde): ga lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom nas/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / 
241b7(mdo sde): bkur bsti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thos
241b8(mdo sde): cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngag gus las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di grags pa chen po dang ldan pa dang / sdug cing yid da'ong bar gyu
242a1(mdo sde): la/ rag tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sdug ga nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs
242a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sdug gu nyid kyi las byes shing
242a3(mdo sde): bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ rmi
242a4(mdo sde): khams dang / ma'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la na/ ma par smin par mi 'gyur/ las dge ba dang / las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i
242a5(mdo sde): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig/ la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnam sa ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs
242a6(mdo sde): shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
242a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
242a8(mdo sde): pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan ni rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs
242b1(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu
242b2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdang la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bon las byas pa'i mchodo rten khor khor
242b3(mdo sde): yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'bang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsig so// de nas phyis re shig na dpyid kyi dus su shing rnams me tog rgyas te/ me tog rnam pa
242b4(mdo sde): sna tshogs 'thung ba na/ khyim bdag gcig cig gis rgyal po la gsol to// bdag ni lha dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags par
242b5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// rgyal pos smras pa de ltar gyis shig/ de nas khyim bdag de dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis dril bsgrags te/ me
242b6(mdo sde): tog rnam pa sna tshogs sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog bdags te der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas sems dga' ba bskyed
242b7(mdo sde): nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin
242b8(mdo sde): ba de ni sdug gu 'di yin te/ des skye bo ngal po che dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa des ni/ skye bo phal po che'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rgyud nyid kyis na/ 
243a1(mdo sde): blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par/ 
243a2(mdo sde): smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma
243a3(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu
243a4(mdo sde): nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkur stsal nas/ dge slong dad/ 
243a5(mdo sde): yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la bstod do// // pad+ma'i mig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / 
243a6(mdo sde): blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin
243a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas
243a8(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
243b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge/ sa
243b2(mdo sde): dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya glo da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin
243b3(mdo sde): pa yang shing brgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa laso chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang
243b4(mdo sde): lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ 
243b5(mdo sde): khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdig lo mdzes pa/ mig pad+ma sngon po 'dra ba/ mgo bo la lnga'i nor bu rin po che mthon ka thogs pa zhig bcas te/ des
243b6(mdo sde): grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nir bu mthon ka'i kha dog can du byaso// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dog
243b7(mdo sde): par byed de/ nye du rnams nar khye'u mig pad+ma 'dra bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pad+ma'i mig ces gdag so// zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u pad+ma'i mig bang na 'tsho ba'i/ 
243b8(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ de ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi'o/ 
244a1(mdo sde): pa dang / ko dang / mang dang / kun par dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyang par 'bong cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ 'tsho'i nang shrI
244a2(mdo sde): bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid
244a3(mdo sde): reb chos 'dod pa gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu smin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de
244a4(mdo sde): dang deng lnga dang pi rnams kyis b.red cing rjod do// de nas phyis re shig ni khyo'u pad+ma'i mig shing n+ya gro dong kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / ngas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 
244a5(mdo sde): sku skyes bu rin po'i mtshan subacu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma
244a6(mdo sde): stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po re'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// 
244a7(mdo sde): dga' ba bskyed ras kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
244a8(mdo sde): dang bas pa dang / bag la 'al dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thug su chud nas/ 'bogs pa'i bdan pa bzhi rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de zos nas/ 
244b1(mdo sde): mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ phas la gsol te/ 
244b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nges brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad bas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan pa
244b3(mdo sde): rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod te/ nyon mongs pa
244b4(mdo sde): cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid ma/ dngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum dpa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / 
244b5(mdo sde): bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthi la du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rog pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom
244b6(mdo sde): pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ sring pa'i rnyeng pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti la mi lta dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i
244b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas gyur to// de nas re shig na de bsod snyoms la song ba dang / skye bo phal po chos de la bltas na ngo mtshar gyur to// de nas
245a1(mdo sde): / pad+ma'i mig bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po cho ma mchis par mdzad
245a2(mdo sde): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na med par bya mi nuso// de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma
245a3(mdo sde): ded pa rnams kyis mi mthong bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad// de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
245a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa pad+ma'i mig gi las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
245a5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshegs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhi/ du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas
245a6(mdo sde): shing bsngags pas na/ pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan dag su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa
245a7(mdo sde): rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ nu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge
245a8(mdo sde): ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang
245b1(mdo sde): chud mi pa// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin
245b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ 
245b3(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs
245b4(mdo sde): ba la/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag
245b5(mdo sde): ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying su yongs mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyi// bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdang gi mchod pa
245b6(mdo sde): byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsegs te/ der srog chags
245b7(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du mas bkur bsti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re shig na dang dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru'i don grub ste/ byis 'ongs nas/ des de
245b8(mdo sde): nang nas nor bu chen po mthon ka chen po zhig khyer te 'ongs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rje su dran te/ nor bu rin po che ba
246a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab la btabs nas/ de'i mthus phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams thams cad mthon ka'i kha dog lta bu 'dug
246a2(mdo sde): par bso// me tog pad+ma dag gis kyang mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par
246a3(mdo sde): gyur cig/ mi gnyis par ma gyur cig ces byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni
246a4(mdo sde): pad+ma'i mig yin te/ nges bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rjen la nor bu rin po che btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung ngo // 
246a5(mdo sde): pad+ma sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa des ni/ mig pad+ma sngon po lta bur gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni/ tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyidadi mngon sum du byaso// dge slong
246a6(mdo sde): ngag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa
246a7(mdo sde): yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro// las 'dren pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / la
246a8(mdo sde): 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
246b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / rnga sgra zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
246b2(mdo sde): 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams
246b3(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ 
246b4(mdo sde): ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / ga nod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mdzod cing shes pa'i
246b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan tho
246b6(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod chag yongasu 'dzin pa
246b7(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ dede dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing
246b8(mdo sde): dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzan
247a1(mdo sde): zhing lda na sdug la mdzes pa/ che bar grags pa/ bya ka la bing ka ltar skad sman pa/ rnga sgra ltar gdangs snyan pa zhig btsa so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas/ 
247a2(mdo sde): ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rnga smra na/ 
247a3(mdo sde): gangagaso zhes zer ro// de nas khyi'u rnga spa pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / num snun pa'i pha ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse nga'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad
247a4(mdo sde): la gtan nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang // mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang
247a5(mdo sde): gi pad+ma bzhin du skye grags par gyur to// de yang da da pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje
247a6(mdo sde): can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong pa la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong pa chen po la gnas pa zhig go// de nas phyi zhig
247a7(mdo sde): na khye'u rnga sgra shing n+ya gro da'i kun dgar ra bar song ba dang / ngos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ da
247a8(mdo sde): byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ga rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong
247b1(mdo sde): nas/ mthong ma thag tu nges bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyedado// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i
247b2(mdo sde): phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa
247b3(mdo sde): bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun
247b4(mdo sde): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing
247b5(mdo sde): phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ po ma lag sol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas pol
247b6(mdo sde): mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi bstan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'dzi/ 
247b7(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags
247b8(mdo sde): dang bral nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i
248a1(mdo sde): sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti
248a2(mdo sde): la pi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i ga su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ 
248a3(mdo sde): tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rnga sgras las bgyis na/ des 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ 
248a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnga sgra nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ 
248a5(mdo sde): dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rngasgra nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan
248a6(mdo sde): su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i
248a7(mdo sde): khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shing
248a8(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi ga// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag
248b1(mdo sde): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar
248b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten
248b3(mdo sde): du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na/ bzhugs pa la re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas// 
248b4(mdo sde): shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'daso// de nas rgya bo gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdang la sku gdung gi mchod pa
248b5(mdo sde): byas nas rin po che sna bzhil byas pa'i mchod rten khro/ ra khor yug tu dpag tshad cig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grag sa gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs/ deng srog chags 'bum dra
248b6(mdo sde): du mas bkur bsti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re shig na khyim bdag gcig gis rol mo'i cha sprang rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mi las rol mo bslabs ka mchod
248b7(mdo sde): rjen dri la phul nas/ de dag mchod rten de la nyin cig bzhin du rol mo'i sgra khyad par dag gis bkur bsti byed do// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag du gyur pa ka
