248b8(mdo sde): yin pa de ni rnga sgra 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rol mo'i sgra'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba des na rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs can du gyur la/ rgyu de nyid
249a1(mdo sde): kyis dang ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngor sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par
249a2(mdo sde): gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dren par
249a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad
249a4(mdo sde): par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
249a5(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / bu zhes bya ba ri/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug
249a6(mdo sde): ngo rnams dang / pho drang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / deng dpon rnams dang / lnga rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / 
249a7(mdo sde): namakha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'ab chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo bas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / lba
249a8(mdo sde): pa yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal
249b1(mdo sde): zas dang / gzis pa dang / gdan dang / snyun gsopa dang / sman thong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra bar bzhug so// de'i
249b2(mdo sde): re ser skya'i gnas ra shAkya phyug cing nor meng la longs spyod chab/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya re ba/ rnam thos bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnab thos bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ 
249b3(mdo sde): rigs mnyam pa las chu de ma blangs nas de de dang ldan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' dgur spong ba las rung ba las bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dag lon te/ bu bcas ras na snag bu che po
249b4(mdo sde): nig byung ste/ pha ma dang / khim de na gnas pa'i gzhan dag dang / g.yog 'khor dong nye du rnams kyis de mthong nas/ 'di lta bu btsas pa ci yin zhes mi dga' bar gyur to// de nas
249b5(mdo sde): re shig na khyim bdag de mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs te/ la gang la oM tshugs bcas nas/ sems khongs su chud cing / 'dug ste/ 'di ci yin su la bstang bar bya shes pa su
249b6(mdo sde): yong snyam mo// de nas ngo blo skyes pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa yin te/ des mkhyen gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
249b7(mdo sde): bsnyad par ba'o snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste pin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod ma 'jigs shig/ ma/ 
249b8(mdo sde): 'jigs shig/ sha snag bu de ras bal legs par rnal ba'i nang ngadu chub la/ zhag bdun gyi bar de nyin cig kyang ngas gsub gsum du lag pa brams te/ 'o ma pa yang dang yang dag/ 
250a1(mdo sde): cig dang / de'i 'og tu rdol te/ bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de dag thams cad chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyuro// de nas khyim bdag des de thos nas mtsho/ 
250a2(mdo sde): tra ya mtshan du gyur te/ bsams pa bdag gis bu de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par bsnyed do snyam nas des de bzhin du byas pa dang / zhag ba dan lon
250a3(mdo sde): ba dang sha snag bu de rdol nas bu brgya byung ste/ thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yang lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ tshan po ro'i stobs dang ldan
250a4(mdo sde): pa sha stag go// de nas ra shig na mthar gyis bskyed bsrings nas cher skyes pa dang / de dag thams cad byad gzugs dang / lang po ro'i rgyags pas dregs te/ phan tshun 'khyam pa la
250a5(mdo sde): shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / de dag gi sa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po ma tshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dang
250a6(mdo sde): byad bzang po barmed cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mang re ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mtho
250a7(mdo sde): nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i
250a8(mdo sde): phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'bags pa'i bden pa
250b1(mdo sde): bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas thams cad kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun
250b2(mdo sde): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de dag thams
250b3(mdo sde): cad kyis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing myi brtun par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyi
250b4(mdo sde): ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par// 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa/ thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon su
250b5(mdo sde): du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan
250b6(mdo sde): spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i skabs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / ku
250b7(mdo sde): bsti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas po'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams
250b8(mdo sde): cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gzhon nu brgya po 'di dag gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des spur du gyur la chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur 'phra/ 
251a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis pa' stsal pa/ 'a rnam pa cing sngon kyi bas gzhan dag tshogs na cing rkye grub pa dang ldan te/ da rnam bzhin du 'thung ba/ 
251a2(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar 'ong las nga ngag byas shing bsags pas na/ ngadag garan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni byi ro// 
251a3(mdo sde): gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ rwa'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba bas shi khe bsag
251a4(mdo sde): pa rnams ri zir pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched na mas 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro// lus can ngag gi las rnams ni// bskal po brgyar yang rlung
251a5(mdo sde): mi za/ tshogs shing ngas la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa
251a6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dal ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lnga
251a7(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal pori pi brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ 
251a8(mdo sde): shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i ma bzhin du phung po'i lag ma med
251b1(mdo sde): ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongs su mya ngan las 'daso// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ ri
251b2(mdo sde): po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag
251b3(mdo sde): du mas bkur bsti byas nas/ mtho ras dang thar par 'gro bar gyur ro// de nas re shig na 'dza' ba bo brgya phyi rol du byung ba dang / de dag gis mchod rten de mthong nas/ de bzhin
251b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes dran te/ de dag tu lhan cig tu til mar spos can gyis byugs nas/ me tog dang / me tig phreng dang / mar me dbul ba dag gis bsnyen bkur bas nas/ 
251b5(mdo sde): lhan cig tu smon lam btab bo/ bdag cag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der spun du gyur te/ lhan cig tu lto cig kho na nas byung bar gyur cig/ chen po che'i stobs
251b6(mdo sde): kyi shags thob pa dang / byad gzugs dang ldan par gyur cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed
251b7(mdo sde): bar ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni chen po che 'di dag yin te/ de dag gis lhan cig tu
251b8(mdo sde): mchod rten la/ bkur bsti byas pa des na/ 'di ltar lhan cig tu skyes te/ tshan po che'i stobs kyi shags thob par gyur to// smon lam btab pa das ni gcig tu 'thun par rab tu byung / 
252a1(mdo sde): bar rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gci// 
252a2(mdo sde): tu nges par gdag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par
252a3(mdo sde): smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyu ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dka
252a4(mdo sde): ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te
252a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam po bcu drug pa// nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
252a6(mdo sde): 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / dad dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / 
252a7(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lA ma yin rnams dang / namakha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'bru chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar
252a8(mdo sde): byis/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / lham yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs
252b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan 'ang / na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa// 
252b2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro nga'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya'i bu phyug cing nor mang la/ longs
252b3(mdo sde): spyod che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa dis/ rigs mnyam pa las rlung mtha/ 
252b4(mdo sde): nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// / de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu/ chags nas/ de zla brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang
252b5(mdo sde): bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs po zhig btsas nas/ de las kho ra khor yug tu nyi ma'i 'od zer lta buM 'phro ste/ 
252b6(mdo sde): de'i snang bas mtshan mo grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byaso// de nas pha ma dang / khyim de na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams
252b7(mdo sde): dang / nya du rnams dang / ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyaso// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u
252b8(mdo sde): 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nyadu rnams na re khye'u 'di'i btsas pa zag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nyi ma bzhin du gsal bas na/ de
253a1(mdo sde): 'di ming nyi ma shes gdag so zer ro// de khye'u nyim pa na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / num snun pa'i mam gnyis dang / drim khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / 
253a2(mdo sde): rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par
253a3(mdo sde): bzang po cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang dang pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la/ 
253a4(mdo sde): phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa/ gtod pa la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dag
253a5(mdo sde): ga gtong po chen po la gnas pa zhig go// de nas byis re shig na khye'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' rab song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skra skyes
253a6(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag po'i 'od
253a7(mdo sde): mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
253a8(mdo sde): kyi thabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nya dang / khams dang / 
253b1(mdo sde): rang bzhin thug su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ des khye'u rtsims 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri ri rje mo mthon rba/ 
253b2(mdo sde): nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge slong dang / bras
253b3(mdo sde): ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de brtson pa dang / bslab
253b4(mdo sde): pa dang / 'bad pas pol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / 
253b5(mdo sde): rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spang sa nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra
253b6(mdo sde): bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan
253b7(mdo sde): spangs pa lta bur 'asil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa da
253b8(mdo sde): chags pa dang / bkur bstil mi lta ba dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe che dang / 
254a1(mdo sde): // ldan pa nyi ma bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe bram ze dang / khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'byung zhing smod pa/ lkog 'bras byed de/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che mdo
254a2(mdo sde): bo che la thog nas/ lam po che dang / srang dang / ba ni mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu 'khyam pa las ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa'o// bram ze'i tshul ni
254a3(mdo sde): tshig pa'o zhes 'dzar to// de nas de shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
254a4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi so bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las las
254a5(mdo sde): skyes pa yin pas na/ med par byar mi nus so// de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o// de nas/ 
254a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin du mdzad do// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nya mas
254a7(mdo sde): las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs
254a8(mdo sde): gsan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas nyi ma nyid kyis las byas
254b1(mdo sde): shing bsags pa de dag gnan su dag gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi
254b2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po/ 
254b3(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la
254b4(mdo sde): bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngor byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
254b5(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten ma khyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ 
254b6(mdo sde): na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs
254b7(mdo sde): pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzod nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lag ma med
254b8(mdo sde): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'daso// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdang gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las
255a1(mdo sde): byas pa'i mchod rter kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum brag/ 
255a2(mdo sde): dums bkur bsti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyu ro// de nas mchod rten de'i mchod pa la bab pa na/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis spos dang / 
255a3(mdo sde): me tog 'bring dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dang dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod pa byed do// de nas re shig na mi zhig rgyal po dang / rgyad pos rtses nas
255a4(mdo sde): skugasu nor bu rin po me ba shel zhig thob bo// de nas de dad pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char kheb la btags te/ zhabs la phyag
255a5(mdo sde): rol ras/ smon las btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu ga/ tong ba 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan
255a6(mdo sde): ngag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ nor bu rin po che 'di lta bu yang spyi bo la thogs bzhin du ma'i lto nas
255a7(mdo sde): 'byung bar gyur cig ces byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ cho lo la ngor sgyu byed pa gang yin pa de ni nyi ma 'di
255a8(mdo sde): nyid yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur bsti byas pa dang / nor bu rin po che gtogs pa nges na/ de'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung la/ 
255b1(mdo sde): rgyu de nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam/ 
255b2(mdo sde): par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smid pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro// las 'dren ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin/ 
255b3(mdo sde): pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren pa rnabs spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad
255b4(mdo sde): par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngo
255b5(mdo sde): par bstod do// / gyad kyi ba dan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor
255b6(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci
255b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / lto 'phe chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
255b8(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la song nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyan gsos dang / 
256a1(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kur dga' ban bzhug so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na
256a2(mdo sde): shAkya byug cing nor mang la/ longs spyong ra ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs
256a3(mdo sde): mnyame pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ rlung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dang
256a4(mdo sde): dag lon pa dang / bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/ gang gi tshe khye'u btsas pa de'i tshe
256a5(mdo sde): lnga rnams kyis kher khor yug nas lha'i ba dan dag bsgreng ngo // lnga'i rol mo'i cha byang dag kyang brdung so// lha'i ma tog ung pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams
256a6(mdo sde): kyis kyang gtor to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad grags pas rgyas par gyur to// khyim tham cad du yang de'i phyir ba dan bsgreng ngo // de nas de btsos pa'i btsas stor byas nas/ 
256a7(mdo sde): khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas pa na 'jig rten thams cad grags pas rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming
256a8(mdo sde): stan grags shes gdag so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u sman grags bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / num snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba
256b1(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zhe dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang de cog gi/ 
256b2(mdo sde): bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye grags par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ 
256b3(mdo sde): snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go// de nas phyis re shig na khye'u snyan grags shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes
256b4(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyi kyi legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis rgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga'i ba/ 
256b5(mdo sde): rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mtho nga ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba ba/ skyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das/ 
256b6(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / 
256b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan to// de nas khye'u sman grags kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye
256b8(mdo sde): shes rdo rjes btsem nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thong ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdud cing bam
257a1(mdo sde): pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas rol
257a2(mdo sde): mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos
257a3(mdo sde): can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom po nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags thams cad dang bral
257a4(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong ba'am/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsril bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ 
257a5(mdo sde): rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag/ par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang ba#
257a6(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gan su gyur to// de yang gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba'i gos spyod do// gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung du spyod
257a7(mdo sde): do/ gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba'i zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong spyod de/ gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do// de nas dge slong dag
257a8(mdo sde): the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snyan grags kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams
257b1(mdo sde): kyis ba ngan bsgreng nas/ 'jig rten du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
257b2(mdo sde): dag snyan grags nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bas grwa
257b3(mdo sde): pas/ snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gi nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i kha
257b4(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams pa rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge pa byas shing bsags pa
257b5(mdo sde): rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched/ rnams 'ba' shi la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus na can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang
257b6(mdo sde): chud mi za// tshogs shing ngas la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs
257b7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang nabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa
257b8(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal por pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa la/ 
258a1(mdo sde): re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung
258a2(mdo sde): po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la/ sku gdung gi mchod pa byas
258a3(mdo sde): nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa/ 'bang du rgyung grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chag sa 'bum phrag du
258a4(mdo sde): mas bkur bsti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de nas re shig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod rten gyi dus ston
258a5(mdo sde): byed pa der gyad 'gyed pa rnams kyi ba dan dag bsgreng ngo // de nas re shig na rgyal po'i gyang gcig gis gyang gcig/ non pa dang / des gyad kyi ba dan thob nas/ des
258a6(mdo sde): de blangs te srog chags 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs len cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 
258a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dran par byas te/ ba dan de mcho na gyi steng gi srog shing la btags nas/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par
258a8(mdo sde): gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces bya'o// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gyad du
258b1(mdo sde): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sman grags 'di yin te/ de bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi/ mchod rten pa bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/ 'khar ba'i bde ba mtha' las myong bar/ 
258b2(mdo sde): gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyi da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bya'o// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnog pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par ga
258b3(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren par 'gyur ro// 
258b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las ga cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'bar shig pa gta/ 
258b5(mdo sde): bar bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
258b6(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // gang po la sogs pa rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las// rtogs pa brjod pa sna tshogs shes bya ba ste/ sdom gyi
258b7(mdo sde): tshigasu brjod pa bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// // sdom mi 'od bzang ma dang rab sdug ma// dkar po zla ba ud pa la// mdzes ldan ma dang mu tig dang // gtsang ga la bde byed ma// mi
258b8(mdo sde): sdug sde tshan bcad de bstan// 'od bzang ma zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / byug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi ma
259a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lde ma yin rnams dang / namakha
259a2(mdo sde): lding rnams dang / mo 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'bye rin po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma
259a3(mdo sde): yin dang / na mkhara' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bded cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bzo' dang / rnal
259a4(mdo sde): zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim
259a5(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugaso// / de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgyar ga rnam
259a6(mdo sde): thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rig mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur/ 
259a7(mdo sde): spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dag lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa lci
259a8(mdo sde): rgyan gyis rngubs pa/ nor bu rin po che mgul na thogs pa zhig bcas te/ de nas 'od byung ba des mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar bya'o// de nas de btsas pa'i bcos ston byas nas/ 
259b1(mdo sde): bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di bcas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas na/ 
259b2(mdo sde): de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming 'od bzang mo zhos gdag so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma pang na mtsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / du ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru bo'i ma
259b3(mdo sde): ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ mam brgyad la gtad de/ ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad
259b4(mdo sde): par bzang cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// bu mo de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la ban pa
259b5(mdo sde): dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ de la blong ba su dang su 'ongs kyang rung ba de dang de dag la mgul nas/ rgyan bkra kha te sbyin par byed// byin nas kyang yang brgyan 'byung
259b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro// de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ongs/ de nas de dag
259b7(mdo sde): gis gnod par gyur nas/ de'i pa lag pa la oM tshugs bcas te bsam pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni/ bzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur snyam nas sems khongasu chud cing 'dug go// de nas
259b8(mdo sde): re shig na bu mo des pa sems khongasu chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ yab ci zhig gi sems khongasu chud cing bzhugs/ des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad// de nas phyis bu mo de na re yab thugs ngan
260a1(mdo sde): ma mdzad cig dang / nga ste zhag bdun na bdag nyid kyis khyim thab bdam par 'tshalo zhes ze'o// de nas tshong dpon des rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol ba/ mnyan du
260a2(mdo sde): yod par dril bsgrags te/ da ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'di bzang ma rang nyid kyi khyim thab 'dam par chad kyis khyed kyi bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces byaso// de nas zhag bdun lon pa
260a3(mdo sde): dang / bu mo 'od bzang ma shing rta la zhen te/ chos gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris te bstod pa 'don cing sring du nag
260a4(mdo sde): so// de nas deng rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnam sa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu rnams dal yid smon byed cing lta bo/ de dag la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shing
260a5(mdo sde): kyis byang bar bshad de/ bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku brnyas ni mi 'tshal na yong ye bdag 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags pa kho na pa so// bdag ni sangs
260a6(mdo sde): rgyas la skyabasu song ste/ de'i thad du rab tu 'byung zhes byas nas de dag phyir logo// 'od bzang ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 
260a7(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags
260a8(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa ba ni rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de zos nas bu mo 'di bzang mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po ca shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhug
260b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de nas bden pa mthong nas mngon par shes pa yang bsgrag so// de nas bu mo 'ad babang ma stan las langs te/ tha gos brag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas/ 
260b2(mdo sde): ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kyang legs par gsungs
260b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob du rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi tha dad tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tsha
260b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di la gdung bar bya ba mang po dag des 'dren par 'gyur bar thugasu chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo song la
260b5(mdo sde): 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig/ de nas bu me 'od bzing ma rgya la bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas byung ste/ mang po 'dus pa'i nang du song ba dang / der so so nos bsams pa 'di
260b6(mdo sde): mthus dbrog par bya'o snyam ste/ de dag gis de bzung bar bas so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma de dag gis bsngags pa dang / ngang ba'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du na mkha' la mngon par
260b7(mdo sde): 'phags ste/ cho 'brul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/ de nas de dag gis lha dang / mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de
260b8(mdo sde): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ gsol ba btab pa su mar spyon pa spron/ khyed kyis chos 'di lta bu mngon du/ 
261a1(mdo sde): / byas pa las ni/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma na mkha' las bab nas/ skye bo phal po che'i gang la 'dug ste/ gang
261a2(mdo sde): thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de/ des de rab
261a3(mdo sde): tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas// de nas nges brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'brad pas pos mig lnga pa'i la dzo so 'di nyid dge mo ning mi dran par rig nas 'du byed
261a4(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra
261a5(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan
261a6(mdo sde): pa/ tsan ngan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / 
261a7(mdo sde): pa dang / bkur bstil mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas gyur to// de nas dge slong dag be tsom skyes te/ the com
261a8(mdo sde): thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa 'od bzang mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mgul
261b1(mdo sde): ba nas/ kyang nor bu rin po che byung la rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'od bzang / 
261b2(mdo sde): ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ongs pa'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 
261b3(mdo sde): 'od bzang ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
261b4(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams
261b5(mdo sde): ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag/ gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za
261b6(mdo sde): tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa de gu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
261b7(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang nabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnam
261b8(mdo sde): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par
262a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrim las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin daphung po'i lhag ma med pa'i myangs papa 'das
262a2(mdo sde): ba'i dbyangasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdang la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten
262a3(mdo sde): kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags cig yod pa zhig brtsig so// de nas re shig na rgyal po gzhan yod kyi btsun mo pad+ma rgas nas rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs lus
262a4(mdo sde): las bkrol te/ mchod rten de la phul lo// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'angs
262a5(mdo sde): na bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge/ slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po
262a6(mdo sde): gzhan yod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/ nges bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs brtags pa ngan/ 
262a7(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / yan lag dang nying lags thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni daltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bya so// dge slong
262a8(mdo sde): dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu
262b1(mdo sde): nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma
262b2(mdo sde): rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtang bar bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 
262b3(mdo sde): dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / rab sdug ma zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams
262b4(mdo sde): dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / po brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded/ dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang
262b5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod
262b6(mdo sde): ba byas te/ lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
262b7(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bzang dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du
262b8(mdo sde): yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad
263a1(mdo sde): / ngam dgu lon pa na/ bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa mthun du yod pa na gnas/ 
263a2(mdo sde): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyi snying du rab tu sdug ma zhig btsa so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nyid du rnams
263a3(mdo sde): na re bu mo 'di skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming rab sdug ma zhes gdag so zhes zero// de yang tshe rabs dran te/ btsas ma thag tu tshig su bcad
263a4(mdo sde): pas smras pa/ sbyin pa byin pa mang nyung ci yang rung / zhing gi khyad par bzhi pas 'bal bar 'gyur/ de'i phyir mkhas pas bsgribs te 'jig rten du// dad pas lha mi'i dag
263a5(mdo sde): byug sangs rgyas sbyin// de nas de'i pha ma dang / gzhan yang khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshigs brjod pa de thos nas skrag cing sngangs te/ mi dga' bar gyur la/ spyi bung zhes
263a6(mdo sde): byed nas smras pa/ kye ma bu mo 'di ni sha za mo zhig go// des smras pa/ yum bdag ni sha za mo yang ma lags/ srin mo yang ma lags kyis/ bdag ni bu mo lags te/ sbyin da
263a7(mdo sde): sbyin par 'tshalo// de nas de'i mas khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin la bu mo 'di skad mchi'o zhes bsnyad// de nas khyim bdag dri dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan
263a8(mdo sde): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol te/ de'i phying sbyin rabs 'don du bcug go// de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe/ 
263b1(mdo sde): pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang / phangs pa dang / snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar gyur to// re shig na/ 
263b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas deng srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bze' ba dang / btung ba med pas shi'o// de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
263b3(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la rab sdug ma la nga na re 'khor bzhi po rnams la khyod kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / 
263b4(mdo sde): stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul cig ces gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bor ba sdug ma'i thad du 'ongs nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod kyis
263b5(mdo sde): 'khor bzhi po rnams la zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman thob rnams phul cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas rab sdus
263b6(mdo sde): mas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos mnos nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smraso// de nas rab sdug ma spyod yul gyi grong blta ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par cha so// de nas
263b7(mdo sde): re shig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gtam de thos nas shin tu rings par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste/ smras pa/ rab sdug ma gar 'gro// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
263b8(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du nal ta'i las byed par bsgo so// mgon med zas sprin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyar gyis khyed khya mi dgos// rab sdug
264a1(mdo sde): mas smras pa/ gal te yab bden pa mthong lags la/ si'i 'og thob thag tu sbas pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs na sbyar ba 'di ngo mtshar che ba ci mchis/ 'on
264a2(mdo sde): bdag ni skye bo dbul po la phan gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyidado// de bzhin du dge bsnyen lnga brgya dang / btsun mo 'phreng rgyud ma dang / rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dang / btsun mo 'khor gyi bla
264a3(mdo sde): drang srong sprin dang / gna' pi dang ri dgas 'dzer gyi ma sa ga dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal rnams kyis kyang skabs phye ste/ khyod kyis bya mi dgos nas byas so// de nas nags khung du song nas de ma
264a4(mdo sde): yin pa'i tshe lugs can dag gis kyang skabs bye'o// de ltar skrabs phye nas kyang / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ zla ba gsum gyi bar da na bza'
264a5(mdo sde): dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byaso// des zla ba gsum po de nyid kyi skabasu brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad
264a6(mdo sde): pas phe la mig lnga pa'i 'khor la 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa
264a7(mdo sde): rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam
264a8(mdo sde): pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / tsan dan spangs pa lte bur gsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so
264b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkar bstil mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mcho rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas gyur to// 
264b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'das pa dang / chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu mnyan du yod
264b3(mdo sde): ba nas/ rgyal po'i khab du chas te gshegaso// de nas rab sdug mas bcom ldan 'das dang lam du phrad nas/ 'o brgyal mi 'tshal zhes gsol to// de nas re shig na nags khung chu dang ldan pa zhig tu
264b4(mdo sde): phyin nas drol bab na rgyags kyang med nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs par gsol to// de nas lhung bzed lag pa g.yon pa la bzhag ste/ tshig tu smras pa/ 
264b5(mdo sde): gal te bsod nams dag gi rnam par smin pa yod ce na/ bdag/ gi lhung bzed bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pasna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas
264b6(mdo sde): lhas lnga'i bdud rtsis bkang ngo // de nas rab sdug gis gral rims bzhin dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed rnams nal zas kyis bkang nas/ derang bcom ldan 'das kyis dag
264b7(mdo sde): slong rnams la bka stsal pa/ dge slong dga'i kun thos kyi dge slong sa bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'dis ste/ dge slong ma rab sdugs yin no// de nas dge slong dag bcom
264b8(mdo sde): skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun par ba sdug mas las gang dag bgyis na des byug po'i rig su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing ldan
265a1(mdo sde): sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi bkur la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / 
265a2(mdo sde): dag rab sdug ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs brnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dbang rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 
265a3(mdo sde): rab sngag me nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam pa smi
265a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur/ nu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zan pa sa dang / khams
265a5(mdo sde): dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni/ bskal pa ba rgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras
265a6(mdo sde): bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bsgral pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri ba pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs
265a7(mdo sde): ldan pa/ bang bar mashegs pa/ 'dzi nam khyen pa/ skyes dri 'dus pa'i lal sgrung ba/ thun med ga/ lnga dang mi rnams kyi stonags sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'ad sru nas bya / 
265a8(mdo sde): na da byung // de grong khyer badra min/ drang srong sla ba'i dgas kyi na gis na rten ci'i 'izhug so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od bsrung sde drogam thabs dang / chos gom
265b1(mdo sde): so gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnabs nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs ring byas te/ mdun du bdar nas bA ra na sir bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re shig na tshong
265b2(mdo sde): dpon zhig g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ bskyed mos tshal du song nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba mang po dag khyero// de nas re shig na de'i mngag bzhug ma bu mo zhig 'bras can
265b3(mdo sde): gyi gzeg khyer te/ rje'o'i phyi bzhin du 'gro ba las bu mo mngag bcug ma des/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lam khar mthong nas/ de dga' bar gyur te blo
265b4(mdo sde): skyes pa bdag la rje bos lan gnyi su bran mor byar ci yo da kyis/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas des bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / 
265b5(mdo sde): brdeg pa dang / bsngos nas 'bras can gyi gzeb phye ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas sna tshogs kyis tshim par byaso// de nas tshong dpon
265b6(mdo sde): gyi thad du song ba dang / re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo 'bras chan gyi bze ba de dag re zhes dris so// des smras pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
265b7(mdo sde): 'od srung la zhal zas phul lo zhes byas pa dang / tshong dpon gyis de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to// de nas de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas smras pa/ bu mo khyod deng phyin
265b8(mdo sde): chad bran mo las phyung gis song shig/ khyod kyis bdag nyid kyis log pa na mel tshe byas pa yin no zhes smras so// de nas des thal mo sbyar te/ khyim bdag la gsol pa/ bdag
266a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes byaso// de nas khyim bdag des lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang byin nas/ de rje bos byin pa'i
266a2(mdo sde): lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan pa la rab tu byung na/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la po dgu stong du zhal ta pe'i las byas te/ 'bras can dang / 
266a3(mdo sde): skyo ma dang / thug pa btung ba dang / rtag res 'khor dang / mgron bu bod pa dang / mar me'i phreng ba dang / chos gos sra brkyang rnams dang / sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa rnams kyang phul te/ smon
266a4(mdo sde): lam btab pa/ bdag gis dka' bas bsgrubs te// bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sbyin pa dngarab tu sbyin pa dag phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems
266a5(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu ge tong ba 'dis na bdag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsungs rab la rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig ces byaso// bcom ldan 'das/ 
266a6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo mngag bzhug mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab stug ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la
266a7(mdo sde): zhal zas phul ba des na phyug po'i rig su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to// smon lam btab pa de ltar dge bco/ 
266a8(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du byas// dge slong dag de ltar las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro// las gcig tu nges par dkar
266b1(mdo sde): ba rnams na/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig
266b2(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar ba
266b3(mdo sde): par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
266b4(mdo sde): dkar mo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
266b5(mdo sde): dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / namakha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye
266b6(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkhar lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnam
266b7(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ ni bza' dang / zhol zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
266b8(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i shAkya rnams kyi nang na/ shAkya sner ma zhes bya ba phyug cing nor
267a1(mdo sde): mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ riH/ 
267a2(mdo sde): mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyad do// de de dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur sprad kyang / bu yang med/ bu mo yang med de/ lag
267a3(mdo sde): pa om tsugs bcwa nas bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim bdag nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang / bdag la bu yang med/ bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med
267a4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po da bang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ phams khongasu chud cing 'dug go// de nas dge slong dang bram ze dang / ltas mkhan dang / mdza
267a5(mdo sde): bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob shig ces de la sgo'o// de nas de bud med de/ bu 'dod pas gu lang dang / chu lnga dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin
267a6(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'dabs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lnga dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'o lha dang / 
267a7(mdo sde): sum mdor lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / ldan cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos 'thun pa pa dang // ga tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'dab so// 'jig rtenan
267a8(mdo sde): yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gtam yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du nin/ 
267b1(mdo sde): na/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rig so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 
267b2(mdo sde): pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas
267b3(mdo sde): de lung gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig na shi 'phos te/ de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs nas/ des khyim thab la sbran to// de nas
267b4(mdo sde): khyim thab gyi smras pa/ bzang mo gal te bu khye'u zhig btsas na ni legs/ de ma yin te bu mo zhig btsas na ni/ de nyid dang bcas te khyod khyim nas bskrad de gtang ngo // de nas re shig na de zla ba brgyad
267b5(mdo sde): dpa dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gaHgas bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ma'i kha dog las ni dus/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ gos dkar po gyon pa mngal gyi
267b6(mdo sde): dri mas maM gos pa zhig bcaso// de nas ri rishig na shAkya snar mas khyod kyi chung ma la bu byung ste/ bu mo zhig so// nas thos pa dang / de khros te nang du song ngo // de nas de'i chung rtsa
267b7(mdo sde): lha'i gos gyon pa'i bu mo bu'o// de nas shakya snar mas bu mo mthong nas/ mchog tu la mtshan du gyur nas/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo'i ming ji srid gdags shes mings
267b8(mdo sde): bar byed de/ nye du rnams na 'di gos da/  ma gyen bzhin du bcas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dkar mor gdag so nas ze ro// de nas bu mo dkar mo pangan 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / 
268a1(mdo sde): num snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang mar dang / zhun
268a2(mdo sde): mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang gcog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// bu mo dkar mo ji tsam du skye ba de tsam
268a3(mdo sde): du ges de tsam du gos de dag kyang skye ste/ dri ma can du yang mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la yang dri mas gos par mi 'gyuraro// de nas gang gi che bu mo dkar mo mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal
268a4(mdo sde): bo'i bu rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mang po de dag de slong du 'ong ngo // de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/ de'i pa lag pa la oM tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal
268a5(mdo sde): te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgar 'gyu ro snyam nas sems khongasu chud cing 'dug ge/ de nas re shig na bu mo dang ba sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa mthong nas
268a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ yab ci zhig gis sems khongasu chud cing bzhag/ sa/ de nas de'i don rgyas par ba do// de nas bu mo na ra yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ bdag ni 'dod pa la don dug
268a7(mdo sde): ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis/ yab kyis bdag la gnad par mdzad de gsol/ de nas re shig na nges pa ma gnyis la gsol nas/ bcom ldan
268a8(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ gos gang dag gyon te bcas pa de dag nyid chos gos lnga tshang bar gyur to// de nas des brtson pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i
268b1(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can
268b2(mdo sde): yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ 
268b3(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil da 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ 
268b4(mdo sde): rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur ba sti la mi blta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang
268b5(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom tham sa cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
268b6(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ btsun pa dkar mo sa las gang dge bgyis na de phyug po'i rigasu skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / gos dkar mo gyon pa dang / rab tu byung
268b7(mdo sde): nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag dkar mo nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen
268b8(mdo sde): grub pa dang ldan te/ dbang rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ dkar mo nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig
269a1(mdo sde): nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyim gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang
269a2(mdo sde): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams/ 
269a3(mdo sde): 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge
269a4(mdo sde): slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ ba/ skal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su
269a5(mdo sde): ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla ni med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig
269a6(mdo sde): rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA ra na si na/ drang srong spu ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so// de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi chung ma dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang zhing
269a7(mdo sde): 'dug po don zhig la drang srong smra bar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po
269b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dago// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de la chos bstan nas des
269b2(mdo sde): dad pa rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul lo// de nas mthar
269b3(mdo sde): gyis pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi stan pa la rab tu byung ngo // dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni
269b4(mdo sde): dge slong ma dkar mo 'di yin te/ des dge slong gi dge 'dun la tshos gos sra brkyang phul ba des na/ gos dkar mo gyon bzhin du btsa so// tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrung
269b5(mdo sde): pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du ma du byas// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges
269b6(mdo sde): par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par
269b7(mdo sde): smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba
269b8(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom
270a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
270a2(mdo sde): po rnams dang / byug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams
270a3(mdo sde): dang / snga ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas// mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ 
270a4(mdo sde): lha dang / kA dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha ba lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
270a5(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sman gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gnyen
270a6(mdo sde): du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ bram ze phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod tsha ba/ 
270a7(mdo sde): yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan paM/ rnam thos kyi bu'o nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnaso// de yang rigs byed gsum gyi mthar phyin te/ ming
270a8(mdo sde): gi rnam grangs dang / shes gsal dang bcas pa dang / yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang / lnga pa ste/ gtam rgyud dang bcas pa rnams tshig re re nas brdar sprod nus pa zhig go// de nas bram ze'i
270b1(mdo sde): khye'u lnga brgya/ bram ze'i sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byed do// de nas des bu dgos pa'i phyir rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' dgu
270b2(mdo sde): spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa
270b3(mdo sde): lta na sdug pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsaso// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par
270b4(mdo sde): byang ngo // nye du rnams na ra bdag cag gi bu tsha phal cher zla ba zhes 'dogs pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba zhes gdag so zhes zero// de nas bu mo zla ba bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis
270b5(mdo sde): dang nub snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar
270b6(mdo sde): dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pa d+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de nas bu
270b7(mdo sde): mo zla ba mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / bya ba la gsal ba dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur to// 
270b8(mdo sde): de nas re shig na de'i pa bram ze'i khye'u rnams slob pa na de thos pa tsam gyis lob so// thos nas kyang bstan chos de dag lta 'og dang sbyor zhing 'chad nuso// de nas de'i grags pas
271a1(mdo sde): / mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to// mu stegs can dag kyang nyin gcig bzhin du de la lta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ de dang lhan cig tu gtan la 'bebs/ 
271a2(mdo sde): par byed do// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ mnyan du yod par gshegs nas mkha
271a3(mdo sde): ba rnams dang mkhas par bgrang ba de dag las phal cher bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir der dong bar byed do// de nas de dgra mi snang nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ kye ci'i phyir da
271a4(mdo sde): bstan chos shes pa dag mi 'ong ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ de/ ngag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhye na pa shAkya thub pa 'dir gshegs te/ de dag thams
271a5(mdo sde): cad de la gzhol bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma byung ba thos nas/ de spu thams cad zing zhes byaso// de nas bu mo zla bas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra thos nas/ 
271a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes/ 
271a7(mdo sde): par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mngar ba~M/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi
271a8(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla ba'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal bar// khams dang rang
271b1(mdo sde): bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos bu mo zla bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu
271b2(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i thad du rab tu byung ngo // de nas des brtson
271b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang
271b4(mdo sde): rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa
271b5(mdo sde): khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas// gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag ma/ thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbas
271b6(mdo sde): pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so ye nga dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / 
271b7(mdo sde): chags pa dang / bkur bsti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe
271b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dge slong dag khyed cag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo bshad pa gdon par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de'i tshe skye
272a1(mdo sde): dgu'i bdag mo chen mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dpog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas so sor thar pa'i
272a2(mdo sde): mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dge slong ma la tshig
272a3(mdo sde): re re nas chos kyi lung 'bog par mi mdzad de/ gal te khyed las lan cig smras pas 'dzin nus pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni/ ngas lung dbog go/ de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba
272a4(mdo sde): 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas ngam slong ma zla ba bstan yis langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su bral mo snang ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
272a5(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// lan cig bka/ 'i stsal pas/ bdag gis bzung bar 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gso
272a6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par lung dpog par mdzad nas/ lan cig bka' stsal pas/ dge slong ma zla bas yob sa// 
272a7(mdo sde): der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mang du thos pa rnams dang / thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di
272a8(mdo sde): yin no// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong ma zla bas las gang dag bgyis shing
272b1(mdo sde): bsags pa des na phyug po'i rig su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
272b2(mdo sde): zla ba nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang / ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi ma par 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ zla
272b3(mdo sde): ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin
272b4(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / 
272b5(mdo sde): khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam pa/ ra smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnam sa ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la/ 
272b6(mdo sde): bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
272b7(mdo sde): rgyas rig pa dang / zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'o
272b8(mdo sde): srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA ra na sin drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so// de nas re shig na bram ze'i bu mo zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa
273a1(mdo sde): / la rab tu byung ngo // des de la lung mnos te/ bslabs nas/ kha ton byas te phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten/ 
273a2(mdo sde): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byaso// mthar thug pa'i ye shes ni skyed ma nuso// de mkhan mo gang las rab tu byung ba de ni/ bcom ldan
273a3(mdo sde): 'das 'od srung gi thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to// de nas dge slong ma de 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar bdag gis mkhan mo thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu
273a4(mdo sde): bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i nga khye'u khyod skye dga'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshes
273a5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ 
273a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bdag thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam da
273a7(mdo sde): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin te/ des smon lam btab pa des na/ thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to// des
273a8(mdo sde): ngar srong mnos te bslabs nas kha dan du byas pa des na/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so// dege gling dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang
273b1(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro// las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang
273b2(mdo sde): 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad
273b3(mdo sde): bar bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs papa mngon
273b4(mdo sde): bar bstod do// // ud pa la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho
273b5(mdo sde): brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / dang nga/ bon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / ga/ nod sbyin rnams dang / lha mi yin rnams dang / na
273b6(mdo sde): lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / 
273b7(mdo sde): namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang
273b8(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang // snyan gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten ci
274a1(mdo sde): bzhug so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na/ klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / yid 'ong gnyis phrad par zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der grong khyer chen po drug
274a2(mdo sde): po thams cad nas/ skye bo ma po 'da'o// de nas re shig na lho phyogs nas zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs pa de'i bu mo ud pa la zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la
274a3(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ lang tshe dang nad med pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa zhig yod de/ de gang gi tshe ltad mo'i nang du 'ongs pa de'i tshe/ ltad me par la
274a4(mdo sde): cad kyis yid smon byed cing lnga bar byed do// gang so sor rtog pa'i shas chung ba de dag gi yid 'phrog par byed do// der gang gi tshe dus ston byung ba de'i tshe/ rdzogs byed la sogs pa/ ston/ 
274a5(mdo sde): pa drug kyang 'ong ngo // de nas bu mo ud pa las skye bo mang po la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i khab kyi grong khyer na mir gyur pa'i nang na bdag dang byad gzugs kyis mnyam
274a6(mdo sde): pa 'am khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu 'ga' lta yod dam/ skye bo mang pos smras pa dge sbyong go ru ta ma 'khor dang bcas pa yod do// ud pa las smras pa ci ma yin nam 'on te lha yin/ 
274a7(mdo sde): skye bo mang pos smras pa/ mi ni yin mod kyi/ da ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no// de nas tshig de thos nas/ ud pa la rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zad
274a8(mdo sde): du seng ngo // song nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'dug ste/ gar byed cing glu len rol mo byed do// bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi rtags rnams dang / bud med kyi
274b1(mdo sde): brda' rnams dang / bud med kyi rtse mo rnams kyang ston par byed do// der dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gang yin pa de dag ni des ci bya gtol med par gyur to// de nas bcom
274b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba rnams gdul ba dang / ud pa la'i byad gzugs lang 'tsho'i rgyags pa bskul ba'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par
274b3(mdo sde): 'du mdzad pa gang gis ud pa la rgas shing 'khogs la mgo skye ba dang / so rdo zhing phya ma dgu po ltar sgur bur 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas
274b4(mdo sde): de ltar sprul pa'i mod la ud pa las bdag nyid mi sdug par mthong nas/ byad gzugs dang lang tshos rgyags pa de med par gyur to// dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba rnams
274b5(mdo sde): kyang skyo bar gyur to// de nas ud pa la rgyag pa med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la dgoms phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa
274b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ci nas rnag can gyi lus 'di las tshegs chung ngus yongasu grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ud pa la dang
274b7(mdo sde): dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de dag gi bsam pa dang khag la nyal dang khams dang / rang bzhin thug su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
274b8(mdo sde): bstan te/ de thos nas kha cig gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi sha ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig
275a1(mdo sde): gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byaso// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byaso// kha cig gis ni rab tu
