301b1(mdo sde): bar 'jig pa'i chos can yin par brtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags
301b2(mdo sde): dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsor dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo / 
301b3(mdo sde): sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / 
301b4(mdo sde): nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de yang dbang po rnon po zhig ste/ gang gi tshe phyag dar khrod kyi gos
301b5(mdo sde): 'grub pa de'i tshe/ khab lan 'dzugs pa la rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug cing sdang bar byed do// de nas phyis re shig na gnas brtan ma 'gags
301b6(mdo sde): bas sgo ga bu cig song la chu klung khang ldan nas chu long shig ces byaso// de nas dge tshul ba snams bum pa khyer te chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du song ngo // de nas khrus byas te/ 
301b7(mdo sde): bum pa chus bkang nas na mkha' la byung ste/ ched 'ga' ni bum pa sngon du btang la dge tshul pa sna ma phyi bzhin 'ong ngo // ched 'ga' ni dge tshul bai sna ma sngon du 'gro la bum pa
301b8(mdo sde): phyi ba zhin 'ong ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la chos ston te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
302a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu dge tshul pa dran pa dang ldan pa/ dbang po shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa bum pa chus bkang ste/ 'ong ba 'di mthong ngam// 'dod chags
302a2(mdo sde): zhe sdang rab spangs shing / ma rig pa dang bral nas ni// lus kyi tha ma 'dzin bde ba// de ni chu chun rab tu mdzes// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du
302a3(mdo sde): ngag tshul pa sna ma bstod cing bsngags pa de'i tshe/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snam
302a4(mdo sde): 'dis las gang dag bgyis na nges gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / lha'i sna ma'i me tog gi ral chung 'tshal bzhin du skyes la dbang po rno ba dang / 
302a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong da ga snga ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed
302a6(mdo sde): cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sna ma nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de
302a7(mdo sde): ngag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / 
302a8(mdo sde): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams
302b1(mdo sde): 'bang shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal ba brgyad yang chung mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin pa
302b2(mdo sde): 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
302b3(mdo sde): nabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
302b4(mdo sde): gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen yod na rten cing bzhug so// dan/ re shig na ded dpon zhig gnas pa de gzhon nu'i tshe nas rab
302b5(mdo sde): tu byung ba'i sems skyes pa las de rab tu 'byung ma nus nas gang gi tshe/ rgas par gyur pa de'i tshe 'gyod pa skyes te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu ma byung
302b6(mdo sde): ba ni bdag gi ma legs pa ngaso snyam mo// de nas des dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la sna ma'i ma tog btags so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs can
302b7(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang bshos gsol te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dag pa'i rtsa ba dang / sngams skyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu ga/ 
302b8(mdo sde): ba 'dis na/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes
303a1(mdo sde): ba byed par ma gyur cig/ gang gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dar gzhon nu'i tshe nas 'phags pa'i chos rnams rdzogs par gyur cig ces byaso// gzhan yang bcom ldan/ 
303a2(mdo sde): 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/ des der lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las
303a3(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par
303a4(mdo sde): dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams
303a5(mdo sde): spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' ni/ gal gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de/ ra bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
303a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / lag na gser thogs shes bya ba ni/ 
303a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / 
303a8(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mas
303b1(mdo sde): byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sa
303b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zha' zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dang
303b3(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la
303b4(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas bde la bu yang med/ bu mo yang
303b5(mdo sde): med pas de lag pa oM tshugs bcas te/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin gyis kyang / bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa
303b6(mdo sde): phyir ci 'dog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / ltas mkhan dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen
303b7(mdo sde): dang / rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig/ ces bsgo'o// 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dong bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi// de la
303b8(mdo sde): de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re r-i la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rig so// 
304a1(mdo sde): ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pa ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te/ phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang lda
304a2(mdo sde): pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum rogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba'i rig so// de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la sems can zhig kyang sems
304a3(mdo sde): can gyi rigs shig nas shi 'phos nas de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugaso// bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mongs ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa
304a4(mdo sde): chags pa yang shes la ma chags pa yang shes pa dang / dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang / bu rags pa yang shes pa dang / gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang // khye'u
304a5(mdo sde): yang shes la bu mo yang shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u yi ne ra ri lho g.yas log su rten cing gnas so// gal te bu mo yin ma 'i lto g.yon log su rten cing gan so// de nas de dag
304a6(mdo sde): res nas khyim thab la sbran pa/ jo bo bdag la sras chags te bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na khye'u 'gyur bar nges kyis dgyes pa snyed du gsol zhes paso// 
304a7(mdo sde): de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg/ lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang ras bdag gis yun ring po nas smor slo ba bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo // bdag gi bu rung bar shog/ mi rung bar mi gyur
304a8(mdo sde): cig bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig/ gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog shig/ nor bskal spyod par shog shig/ bdag gi rigs rgyun ring du gnas par shog shig/ 
304b1(mdo sde): bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung // nyang yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas/ de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing
304b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba derang 'di seng shig ces yon sngo bar shog shig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do// de nas des bu chags par rig nas/ bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khangs bzangs kyi steng du nyi mas rangs
304b3(mdo sde): bzhag ste/ grang ba'i cha grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang / tshwa ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang / gcong kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang sgyu
304b4(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan tshwa che ba ma yi/ phyin pa rnams dang / ha cang dang ra ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin
304b5(mdo sde): pa rnams te/ kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis brten cing do shal dang / se me dos lus rnam par klubs te/ lha'i
304b6(mdo sde): bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i stengs nas khri'i stengs dang / khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa bzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra
304b7(mdo sde): skad ci yang ma thos par byas so// de nas zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang
304b8(mdo sde): ldan pa zhig btsas nas/ de'i lag pa gnyis la las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i gser gyi dong tshe mtshan mas btab pa gnyis byung ste/ gang gi tshe de byung ba de'i tshe/ yang gzhan
305a1(mdo sde): / 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di btsas/ 
305a2(mdo sde): ma thag tu lag pa gnyis la las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i gser gyi dong tsha gnyis byang bas na de'i phyir na khye'u 'di'i ming lag na gser thogs shes gdag so// zhes ze ro// 
305a3(mdo sde): de na khye'u lag na gser thogs pa na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nA ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad
305a4(mdo sde): nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mer dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi
305a5(mdo sde): pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can zhig ste/ gang gi tshe srang du 'gro ba de'i tshe/ 
305a6(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams mthong na lag pa gnyis brkyang nas de la gser dang dngul gyi dong che mtshan mas btab pa'i phung po de dag la ji tsam dgos pa
305a7(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to// de nas phyis re shig na khye'u lag na gser thogs rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / des bcom
305a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag
305b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das
305b2(mdo sde): kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rnas
305b3(mdo sde): pa/ slob dpon bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol bar 'tshalo// gnas brtan kun dga' bos smras pa/ bu kar sha pa ni dgos so// de nas
305b4(mdo sde): ngag na gser thogs sangs rgyas las sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar 'greng ste/ lag pa gnyis brkyang nas/ gser dngul gyi phung po chen po spungaso// de nas dge 'dun
305b5(mdo sde): kyi gnas brtan dang / dge slong gzhan dag dang / gan/ brtan kun dga' bos de mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan / du gyur to// de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs kyis sangs
305b6(mdo sde): rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsams pa dang / bgal
305b7(mdo sde): nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u lag na gser thogs kyis 'jig tshogs la
305b8(mdo sde): lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas des nyid rnams la longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' byas te/ 
306a1(mdo sde): / dge slong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'ongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ ba ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas
306a2(mdo sde): des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad brnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / 
306a3(mdo sde): rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams
306a4(mdo sde): gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar
306a5(mdo sde): myur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa/ ba/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti la miSh+Tha
306a6(mdo sde): gidabang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas gyur to//  dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs
306a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lag na gser thogs kyis las gang dgi bgyis ni/ des 'di'i sreg pa gnyis la gser gyi dong tsha mtshan mas btab pa gces byung ba rab/ 
306a8(mdo sde): byung ba/ dgra bcom panyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkara' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lag na gsar thogs nyi dkyis sngon cha rabs gzhan dag tu tshigs rnyed cing
306b1(mdo sde): rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ lag na gser thogs nyid kyis las byas shing bsags
306b2(mdo sde): pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / 
306b3(mdo sde): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / 
306b4(mdo sde): skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin bar 'gyuraro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu
306b5(mdo sde): nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
306b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi
306b7(mdo sde): ston gsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA ra na sen drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nag zhi rten cing bzhug so// de nas yang dag
306b8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i ma bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
307a1(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ rgyal po kr-i kris de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gis mchod pa byas te/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug
307a2(mdo sde): tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang nga rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsegs te/ mchod rten de'i dus ston bang pa na/ rgyan po zhig gis gser gyi dong tshe gnyis mchod rten
307a3(mdo sde): de'i srog shing la btag so// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang dar lag pa la gser yod pa kho nar gyur cig ces byas
307a4(mdo sde): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa de ni lag na gser thogs 'di yin te/ nges mchod rten
307a5(mdo sde): la gser gyi dong tshe gnyis btags pa des na 'di lta bu'i khyad par can du gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// 
307a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin po yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni
307a7(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges
307a8(mdo sde): par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab
307b1(mdo sde): par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 
307b2(mdo sde): bam po bcu dgu pa// sde snod gsum pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang
307b3(mdo sde): po brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkhan
307b4(mdo sde): lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin
307b5(mdo sde): da na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rna// mas kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen pa dang ldan pa/ 
307b6(mdo sde): ne bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par nyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
307b7(mdo sde): chal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ni bzhugaso// de mnyan du yod pa na/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang
307b8(mdo sde): bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thob pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med
308a1(mdo sde): pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu rab shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma bkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal
308a2(mdo sde): srid bskyangaso// de nas re shig na/ de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgu spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las btsur mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba
308a3(mdo sde): brgyad ngam dgu lor pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u gosu chos gos tshon can gyon la dge slong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran pa zhig btsoso// de nas skyes ma thag tu dris pa ci mnyan du
308a4(mdo sde): yod pa 'di kho ri na bcom ldan 'das dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams bzhugs sam zhes ze'o// de nas de'i/ 
308a5(mdo sde): ma ya mtshan du gyur te/ dga' bas rgyas nas smras pa/ mnyan du yod pa 'di kho na na bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan/ thos chen po rnams bcug so zhes byas so// de nas re
308a6(mdo sde): shig na don de rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol te/ khyod kyi sras gos chos gos tshon can 'tshal ba dge sbyong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran pa zhig bcas te/ de bcom ldan
308a7(mdo sde): 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams ga la bzhugs pa yang rmed do zhes byaso// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
308a8(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drang so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas rgyal po gsal rgyal
308b1(mdo sde): gyi bkangs ga la ba der gshegs te/ byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung le gdan bshams pa la bzhug so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu bang bar blangs
308b2(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar brim so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bu 'di btsas ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams dran lag so zhes gsol te/ de nas
308b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bu de la sde snod gsum pa khyod nad med par gyur cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag
308b4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo zhes smras so// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe btsas nas lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe/ chos gos tshon can de dag nyid gyon
308b5(mdo sde): bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ ngas brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas bo la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing
308b6(mdo sde): mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams
308b7(mdo sde): cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang
308b8(mdo sde): lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsa na dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag
309a1(mdo sde): par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyeng ba dang / chags pa dang / bkur bstil mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / 
309a2(mdo sde): gus par smra ba'i gnas gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skas te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sde snod gsum pas/ 
309a3(mdo sde): las gang dge bkris na/ des chos gos tshon can 'tshal la/ dge slong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran bzhin du btsas te/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyi
309a4(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dge slong rje/ snod gsum pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag de tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal
309a5(mdo sde): bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsogs pa de dag gzhan su
309a6(mdo sde): zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
309a7(mdo sde): dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dag pa dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig
309a8(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chung mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag
309b1(mdo sde): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa
309b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong
309b3(mdo sde): khyer bA ra na sin drang srong smra ba'i ri dgos kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so// de nas re shig na rgyal po kri kri'i bu dang drang srong smra bar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku
309b4(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i
309b5(mdo sde): 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba ma thong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dang ba skyeso// dad pa/ skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
309b6(mdo sde): te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud
309b7(mdo sde): nas/ 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po la
309b8(mdo sde): gsel to// yab bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar 'tshal na// gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byaso// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod ring po ma thogs par rgyal
310a1(mdo sde): rab du dbang bskur dgos papa 'di na ngas bcom med do// bus smras pa/ rgyal srid nyes pa mang po dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dgrar gyur pa bdag la mi tsham
310a2(mdo sde): bdag ni bcom ldan 'das pa bstan pa rab tu mi 'thung du mi gdang ngo // de nas s+ya kyis ma gnang nas des zhag gcig dang gnyis dang gsum nas zhag drug gi bar du la 'jo'o/ 
310a3(mdo sde): denas da rdza grogs rnams kyis rgyal po la gsil to// lde mkhyen par mdza du gsol/ sras 'di rab tu byung na legs kyi/ ba du 'dir 'gum na ma legasaso// de nas rgyal pos gas
310a4(mdo sde): nas ngas 'a char bcug ste/ nas khyod sde snong gsum pa logs kyi bar dung dang 'brang du ma 'ong shig ces bsgo'o// de nas re shig na de yab kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan
310a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ ras brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas ring po ma lon par sde snong ga sum lobs te/ rig pa dang grol ba smra ba chos ston
310a6(mdo sde): par gyur nas de 'di sam dris pas te/ mal bdag gis sngon dam bcas pa gnyer dgums gor ma chad sAm nas/ de lab kyi thang du song ste phrad nas dris pa/ bu chung ba lebs pa la
310a7(mdo sde): yod des/ ngas smras pa/ sde slong gsum lobs lagaso// dinas das yab la chos de lta buM bstan te du nas rgyal po mgu bar gyur te// de nas dga' ba skyes pa sgres pa/ bu cig khyod sa
310a8(mdo sde): ci dgos/ des smras pa/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs la yo byad drug 'du'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ rgyal po'i pho brang ni rgya ches ci dga' gyis
310b1(mdo sde): shig/ de nas sde snod gsum pas bcom ldan 'das zha 'bring 'khor nyi khri dang bcas te/ zhal zas bzang pos tshim pas byas nas/  spong ra ra la yang yo byad drug drug phu lo// de nas
310b2(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag da ltar dka' bas rab tu byung ba thob nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur bsti byas pa'i dge
310b3(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'ongs na/ bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gos chos gos tshon can gyon la dge sbyong gi cha lug
310b4(mdo sde): 'di dang ldan te/ tshe rabs dran par gyur cig ces byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po kr-i kr-i'i bur gyur pa gang yin
310b5(mdo sde): ba da ni sde snod gsum pa 'di yin te/ rgyu de nyid kyis phyu ga po'i rigasu skyes te// gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug dal mdzes pa dang / tshe rabs dran par gyur to// dge
310b6(mdo sde): slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin
310b7(mdo sde): ba yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dres par 'gyuraro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnam
310b8(mdo sde): dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
311a1(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / grags bshes shes
311a2(mdo sde): bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rin po rnams dang / byug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dog
311a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
311a4(mdo sde): bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mer byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nas kha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
311a5(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan po/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / spyan gsos dang / 
311a6(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso// de'i
311a7(mdo sde): tshe mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa
311a8(mdo sde): zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de'i tshe mu ge mi bzad pas gnod pa byung ste/ slong bas
311b1(mdo sde): kyang mi zas mi rnyed do// rdzas mkhan rnams kyis kyang char mi 'bab par bstan pa las re shig na/ ded dpon de'i chung ma la du chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dag lon pa dang bu byung
311b2(mdo sde): ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nyin lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/ gang gi nyin par khye'u de btsas pa de kho na'i nyin par nas than pa
311b3(mdo sde): med par gyur to// de nas de'i grags pa mnyan du yod pa mtha' dag tu rgyas par gyur to// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shis mang
311b4(mdo sde): 'dogs par byed de/ nyid du rnams na re 'di'i grags pa kun tu rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming grags bshes shes gdag so zhes zeraro// de nas khye'u grags bshes pa na
311b5(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / num snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru bo'am ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ dam ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis
311b6(mdo sde): 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du smre dag
311b7(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe khye'u grags bshes cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du don zhig la song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtsha
311b8(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba
312a1(mdo sde): lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyeso// dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ 
312a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan par mdzad de/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang
312a3(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan tu lta bar gyur te/ pa ma la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga
312a4(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yong zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can
312a5(mdo sde): yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dag bco ma pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ 
312a6(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / 
312a7(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod
312a8(mdo sde): cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// do mche ba gnyis las tshu lan lag brgyad dang ldan pa byung ste/ ngas na de la skom pa'i gnod pa med de/ gang gi tshe tsha ba'i dus su
312b1(mdo sde): dge slong skom pa rnams gung skyems la dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du ba de'i tshe yang de mi 'ong ngo // de nas de dang bshes pa'i dge slong rnams kyis dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod la skom pa'i gnod
312b2(mdo sde): pa med ces byaso// des smras pa/ bdag gi mche ba gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ste/ des na bdag ni skom pa'i gnod pa med do// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes/ 
312b3(mdo sde): te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa grags bshes 'dis las gang dge bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes/ 
312b4(mdo sde): ba dang / mche ba gnyis las chu bo yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
312b5(mdo sde): slong dag grags pa shes nyid kyi sngon tshe rabs gzhan dge/ tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' na/ la bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag bas
312b6(mdo sde): shing bsags pas na/ grags bshes nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa
312b7(mdo sde): rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / ma'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / 
312b8(mdo sde): mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni dzin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ 
313a1(mdo sde): / bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal
313a2(mdo sde): pa bzang po 'di nyid pa skye dgu'i tsha lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig po dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gsheg pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
313a3(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA ro na si na drang
313a4(mdo sde): srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so// de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig dge slong rgan po zhig la rag tu byung ba las/ de yang le lo can cig te/ gzhan/ 
313a5(mdo sde): la de bsnyen bkur byed mi 'dod do// de nas tshangs kyib mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gnas pa/ rten de nyid kyi bsnyen bkur byed par bskos pa dang / de bdag ni
313a6(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no snyam du rgya cher 'dzin to// dge slong ches rgan pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur len par byed pa nas/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams zad de/ phyis re shig na nad kyis
313a7(mdo sde): btab pa dang / gnas brtan gyis sman pa'i lung bzhin du sman mar blung nas/ de mtshan mo skom ste tsa bya gtol med nas chu btung snyam ste/ bdag gi chu snod kyi drung du song na chu
313a8(mdo sde): med par mthong ngo // de bzhin du mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dge 'dun gyi grung tshang du song na de dag kyang chu med par mthong ngo // de nas re shig na/ chu klung zlog byed kyi 'gram du/ 
313b1(mdo sde): bong na de na yang chu med par gyur te/ de mi dgar bar gyur nas/ bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams skyo ba skyed pa dang / dang bas byin pa lci bar bstar pa'i phyir chu klung
313b2(mdo sde): zlogo byed kyi pha rol na shing zhig yod pa la 'dzegs te/ ras shig der btags ras/ rang gi las rnams bsam te/ la sa la rton cing 'dug go// de nas re shig na phyi de nyin par nam nangs
313b3(mdo sde): ba dang / gtam de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bsnyad do// de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis skabs de thos nas mi dga' bar gyur te/ phan tshun
313b4(mdo sde): du bsnyad do// de nas de'i mkhan pos rku byin no de yang ma/ mthong ngo // de nas de mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od
313b5(mdo sde): srung gis 'gan de rdungs shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas khang skyong gis 'gan de brdungs pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'dus
313b6(mdo sde): song grong khyer bA ra na si thog thag tu yang gtam de grags te/ sems can 'bum phrag du ma 'dus// de nas re shig na de'i mkhan pos gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug du bcug
313b7(mdo sde): nas/ ril ba spyi blugs chus bkang nas bu chu 'di dge 'dun la brims cig ces so// de nas bras bu mngon sum du mthong ba des skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang
313b8(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams la dad pa bskyed nas bsam pa drag pos chu de dge 'dun la khrim so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la ban gdags pa'i phyir glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang nas/ 'jigs
314a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa'i phyag gis chu de bzhes te/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis kyang blangs na/ 'on kyang zad par ma gyur to// dge 'dun tham
314a2(mdo sde): cad la brims na yang zad par ma gyur to// de nas lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i chos 'phrul ya mtshan can de mthong nas// srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar
314a3(mdo sde): gyur to// de'i rgyud la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sor chung bar gyur to// gang gi tshe nang sos pa de'i tshe des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chus mi brel bar byas te/ lo
314a4(mdo sde): khri nyis stong gi bar du des dge 'dun la chu brim so// de nas phyis re shig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i
314a5(mdo sde): chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye 'u khyed skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
314a6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de bdag gis mnye khyad par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur/ 
314a7(mdo sde): cig/ bdag gi mche ba'i phrag nas kyang rga yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems
314a8(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni grags bshis 'di yin te/ das lo khri nyi stong gi bar du dge 'dun la chu brims te smon lam btab pa des na/ tshe 'di la mche ba'i
314b1(mdo sde): phrag na chu 'byung la rgyu de nyid kyis na dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges
314b2(mdo sde): par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro// las 'dres ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dres
314b3(mdo sde): mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig lag zha
314b4(mdo sde): bar bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab pa ra bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
314b5(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / rdzus te skyes pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a/ ngas la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyag
314b6(mdo sde): bo rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / 
314b7(mdo sde): rnamakha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / sngo 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byis/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
314b8(mdo sde): rtswa ma yin dang / nas pa lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na banga'angang/ 
315a1(mdo sde): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dade bcas pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
315a2(mdo sde): lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'dus rtol gyi drung nas thag ring ba ni ge na/ rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dmi panas te/ sku sman pa'i yum dang / sum
315a3(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la yang chos ston to// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas
315a4(mdo sde): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar gnas par dam bca so// de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgel gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong ste lpags/ tshe dang ldan pa moru
315a5(mdo sde): dgal gyi bu chen po'i rkang po la mgo bos phyag 'di la te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gas ga tu 'khod nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen
315a6(mdo sde): bes chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dge par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs
315a7(mdo sde): du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod// yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go// de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams snyan
315a8(mdo sde): las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas tshe dang ldan pa mo ru dgal gyi bu chen po gal ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba bdud te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po la 'dis
315b1(mdo sde): ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis da ltar bcom ldan 'das gang du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes pa cung zad gsan tam/ tshe dang ldan pa mo dus
315b2(mdo sde): gyis bu chen pos smras pa/ kye bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa rtol gyi drang nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snam
315b3(mdo sde): bu dkar po lte bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes te/ sku snyan pa'i yum dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la yang chos ston cing bzhug so// zhes thos// de nas/ 
315b4(mdo sde): 'khor bzhi po rnams tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yid rangs te rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas stan las langs
315b5(mdo sde): te dong ngo // de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams dpar zla ba gsum 'das nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal b+h+yo bu chen po ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ tshe dang ldan
315b6(mdo sde): pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams chos kyi gtam
315b7(mdo sde): gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs stong / yang dag par dga' bar byed do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par
315b8(mdo sde): bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go// de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams ston pas
316a1(mdo sde): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa mo ru
316a2(mdo sde): dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ma mthong nas ring mo zhig
316a3(mdo sde): lags te/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bas skom lags// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/ gal te btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la gnod pa ma mchis na
316a4(mdo sde): btsun pa mo'i dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la bder gshegs te byon nas/ rabs la phyag banas te gnod pa rung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am stobs
316a5(mdo sde): dang ldan nam bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'ab/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la 'di skad ces kyang gsungs shig/ btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i 'tsha
316a6(mdo sde): bzhi po rnams bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/ 'di skad du btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i mi rnams pa ni gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / zad du
316a7(mdo sde): mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du 'chi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mthu ma mchis la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum
316a8(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / zad du mche ba dang / bsnyen bkur 'gyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mthu mchis na thugs
316b1(mdo sde): rtse ba'i slang du bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegasu gsol zhes mchi'o zhes mol du gsol// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi
316b2(mdo sde): bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas/ 
316b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo ru dgal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te dong ngo // de ras tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams dong nas ring po ma
316b4(mdo sde): lon par rig nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag na/ dper na mi stobs po che lag pa skum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
316b5(mdo sde): chen po mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa rtol gyis drung nas zag mi ring ba zhig ni rdo le ba snam bu dkar po
316b6(mdo sde): lta bur 'dug pa der sen par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ni lnga'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
316b7(mdo sde): me'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te ches ston pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'dzum dbul te/ bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar 'dzam bu'i
316b8(mdo sde): gling na 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis gang ba bzhin du 'di na ni 'khor mang po dang bzhag so snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i sems thugs kyis
317a1(mdo sde): mkhyen nas/ mang ldan pa ma'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di dag la ni rang dbang med de/ gang ma tshangs deng shig ces
317a2(mdo sde): bsams na ni de'i tshe 'dong bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe ngas shig shig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe long bar 'gyuraro// sems kyis nga'i bsams pa shes nas dong ba dang 'dong bar 'gyur ro// de nas/ 
317a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa ro'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phags gcig
317a4(mdo sde): tu 'dag ras/ de dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen bre lha 'khor thams cad la ltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing
317a5(mdo sde): 'khong legs so// lha'i 'khor gyi nang ra sangs rgyas la shes nas dang pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa/ 'i lha nga lta bu dag kyang mchis so// chos dang dge 'dun dang / 
317a6(mdo sde): 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa dag kyang mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi
317a7(mdo sde): bu chen pos sbas pa la mthun par dgongs te/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// me'u dgal gyi bu de ni de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// skye ma lnga'i 'khor/ 
317a8(mdo sde): sna chags 'dus shing 'khong ngo // lnga'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la shes nas dang pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do// chos dang
317b1(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dang ba dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa dag kyang yod do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan
317b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la 'thun par bsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa
317b3(mdo sde): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do// lha'i 'khor gyi nang nas sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus
317b4(mdo sde): dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do// chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khri mas la shes nas dad pa ldan te/ lus dang bral nas
317b5(mdo sde): 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang yod do// de nas lha'i bu gzhan de ga gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang lha'i dbang po brgya
317b6(mdo sde): byin gyis smras pa la 'thun par bsam te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i 'khor sna
317b7(mdo sde): tshogs 'dres shing 'khod do// lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag yod do// chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa
317b8(mdo sde): dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas ngang pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa da lta bu dag kyang yod// de nas lha khacog stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom
318a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang / 
318a2(mdo sde): ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa lagaso// lha gzhan dog gcig gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag ni chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul
318a3(mdo sde): khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa lag so// de nas der lha brgya phrag du ma dang / lha stong phrag du ma dang / lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das/ 
318a4(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar so so'i rgyun tu zhags pa'i 'bras bu brda sprod pa byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos lha rnams dong bar rig
318a5(mdo sde): nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'a ngas ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
318a6(mdo sde): ba 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 
318a7(mdo sde): bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' ba/ bde ba la reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes kyang mchis lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod dang
318a8(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khod pa rnams bde bar gyur cig/ mo'u dgal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor ban po mchis pa rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong
318b1(mdo sde): bar 'tshal te 'di skad ces kyang mchi'o// btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams la ni gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i mi rnams bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang / thang du 'chi ba dang / bsnyen
318b2(mdo sde): bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mthu ma mchis la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa lha rnams
318b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thang du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slang 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mthu mchis na thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan
318b4(mdo sde): 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegasu gsol zhes kyang mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mo'u dgal gyi bu 'o na khyod 'dzam bu'i
318b5(mdo sde): gling du song la 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ kye bcom ldan 'ad/ sa ning ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yu la nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab a ba
318b6(mdo sde): ji ra'i nags su shing ud dus 'ba' ra'i drung du gsheg so zhes sbron cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
318b7(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos bag 'tshal nas/ jo ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/ dper na mi stobs po che lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan
318b8(mdo sde): ba mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul mi snang bar gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du son par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
319a1(mdo sde): dgal gyi bu chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khye 'udu 'ongs nas 'khor ba'i po rnams la sbran pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das na da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
319a2(mdo sde): lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a bad dza ri'i nagasu shing u dum 'ba' ra'i drung du gsheg so zhes byaso// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / bcom ldan
319a3(mdo sde): 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lnga yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a bad dza ra'i nagasu shing u dum 'ba' ra'i drung du gshegaso// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das grong
319a4(mdo sde): khyer snang ldan du gshegs pa de'i tshe/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dus so// de nas der dge slong rdzas te skyes pa zhig byung ste/ des bcom ldan 'das
319a5(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag bshos la spyan drangs nas/ re shig na gdugs
319a6(mdo sde): tshod la bab pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu gdan dar lug khyim chen pos g.yogs pa dag dang / lha'i zhal zas bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag byung bar gyur to// de nas dge slong rdzu
319a7(mdo sde): te skyes pa des bcom ldan 'das lnga'i zhal zas kyis tshim par byas te/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag la yang bkur bsti legs
319a8(mdo sde): par byaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsams pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin thug su chud nas/ de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas dge slong
319b1(mdo sde): rdzus te skyes pa phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad brnyi pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / 
319b2(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod
319b3(mdo sde): chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas
319b4(mdo sde): sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa drang / chags pa dang / bkur bsti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / 
319b5(mdo sde): nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dag slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ 
319b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus la/ btsun pa rdzus te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na/ des rdzus te skyes par gyur la/ 'dis sems bskyed pa'i mod la ci bsams pa dang / 
319b7(mdo sde): ci 'tshal ba de dag thams cad grub par gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rdzus te skyes pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing
319b8(mdo sde): rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dbaHrgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'byung ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rngus te skyes pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gan/ 
320a1(mdo sde): su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ tshug las// 
320a2(mdo sde): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro// las dge pa dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
320a3(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par
320a4(mdo sde): 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
320a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar/ gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu'o/ dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
320a6(mdo sde): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer gnyen ldan na rten cing gnas so// de nas re shig na grong med pa dgon
320a7(mdo sde): pa'i gnas zhig na/ dge slong lnga dbar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de'i nang nas dge slong gcig gis dge slong bzhi'i zhal tra byas nas/ de dag gi brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa
320a8(mdo sde): dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong gcig shos kyis ni de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ smon lam btag
320b1(mdo sde): pad 'di ltar 'di rnams kyis bdag las brtan te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba sa
320b2(mdo sde): nad bdag rab tu byung ste/ yo byad kyi khyad par dag gis brel bar ma gyur cig ces byas// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur pa
320b3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni rdzus te skyes pa 'di yino// gsol pa/ btsun pa rdzus te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na/ des rdzus te skyes lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
320b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'od nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
320b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
320b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten dazung ste/ de grong khyer bA ra na si na drang srong smra ba'i ridags kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so// de'i tshe de na tshong dpon zhig gnas pa deng/ 
320b7(mdo sde): rlung ma bu btsa' ba'i tshe sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen te nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing / ngu ba dang / des de'i sgra thos mchog tu mi dga' bar gyur to// mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas/ 
320b8(mdo sde): lag pa so tsugs bcas te sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las blo smras pa/ ma la bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan pa la rab tu byung la/ ci nas bdag gis rnams kyang mngal du/ 
321a1(mdo sde): gnas pa nyam su myong bar ma gyur cig ces smon lam btab gor ma chag mnyam te/ de skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung la rab tu byung nas
321a2(mdo sde): des smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa 'dis na/ bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der rdzus te skye bar gyur cig/ nams kyang mngal du gnas pa nyam su myong
321a3(mdo sde): bar ma gyur cig ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i ngas na tshong dpon du gru pa gang yin pa de ni rdzas te skyes pa 'di yin
321a4(mdo sde): lam bdab pades ni rdzas thub par gyur ro// des dang nga po rnams yong su smin par byis pangs ning sa dadragra bcos pasang mings sum dubyamo// nga phreng das de ltar mam
321a5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin/ pa yang gcig tu nges par gdag por 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par bkang ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa
321a6(mdo sde): yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro// las 'dres ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams
321a7(mdo sde): dang las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba'i shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
321a8(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag ying rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
321b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / 
321b2(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas
321b3(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byos te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
321b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'du
321b5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod cha ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa
321b6(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing
321b7(mdo sde): dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgar spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bltan
321b8(mdo sde): sdug la mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni mo thob pa zhig btsas nas/ nga btsas pa'i tshe shin tu rmad du byung ba du ma byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis grong khyer ser skya'i
322a1(mdo sde): gnas thog thag mdzes par byas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs byed de/ che du rnams na re 'di
322a2(mdo sde): btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas mdzes par byas pa na de'i phyir/ khye'u 'di'i ming mdzes pa zhes gangag so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u mdzes pa bang na 'tsho ba'i pho ma gnyis dang / 
322a3(mdo sde): nu ma ldan pa'i ma mo gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'o ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la ga'ang nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun
322a4(mdo sde): mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gnar yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi/ pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe cher skyes
322a5(mdo sde): pa dor tshe/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo // de nas des sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
322a6(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ bi ma stong pas ldog pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin
322a7(mdo sde): po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu nges bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// de dga' ba bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs/ 
322a8(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i byab bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis dor bsams pa dang / bag lags dang / khams dang / rang 'dzin/ 
322b1(mdo sde): thugasu chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston te/ de thos nas/ khye'u mdzes pas 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes
322b2(mdo sde): rdo rjes bcom nas// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ nges bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ des brtson pa
322b3(mdo sde): dag bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad brnyil pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam
322b4(mdo sde): bar 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa
322b5(mdo sde): khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spang
322b6(mdo sde): pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa
322b7(mdo sde): dang / bkur bsti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skye
322b8(mdo sde): the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mdzes pas las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes te
323a1(mdo sde): mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob par gyur la/ 'di btsas pa'i tshe yang shin tu rmad du byung ba du ma byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis grong
323a2(mdo sde): khyer ser skya'i gnas kun tu mdzes par bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdzes pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing
323a3(mdo sde): rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas/ mdzes pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan
323a4(mdo sde): su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
323a5(mdo sde): dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye
323a6(mdo sde): mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu
323a7(mdo sde): nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshel ba ni khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
323a8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rnab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams/ 
323b1(mdo sde): kyi ston ga/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer mdzes ldan na rten cing bzhug so// de nas rgyal po ma
323b2(mdo sde): pas de'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs so// de nas re shig na de'i dus ston shig byung ba'i tshe/ mdza' sde dag gcig mchod rten gyi drung du dong ba las/ de dag gi
323b3(mdo sde): mchod rten de mthong ba las dad pa skyes te/ me tog btag so// de dag gi nang na mdza' sde pa cig na re bdag la ni ci yang med kyi bdag ci yang mi byed do zhes zer nas/ mdza'/ 
323b4(mdo sde): sde de dag gi nang nas phyir byung ba las de 'gyod pa skyes te/ des me tog rnam pa sna tshogs btus nas mchod rten de nyid la phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
323b5(mdo sde): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mdza' sde 'gyod pa skyes nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi dbu skra dang sen so/ 
323b6(mdo sde): mchod rten pa me tog dbul ba gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag mdzes pas ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag sngon byung
323b7(mdo sde): ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA ra na si na ded dpon zhig gnas pa des rang sangs rgyas nad pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas dang ba skyes te/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ bsod
323b8(mdo sde): snyoms kyang yul/ gos kyang phul lo// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ mdzes pa 'di yino// gzhan yang bcom
324a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'od bsrung gi ring la mi dbul po shing thun zhig tu gyur te/ de raM sul zhig du shing thur song ba dang / des mchod rten zhig mthong na mchod rten dog/ 
324a2(mdo sde): 'khor sa na rtsa dag kyang skyes so// de nas de rang pa skyes nas/ rtsa rnams kyang byung ste phyags ma thogs nas mchod rten dang / mchod rten gyi 'khor sa phyag so// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal
324a3(mdo sde): te/ smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa 'dis na/ bdag gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug le mdzes par gyur cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/ 
324a4(mdo sde): rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i
324a5(mdo sde): dus na/ dbul po shang thun du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa la de yin te/ des mchod rten dang / mchod rten gyi 'khor sa chags pa des na gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gcu/ 
324a6(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to// rgyu de nyid kyis nang lngar yang dgra bcom pa cad mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag da ltar na las cig tu nges par gnag po rnams ni/ rnam par
324a7(mdo sde): smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnam pa ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro// las 'dres ma rnams ni/ rnam par
324a8(mdo sde): sman pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig
324b1(mdo sde): la gtang bar bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
324b2(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam po che shu pa// ka bi na zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / 
324b3(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang
324b4(mdo sde): namakha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
324b5(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chu na po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na
324b6(mdo sde): bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim
324b7(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe lho phyogs na rgyal po rtogs ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa
324b8(mdo sde): dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pazhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nod rnams med pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram
325a1(mdo sde): shing dang / b.lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyang sa// de nas phyis ra/ 
325a2(mdo sde): shig na btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las btsun mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa las
325a3(mdo sde): bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsaso// de nas de btsas pa'i bcos ston byas nas/ ka bi
325a4(mdo sde): na nas ming btags so// de nas khye'u ka pi na bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / num snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma
325a5(mdo sde): ma brgyad la btang nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzong cog gis bskyed
325a6(mdo sde): bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// gang gi nyin par rgyal po'i bu ka pi ni btsas pa de kha zha'i nyin par blon po khri brgyad stong gi bu yang btsas te
325a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang mtshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go// de dag gi ming yang so so'i rkyen rkyen tu 'tsham par btag so// de nas re shig na rgyal po rtogs ldan shi nas de'i 'og tu pu ka bi
325a8(mdo sde): na rgyal por bcu go// blon po'i bu khri brkyang stong de dag thams cad kyang blon par bskos so// de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po ka bi ni blon po chen po khri brgyad stong gis zham ring byas te ri dwags
325b1(mdo sde): shor du song ba dang / nges mdun logs dang / rgyab logasu dpung chen po thams cad 'gyis nas/ blon po rnams la dris pa/ ke' dgyur pa'i dpung chen po 'di lta bu dag gzhan sul
325b2(mdo sde): yod ces byaso// de nas blon po snyan par smra ba rnams kyis/ lha su la yang ma mchi so zhes byas// de nas yul dbus nas tshong pa dag cig lho phyogasu song ba de dag gis rgyal po ka bi ma
325b3(mdo sde): chen po la skyes phul lo// de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ kye tshong pa dag yul de'i rgyal po su yin/ tshong pa rnams kyis gsol ba/ lnga yul kha cig nan mang po tshogs pa dbang bgyed do// 
325b4(mdo sde): yul kha cig na ni rgyal po dbang bgyid do// de nas re shig na rgyal po ka pi na chen pos mnyan du yod pa la sogs/ ba grong khyer chen po drug tu po nya btang ste/ gal te khyed
325b5(mdo sde): 'greng ba la bab pa na yang ma 'dug par myur du shes shig/ de ltar ma byas na chad pas cher bcad do zhes byaso// de nas tshig de thos nas grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i rgyal po
325b6(mdo sde): rnams 'jig shing skrag la mi dga' ste/ skye bung zhes bya ba nas 'dus shing tshogs te gros 'thun par byas nas mnyen du yod par lhag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du song
325b7(mdo sde): gtam de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dbugs phyung ste po nya de nga'i thad du khug shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas de dag gis
325b8(mdo sde): pho nya la kho bo cag gi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po yod kyis re shig na de'i spyan sngar mchi shig ces bsgo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pho nya 'ong bar thugasu chud nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed
326a1(mdo sde): ma la lnga'i grong khyer bldan sdug dang 'dra bar ni rin po che sna bzhir sprul to// rgyal po chen po bzhin de'i sgong pon lta bur bkod do// glang po ches srung gAbu/ 
326a2(mdo sde): khu dag dang / rta sprin gyi shugs can/ lta bu dag dang / shing rta dga' byed sgra lta bu dag dang / mi gnod sbyin mi bzad pa lta bu dag kyang bkod do// bcom ldan 'das nyid ni
326a3(mdo sde): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha lug su sprul to// sang ge'i khri 'phang du nga la bdun du yod pa yang sprul te/ de la bcom ldan 'das bzhug so// de nas po nyas de lta bur mdzes
326a4(mdo sde): pa dag mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to// de nas btso/  ldan 'das kyis 'phrin yig bris ni sa pho nya de la bkar stsal pa/ rgyal po ka bi na la nga na re 'phrin yig mthong
326a5(mdo sde): ba de kho na'i tshe gal te khyod 'greng pa la bab na yang ma 'dug par myur du shog cig/ gal te ma 'ongs nang dpung gi tshogs chen po dang 'ongo zhes gyis shig/ de nas
326a6(mdo sde): po nyid ste rgyal po ka bi na chen po 'brin yig dang / kha don du btab pa de dag thams cad paso// de nas rgyal po ka pi na che so kho khri brgyad stong gis zham ring byas te mthar kyis song song
326a7(mdo sde): nas mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang / nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams kyis rgyal po ka pi na chen po bsru nas de dag gis bkur bsti chen pos grong khyer du gshegs gsol te/ mnyel
326a8(mdo sde): bso nas bcom ldan 'ongs la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'ong bar thug su chud nas/ thams cad snga ma bzhin du sprul to// de nas rgyal po ka bin chen po rgyas
326b1(mdo sde): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas/ mthong ma thag tu da'i gzugs la gzugs kyi rgyags pa dang / dbang phyug la dbang phyug gi rgyags pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to// 
326b2(mdo sde): stobs kyis dregs po nid dung yod bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang po'i gzhu khyer te 'ongs
326b3(mdo sde): na leg so snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa skyed pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kha lo ba'i cha lugs kyis dbang po'i gzhu phu lo// de nas bcom lda
326b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis rgyal po ka bi na chen po la byin na/ de rgyal po ka bi na chen bros bdegs par yang ma nus na brdung bar lta ga la nus/  de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi rnga bo che bdun/ 
326b5(mdo sde): sprul te/ nyid kyi gzhu de zla gam bzhin brdungs nas snam mang 'phags te/ des lcags kyi rnga bo che bdun char tha phyung nas/ de las sgra byung ba/ nges par 'byung ba
326b6(mdo sde): brtsams par gyis/ sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag
326b7(mdo sde): yod spyod pa byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spongs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i sgra byung nas sgra de yang 'og min gyi lha'i yul man chad du gragaso// 
326b8(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po ka bi na chen po'i stobs kyi dregs pa de yang me par gyur te/ de'i blo skyes pa e me de ci zhig snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ka bi na chen po'i sems
327a1(mdo sde): kyi rgyu ba thug su chung nas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha lugs mi snang bar mdzad de mdo 'di gsung so// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
327a2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni stobs bcu dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi gnas rgyal po chen po la dam bcas pa/ tshangs pa'i 'khor
327a3(mdo sde): lo bskor ba/ 'khor gyi nang du yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod na 'di 'byung la/ 'di skyes pas 'di skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen
327a4(mdo sde): gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam pa shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs// ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mtsha
327a5(mdo sde): drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba 'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ phreng ba'i rkyen gyis len pa// len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba
327a6(mdo sde): skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi
327a7(mdo sde): phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'di med na 'di mi 'byung la/ 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas
327a8(mdo sde): 'ang byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag pas/ ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas/ skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags
327b1(mdo sde): bas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sreng ba 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gag pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gag
